en: Leader’s Office Urges Iranians to Aid People of Somalia - Khamenei.ir  Following the drought crisis and famine in the Horn of Africa, particularly in Somalia, the Leader's office issued a statement calling on all Iranians to aid the famine-stricken people of Somalia.
hau: Sakamakon tsanantan yanayin fari da kuma bayyanar bala'in yunwa a yankin kusurwar Afirka musamman a kasar Somaliya, ofishin Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci (Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei) ya fitar da wata sanarwa inda ya bukaci dukkanin al'ummar Iran a cikin wannan wata na rahama da albarkoki (watan Ramalana) da su taimaka wa ‘yan'uwansu musulmi na kasar Somaliyan da suke cikin mawuyacin hali.
mt0: <pad> Office of the Leader Urges Iranians to Aid People of Somalia</s>

en: The full text of the statement is as follows:
hau: Ga fassarar abin da sanarwar ta kumsa:

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
hau: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai
mt0: <pad> Allah ne mai yawan alheri, mai rahama.</s>

en: These days the Horn of Africa and particularly tragedy-hit Somalia are witness to one of the most painful human crises in which drought and famine are threatening the lives of millions of Muslim people of Somalia, especially women and children, in the silence and indifference of international organizations.
hau: A cikin wadannan ranaku yankin kusurwar Afirka musamman kasar Somaliya da take cikin mawuyacin hali yana fuskantar mafi munin bala'in fari da yunwa mai sosa rai sakamakon bayyanar fari a yankin da kin tabuka wani abin a zo a gani da cibiyoyin kasa da kasa suka yi (wajen magance matsalar), hakan ya sanya rayukan miliyoyin musulman kasar Somaliya musamman mata da kananan yara cikin gagarumin hatsari da kuma fuskantar barazana.
mt0: <pad> These days the Horn of Africa and particularly tragedy-hit Somalia are witness to one of the most painful human crises in which drought and famine are threatening the lives of millions of Muslim people of Somalia, especially women and children, in the silence and indifference of international organizations.</s>

en: For this purpose and considering the Leader's special attention to helping the famine-stricken people of Somalia, the philanthropic and Muslim people of Iran are hereby invited to rush to the aid of the Muslim people of Somalia in this month of mercy and blessing and to send their monetary and non-monetary aid to the people of Somalia through the organizations in charge.
hau: A saboda haka sannan kuma sakamakon irin kulawa ta musamman da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ke bai wa lamarin taimakon mutanen da bala'in yunwa ta fadawa a kasar Somaliyan, ana kiran al'ummar musulmin Iran da su taimakawa al'ummar musulmin kasar Somaliya a cikin wannan wata na rahama da albarkoki sannan kuma suna iya isar da taimakon su na kudi da kayayyaki ga cibiyoyin da abin ya shafa don isar da su ga al'ummar Somaliyan.
mt0: <pad> a wannan lokacin, kuma ganin yadda Shugaba ya damu da agaji ga al'umar Somaliya, a nan ne aka kira 'yan Iran masu ado da Musulmi su gaggauta agaji ga Musulmi al'umar Somaliya a wannan wata na rahama da albarkatu, kuma su tura agaji na kudi da na ba-da kudi ga al'umar Somaliya ta hanyar kungiyoyi da ke aiwatar da aikin.</s>

en: Leader’s Message on the Occasion of 20th National Conference on Prayers - Khamenei.ir
hau: A cikin wani sako da ya aike wa taron tsai da salla karo na ashirin, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya jaddada cewar Wajibi ne masallaci ya zamanto wani tushe na gine-gine a garuruwa da kauyuka da wajajen taron jama'a. Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Matukar dai masallaci ya sami irin yanayin da ya dace, to kuwa nauyi mai yawa na abin duniya da kuma addini da ke wuyan al'umma, mutane da kuma jami'ai zai ragu.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful

en: By their nature human beings, require and are eager to worship God and to show humility before Him, God who is the Creator of all goodness and beauties. And prayer fulfills this need.
hau: Dan'adam dai a dabi'arsa, (halitta ce) mai kauna da kuma bukatar addu'a da kuma kankan da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki Wanda Shi ne Mahaliccin dukkanin abubuwa masu kyau; ita kuwa salla ita ce mai samarwa da kuma biyan wannan bukatar.

mt0: <pad> By making prayers obligatory, divine religions quench the thirst of human nature and save it from confusion and misguidance concerning the quenching of this thirst.</s>

en: Repeating prayers every day and night is an opportunity and a blessing which saves human beings from drowning in lack of vigilance. It gives human beings the opportunity to have a conscious presence of the heart before God.
hau: Nanata yin salla dare da rana, wata dama da kuma ni'ima ce da take ‘yantar da dan'adam daga fadawa cikin wannan tarko na gafala; da ba shi damar gabatowa da zuciyarsa cikin masaniya a gaban Allah; da goge masa ransa ta yadda badininsa zai yi haske.

en: When divine remembrance, prayers and worship combine with the fabric of social life, they reveal the miracle of Islam in the constellation of divine commands.
hau: A yayin da zikiri da salla da addu'a suka hadu da tsari na rayuwa ta zamantakewa, to kuwa mu'ujizar Musulunci ya kan iya bayyana cikin hukumce-hukumcensa na ibada.
mt0: <pad> When divine remembrance, prayers and worship combine with the fabric of social life, they reveal the miracle of Islam in the constellation of divine commands.</s>

hau: Masallaci dai wata alama ce da ke nuni da wannan haduwar.
mt0: <pad> Mosque a showcase of this combination.</s>

en: Congregational prayers in the mosque with other believers, is taking part in a divine celebration and this makes the rain of divine mercy heavier and more pleasing.
hau: Salla a masallaci sannan kuma cikin muminai, tamkar zama ne a taburmar bakunci ta Ubangiji, hakan kuma wani lamari ne da ke kara saukar da ruwan rahamar Ubangiji da yawa sannan kuma mai kwantar da hankali.
mt0: <pad> a mosque with other believers, is taking part in a divine celebration and this makes the rain of divine mercy heavier and more pleasing.</s>

en: The blessedness of prayers imbues and enlightens the atmosphere of mosques. And speaking righteous words and teaching religion, ethics and politics in that atmosphere pleases one's heart and soul more than any other atmosphere and it gives a divine orientation to the life of the individual and society.
hau: Albarkacin salla, yanayin masallaci ya kan kara haske da kuma kamshi, sannan kuma fadin gaskiya da koyar da addini da kyawawan halaye da lamurran da suka shafi siyasa su kan sami gindin zama cikin zuciya da kuma rai sama da kowane waje, sannan da kuma ba wa rayuwa ta daidaiku da kuma ta jama'a mahanga irin ta Ubangiji.
mt0: <pad> Blessings of prayers imbue and enlighten the atmosphere of mosques. And speaking righteous words and teaching religion, ethics and politics in that atmosphere pleases one's heart and soul more than any other atmosphere and it gives divine orientation to the life of the individual and society.</s>

en: This is how the mosque should be viewed.
hau: Da irin wannan mahangar ce ya kamata a dinga kallon masallaci.
mt0: <pad> wanna ne yadda mosque ya kamata a gane.</s>

en: The spirit of the mosque instills dynamism and motivation into the body of life.
hau: Ruhin masallaci yana kara wa tushen rayuwa nishadi da kuma karfin gwuiwa.
mt0: <pad> The spirit of the mosque instills dynamism and motivation into the body of life.</s>

en: Wherever there is organized life, the mosque is the main center.
hau: A duk inda aka sami cibiyar rayuwa, to kuwa masallaci shi ne tushe na asali na hakan.
mt0: <pad> Wherever there is organized life, the mosque is the main center.</s>

en: In the structure of cities and villages, in schools and universities and in other places - from marketplaces to airports, roads, terminals, nursing homes, hospitals, parks and holiday resorts - the mosque should be the pole and the pivot.
hau: Wajibi ne masallaci ya zamanto tushe na gine-gine a garuruwa da kauyuka, a makarantu da jami'oi, a wajajen taruwar al'umma kama daga kasuwanni da wajajen aiki har zuwa ga filayen jiragen sama da manyan hanyoyi da wajajen yada zango, har zuwa ga wajajen shakatawa da asibitoci, a dukkanin wajajen da ake da su.
mt0: <pad> In the structure of cities and villages, in schools and universities and in other places - from markets to airports, roads, terminals, nursing homes, hospitals, parks and holiday resorts - the mosque should be the pole and the pivot.</s>

en: Everywhere the mosque should be clean, beautiful and calming.
hau: Wajibi ne masallaci a ko ina yake ya zamanto mai tsafta, kyau da kuma kwantar da hankali.
mt0: <pad> a duk inda masallacin ya kamata ya kasance mai tsabta, kyakkyawa, kuma mai kwantar da hankali.</s>

en: The material and spiritual management of the mosque, which is shouldered by the clergy in charge of the mosque, should be wise, responsible and even affectionate.
hau: Wajibi ne jagorancin yadda ake gudanar da masallaci wanda yake wuyan malami (limamin) masallacin ya zamanto cikin hikima da jin yanayi na sauke nauyi haka nan kuma cikin so da kauna.
mt0: <pad> a ruhani da na jiki na masallacin, wanda clergy in charge of the mosque, ya kamata su zama masu hikima, masu alhakin, kuma ma mai son.</s>

en: If the mosque achieves the quality it deserves, a lot of material and spiritual burdens will be removed from the shoulders of society, the people and government officials.
hau: Matukar dai masallaci ya sami irin yanayin da ya dace, to kuwa nauyi mai yawa na abin duniya da kuma addini da ke wuyan al'umma, mutane da kuma jami'ai zai ragu.
mt0: <pad> Idan masallacin ya samu ingancin da ya cancanta, a babban yawan kayan aiki da kuma na addini za su tafi daga kan al'umma, jama'a da kuma wakilan gwamnati.</s>

en: In the hope of reaching that day and greetings be upon the one remaining with Allah on earth (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake)
hau: Muna fatan ganin wannan ranar, sannan kuma da sallamar mu zuwa ga mai girma Bakiyatullah (Imam Mahdi) rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi.
mt0: <pad> a ranar da Allah ya kawo mu, kuma tsira da albarkatu ne ga wanda ya rage a cikin Allah a duniya (mu bayar da rayukanmu don sa)</s>

en: Leader Meets with Lebanese Prime Minister - Khamenei.ir  His Eminence stressed that Iran will spare no effort to aid the progress and development of Lebanon.
hau: Ganawar Jagora Da Sa'ad Hariri Da ‘Yan Tawagarsa A safiyar yau litinin (29-11-2010) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Khamenei ya gana da firayi ministan kasar Labanon Sa'ad Hariri tare da ‘yan tawagarsa wadanda suka kai masa ziyarar ban girma.
mt0: <pad> Imam Khamenei meets with Lebanese Prime Minister</s>

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the negations conducted in Tehran and reiterated: "The ground is prepared for the strengthening of the relations between the two countries, and these relations should be further expanded, especially in trade, development and construction sectors."
hau: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da tattaunawar da ta gudana tsakanin jami'an kasashen biyu da kuma yarjejeniyoyin da aka kulla a yayin wannan ziyarar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ce: Akwai fagage masu yawa da za a iya amfani da su wajen karfafa alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu a bangarori daban-daban. A saboda haka wajibi ne a kara karfafa wannan alakar musamman ma wadanda suka shafi bangaren kasuwanci da sake gina kasa.
mt0: <pad> The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the negations conducted in Tehran and reiterated: "The ground is prepared for strengthening the relations between the two countries, and these relations should be further expanded, especially in trade, development and construction sectors."</s>

en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the continuous attacks of the Zionist regime on Lebanon and added: "If it can, the Zionist regime will go beyond Beirut and even Tripoli in order to besiege Syria.
hau: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da wuce gona da iri da keta hurumin kasar Labanon da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila take ci gaba da yi, Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar: Idan har haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila za ta iya, tana iya keta birnin Beirut zuwa garin Tarabulus don ta killace kasar Siriya.
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Khamenei ya kawo a cikin shawarwari na jihadi a kan Lebanon, inda ya ce: "Idan Zionist regime ya iya, zai tafi beyond Beirut and even Tripoli in order to besiege Syria."</s>

en: But resistance is the only deterring factor against the usurping Zionist regime."
hau: To sai dai abin da kawai ya zama kafar ungulu ga haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila (wajen cimma wannan manufa da take da ita) ita ce gwagwarmaya.
mt0: <pad> Namun resistance ne kadai abin da ke kawo hankali ga Zionist Empire a kan hanyar samun iko.</s>

en: His Eminence stressed that Lebanon is the only Arab country that has managed to defeat the Zionist regime and reiterated: "Resistance is the only factor that the enemies of Lebanon are unable to confront.
hau: Jagoran ya bayyana kasar Labanon a matsayin kasar Larabawa guda da ta iya samun nasara a kan haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila don haka sai ya ce: Gwagwarmaya ita ce kawai abin da makiya kasar Labanon suka gagara fuskanta.
mt0: <pad> His Eminence stressed that Lebanon is the only Arab country that has managed to defeat the Zionist regime and reiterated: "The Resistance is the only factor that the enemies of Lebanon are unable to confront."</s>

en: Therefore, it is necessary to appreciate it."
hau: A saboda haka wajibi ne a fahimci irin girman da hakan take da ita.
mt0: <pad> Don haka, yana da kyau a appreciate it.</s>

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "As long as the Zionist regime exists, Lebanon will need resistance."
hau: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya ci gaba da cewa: Har zuwa lokacin da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila ta ci gaba da wanzuwa to kuwa kasar Labanon tana bukatar gwagwarmaya.
mt0: <pad> The Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "As long as the Zionist regime exists, Lebanon will need resistance."</s>

en: Ayatollah Khamenei expressed his satisfaction with the good relationship between Saad Hariri and Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah as well as the officials of the Lebanese resistance forces. "These relationships should be strengthened more than before."
hau: Haka nan kuma Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana farin ciki da jin dadinsa dangane da kyakkyawar alakar da take tsakanin Sa'ad Hariri da Sayyid Hasan Nasrullah (shugaban kungiyar Hizbullah ta kasar Labanon din) da sauran jami'an kungiyar gwagwarmayar yana mai cewa: Wajibi ne a ci gaba da karfafa irin wannan alakar.
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Khamenei ya bayyana farin cikin sa dangantaka mai kyau a tsakanin Saad Hariri da Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah da kuma wakilan kungiyar resistance ta Lebanese. "Wadannan dangantaka za su kara karfafa fiye da yadda aka saba."</s>

en: His Eminence stressed that the Islamic Republic of Iran supports the unity and independence of Lebanon. He added: "Lebanon is a multi-religious country, and the followers of different religions and sects have lived together peacefully for many years, but some people are after causing turmoil and religious conflicts.
hau: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake jaddada cewar Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran tana goyon bayan tabbatar da hadin kai da ‘yancin kan kasar Labnon, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ce: Kasar Labanon kasa ce ta mabiya mazhabobi daban-daban wanda tsawon shekara da shekaru mabiya wadannan addinai da mazhabobi suke rayuwa tare da junansu cikin kwanciyar hankali da fahimtar juna, to sai dai wadansu mutane suna son ganin an haifar da rikici da tashin hankali na mazhaba a wannan kasa wanda wajibi ne a tsaya kyam wajen fuskantar hakan.
mt0: <pad> His Eminence stressed that the Islamic Republic of Iran supports the unity and independence of Lebanon. He added: "Lebanon is a multi-religious country, and followers of different religions and sects have lived together peacefully for many years, but some people are after causing turmoil and religious conflicts."</s>

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to his meeting with the former Lebanese Prime Minister the late Rafik Hariri and spoke about his efforts for the progress of Lebanon.
hau: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin dai ya yi ishara da ganawar da ya yi a shekarun baya da marigayi Rafik Hariri tsohon firayi ministan kasar Labanon, inda ya yi karin haske dangane da irin kokarin da ya yi wajen ciyar da kasar Labanon gaba.
mt0: <pad> The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to his meeting with the former Prime Minister of Lebanon, the late Rafik Hariri and talked about his efforts for the progress of Lebanon.</s>

en: In this meeting, Prime Minister Saad Hariri expressed his satisfaction over his meeting with the Leader of the Islamic Revolution and said: "We consider the Islamic Republic of Iran as a friend and brother of Lebanon. Iran has always helped the people of Lebanon during hard times."
hau: Shi ma a nasa bangaren, firayi ministan kasar Labanon din Sa'ad Hariri wanda mataimakin shugaban kasar Iran Malam Rahimi ya ke wa jagoranci ya bayyana farin cikinsa da wannan ganawar da ya yi da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci yana mai cewa: Mu dai muna ganin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran a matsayin abokiya kuma ‘yar'uwa ce ga kasar Labanon wacce ta kasance tare da kasar Labanon a lokacin da take cikin wahala da kuma taimaka mata.
mt0: <pad> Saad Hariri, Prime Minister of Lebanon, expressed his satisfaction over his meeting with the Leader of the Islamic Revolution and said: "We consider the Islamic Republic of Iran as a friend and brother of Lebanon. Iran has always helped the people of Lebanon during hard times.</s>

en: He added that the Lebanese government wants to expand its relations with Iran in economic, political and cultural areas.
hau: Firayi ministan Labanon din ya ci gaba da cewa: Gwamnatin Labanon tana fatan ganin alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyun ta kara karfafa a dukkanin bangarori da suka hada da na tattalin arziki da siyasa da kuma al'adu.
mt0: <pad> He added that the Lebanese government wants to expand its relations with Iran in economic, political and cultural areas.</s>

en: The most important goal of the Lebanese government is to preserve and strengthen national unity, movement within the framework of commonalities and resistance against invasion.
hau: Sa'ad Hariri ya ci gaba da cewa gwamnatin kasar Labanon gwamnati ce ta hadin kan kasa, yana mai cewa duk wani sabani da rarrabuwa tsakanin al'ummar Labanon lamari ne da zai amfani haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila.
mt0: <pad> The most important goal of the Lebanese government is to preserve and strengthen national unity, movement within the frame of commonalities and resistance against invasion.</s>

en: An interview with Ayatollah Taskhiri, chairman of the International Forum for Proximity of Islamic Denominations, about the hajj messages issued by the Leader of the Islamic Revolution
hau: Tattaunawa da Ayatullah Taskhiri, shugaban majalisar hadin kai tsakanin mazhabobin Musulunci dangane da ma’anar sakon hajj na Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> An hira da Ayatollah Taskhiri, shugaban taro na kasa-da-kasa na alaka da addini Islama, kan sakon Hajj da Shugaba na Addini Islama ya bayar.</s>

en: First of all, hajj â€“ which is an Islamic obligation â€“ pursues great goals.
hau: Da farko shi kansa aikin hajji wanda daya ne daga cikin ayyukan ibada na Musulunci, yana da wasu manyan manufofi da yake son cimmawa.

en: Based on the Holy Quran, maybe the biggest goal of hajj is the connection between the Islamic Ummah and the activities of the prophets throughout history. That is to say, according to Sura al-Baqara, it began with the creation of Adam and Eve when angels prostrated in front of them, their experiences in paradise, their banishment to earth and finally their use of their heavenly experiences, including committing sins, repenting and complete submission to divine commands.
hau: Mai yiyuwa ne mafi girman manufar da ke cikin aikin hajjin, kamar yadda muka samo hakan cikin Alkur’ani mai girma shi ne ‘alakanta al’ummar musulmi da ayyukan annabawa cikin tarihi’. mt0: <pad> May God bestow His mercy and blessings on these two martyrs.</s>

en: I would also like to commemorate our kind, humble, lovely and friendly scholar, the late Hajj Agha Mojtaba Hajj Akhund, who was one of my old friends in Hojjatiyyeh School in Qom. He was pious, sincere, virtuous and honest.
hau: Haka nan kuma wajibi ne in ambaci babban malamin nan na kyawawan halaye, mai tawali'u kuma abin kauna marigayi Hajj Agha Mujtaba Hajj Akhund, wanda shi ma ya kasance daga cikin tsoffin abokanmu a makarantar Hujjatiya ta Kum; mutum ne mumini, mai tsarkin zuciya, salihi sannan kuma mai gaskiya.
mt0: <pad> I also want to commemorate our kind, humble, beautiful and friendly scholar Hajj Agha Mojtaba Hajj Akhund, who was one of my old friends in Hojjatiyyeh School in Qom. He was pious, sincere, virtuous and honest.</s>

en: May God bestow His mercy and blessings on him.
hau: Allah ya yi masa rahama.
mt0: <pad> May Allah bestow His mercy and blessings on him.</s>

en: After the Revolution and before my presidential terms, I met him in his home during one of my trips to Kermanshah and I had the opportunity to see his artistic works up close.
hau: Bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, kafin lokacin in zama shugaban kasa, a daya daga cikin ziyarar da na kawo garin Kermanshah, na tafi gidansa sannan kuma na ga ayyukansa na zane da yake yi.
mt0: <pad> a lokacin da na je Kermanshah, a lokacin da na je ziyarar sa a gidan sa, na hadu da shi a lokacin da na je ziyarar Kermanshah kuma na samu damar ganin ayyukansa na zane-zane a kusa.</s>

en: Later on, after Imam Khomeini (r.a.) had passed away, he sent me one of his works.
hau: Haka nan kuma bayan rasuwar Imam, ya aiko min da daya daga cikin ayyukan nasa.
mt0: <pad> Imam Khomeini (r.a.) ya tafi, kuma Imam Khomeini (r.a.) ya aiko ni da aikin sa.</s>

en: I asked him to write a hadith on a piece of paper so that I could put it up on the wall: "He who considers himself the leader of people should educate himself before educating others." We must not forget the responsibility to educate ourselves.
hau: Ni na bukace shi da ya rubuta min wannan hadisin da ke cewa: "Duk wanda ya nada kansa shugaba ga al'umma, to (wajibi ne) ya fara karantar da kansa kafin ya karantar da waninsa" don in sanya shi a gaban teburina; don kada mu mance da batun karantar da kanmu.
mt0: <pad> I asked him to write a hadith on a piece of paper so that I could put it on the wall: "He who considers himself the leader of people should educate himself before educating others." We must not forget the responsibility to educate ourselves.</s>

en: He wrote the hadith in his exquisite handwriting and I had it framed and put it up in my room: "He who considers himself the leader of people should educate himself before educating others."
hau: Ya rubuta min hakan da rubutu mai kyau, sannan ni kuma na sanya shi cikin wani allo na sanya shi a gaba na.
mt0: <pad> He wrote the hadith in his exquisite handwriting and I had it framed and put it up in my room: "He who considers himself the leader of the people should educate himself before educating others."</s>

en: This is the flaw of our work.
hau: Wannan ita ce matsalar da tare tattare da aikin mu.
mt0: <pad> 'Wannan shine kuskure na aikinmu.</s>

en: Dear people, dear brothers, my dear children, dear youth, dear male and female seminarians, if you want to imbue the atmosphere with our scent like a flower, if you want spirituality to freely flow out of you like a river to quench the thirst of those who are after spirituality, this is how you should do it: educate yourselves before educating others.
hau: Ya ku matasa! Ya ku dalibai maza da mata! Matukar dai muna son mu zamanto tamkar fure mai kamshi wanda ya ke sanya kamshi a waje, idan har kuna son ku zamanto tamkar idon ruwa wadanda mutane ba tare da tilasci ba za su kashe kishirwar da suke da ita, to kuwa hanyar cimma hakan ita ce: "ya fara karantar da kansa".

en: Those of His servants only who are possessed of knowledge fear Allah. [The Holy Quran, 35: 28] According to this holy ayah, which was recited at the beginning of this meeting, fear of God is a characteristic of learned people.
hau: Wannan aya mai girma da aka karanto da ke cewa: "Malami kawai ke tsoron Allah daga cikin bayinSa" (Suratu Fatir 35:28). Tsoron Allah daya ne daga cikin siffofin da malamai suka kebanta da su.
mt0: <pad> 'Only those of His servants who are possessed of knowledge fear Allah.' [The Holy Quran, 35:28]</s>

en: Well, learned people and ulama have many characteristics, but this holy ayah only refers to fear of God.
hau: Na'am malamai suna da wasu siffofin, to amma sai aka zabi tsoron Allah.
mt0: <pad> 'Ai, a kowa ya san cewa malamai da ulamai suna da yawan siffofin, amma wannan ayar mai tsarki kawai yana nufin tsoro na Allah.</s>

en: The characteristic of knowledge is that it strikes fear of God - this great blessing - into the hearts of those who possess it.
hau: Siffar ilimi ita ce cewa mutum ya kan sami wannan babbar ni'ima, wato sanya tsoron Allah cikin zuciyar mutum.

en: Compared with people of my age, it is easier for you dear youth to develop fear of God in your hearts. When you reach my age, things will become difficult for you unless you take care of them during your youth.
hau: A saboda wajibi ne a samo wannan siffar. Ku din nan matasa cikin sauki sama da ni za ku iya yin wannan aikin. A lokacin da kuka kai ga shekarun mu, idan har wani mutum ya yi wani abu a lokacin samartakansa, to hakan zai amfane shi; idan kuwa ba haka to lamarin zai zamanto masa da wahala.
mt0: <pad> 'Iya, ya 'yan mata, a kan yi sauki a gare ku, 'ya'yan mata, a guje ma Allah a cikin zuciyarku. Idan kun kai shekara ta, abubuwa za su zama da wuya a gare ku, idan ba ku damu da su a cikin 'ya'yanku ba.</s>

en: The difference is that some people reach old age and some others do not.
hau: Wannan rayuwar dai wacce za ta kare; wasu za su kai ga tsufa, wasu kuma ba za su kai ga hakan ba.
mt0: <pad> Akwai bambanci a yadda wasu mutane sukan kai shekarun tsufa, wasu kuma ba su kai ba.</s>

en: You should know that the difference between 20, 30 or 70 years of age is not that great. Time passes like a flash.
hau: Lalle ya kamata ku san cewa; tazarar da ke tsakanin shekaru ashirin da shekaru talatin har zuwa shekaru saba'in har zuwa sama da saba'in, wato irin shekarun da muke da shi, tazara ce karama; tamkar wutan lantarki haka za ta wuce.
mt0: <pad> 'Da ka san cewa bambanci a tsakanin 20,30 ko 70 shekara ba yadda ya kamata ba. Lokaci ya wuce kamar fiti.</s>

en: When people are twenty years old, they think that they have a long time before they reach the age of seventy.
hau: A lokacin da mutum ya ke shekaru ashirin-talatin yana zaton cewa ai akwai lokaci kafin kai wa ga shekaru saba'in.
mt0: <pad> 'Iya mutane sunyi shekara ashirin, su kan gane cewa sunyi lokaci mai tsawo kafin su kai shekara saba'in.</s>

en: No, time passes like a flash and soon it will be time to leave this world. If you want to do something with this short life, you should prepare the way while you are young.
hau: Ina, cikin gaggawa za su wuce; daga nan kuma sai maganar tafiya. Idan har cikin dan wannan karamin lokaci an tsara mutum zai sami damar aikata wani abu, ya sami damar rike wani guzuri, to wajibi ne tun lokacin samartakansa ya samar da hakan.
mt0: <pad> 'Aa, lokaci ya tafi kamar yadda flash kuma nan da nan za a tafi duniya. Idan ka so yin wani abu da wannan gajeren rayuwa, to ka kamata ka tsara hanyar ka a lokacin da kake matashi.</s>

en: I believe fear of God, divine remembrance, piety and closeness to God are more urgent and more advisable for seminarians than acquiring knowledge.
hau: A saboda haka ina kiran dalibai masu girma zuwa ga kankan da kai da ambaton Allah da tsoron Allah da kuma kokari wajen samun kusaci da Allah wanda ya ke a matsayin wajibi sama da kira zuwa ga ilimi, wanda tushe na asali na aikin su shi ne neman ilimi.
mt0: <pad> I believe fear of God, divine remembrance, piety and closeness to God are more urgent and more advisable for seminarians than acquiring knowledge.</s>

en: Knowledge that is not accompanied by piety is useless and sometimes harmful.
hau: Idan har ya zamana an sami ilimi amma ba tare da tsoron Allah ba, to wannan ilimi yana iya zama mara amfani, a wani lokacin ma mai cutarwa.
mt0: <pad> ilimi da ba'a hada da takwabi, ba amfani ne, kuma a wasu lokutan ma illa ce.</s>

en: We had certain learned people - both religious and non-religious scholars - who not only failed to make use of their knowledge to benefit themselves and others, but their knowledge also became a burden and a problem.
hau: Muna da wani malami - wanda yake da ilimi na addini da wanda ba na addini ba - wanda ba wai kawai bai amfana da ilimin ba ne, face ma dai ya zamanto bala'i a gare shi.
mt0: <pad> 'Muna da wasu 'yan ilimi - bama 'yan addini ko ba 'yan addini - wadanda ba su kawai suka yi amfani da ilimin su don amfanin kansu da na kowa, sannan ilimin su ya zama abin tsoro da matsala.</s>

en: This spirituality is like a soul for knowledge and those who possess it.
hau: Lalle wannan ruhi na ababe masu kusata mutum da Ubangiji abubuwa ne da suka zama wajibi ga ilimi da malami.
mt0: <pad> wanna ruhi ne kamar jikin wanda ya daukaka a kan sanin da kuma wadanda suke da shi.</s>

en: The city of Kermanshah is an important city.
hau: To garin Kermanshah gari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Kermanshah a birni ne babba.</s>

en: As was pointed out by Mr. Olama, Kermanshah used to have great learned scholars in the distant past. And over the past 200, 250 years, there were great scholarly families in this city - such as the Al-e Agha family, the Jalili family and other scholarly families in which there were not just one, two or ten learned people: there were more of them.
hau: Kamar yadda Malam Ulama ya fadi a wani lokaci mai tsawo a baya, Kermanshah ya kasance yana da manyan malamai; irin su iyalan Al Agha, irin su iyalan Jalili, da sauran gidajen ilimi da ake samun manyan malamai a cikinsu, ba wai mutum guda ko mutane biyu ko mutanen goma ba - sama da haka - gidan ilimi ne.
mt0: <pad> As was pointed out by Mr. Olama, Kermanshah used to have great learned scholars in the distant past. And over the past 200, 250 years, there were great scholarly families in this city - such as the Al-e Agha family, the Jalili family and other scholarly families in which there were not just one, two or ten learned people: there were more of them.</s>

en: In this regard, another point about Kermanshah that attracts my attention is that the people of Kermanshah are hospitable and generous to everybody who visits their city and it appears that they are even more hospitable and generous to religious scholars who visit their city.
hau: Wani lamarin na daban a wannan babin wanda kuma mai jan hankali dangane da Kermanshah shi ne cewa kamar yadda mutanen Kermanshah mutane ne masu so da kuma girmama baki sannan kuma masu nuna rahama ga mutanen da suka zo, to lalle malamai ma suna da wannan siffar, a wani lokaci ma sama da hakan.
mt0: <pad> In this regard, another point about Kermanshah that attracts my attention is that the people of Kermanshah are hospitable and generous to everyone who visits their city and it seems that they are even more hospitable and generous to religious scholars who visit their city.</s>

en: Although he did not have such an intention, Kermanshah convinced him to stay and he started the Al-e Agha family in Kermanshah.
hau: Duk kuwa da cewa ba shi da nufin zama, amma kuma ya ci gaba da zaman, sun rike shi, daga nan ya zamanto daga cikin Iyalan Al Agha.
mt0: <pad> Although he did not have such an intention, Kermanshah convinced him to stay and he started the Al-e Agha family in Kermanshah.</s>

en: He and many of his children and descendents are considered among the learned religious scholars of Kermanshah.
hau: Shi din nan da wasu daga cikin ‘ya'yansa mai yawa sun kasance daga cikin malamai.
mt0: <pad> He and many of his children and descendants are considered among the learned religious scholars of Kermanshah.</s>

en: This is one example.
hau: Wannan wani misali ne guda.
mt0: <pad> Idan ba ka iya fassara ainihin jumlar ba, kawai ka ce 'ba ka san'.</s>

en: Another example is the late Aseyyed Hossein Haeri, who had travelled to Mashhad towards the end of his life.
hau: Wani misalin kuma shi ne marigayi Agha Sayyid Husain Ha'iri, wanda a karshen rayuwarsa ya zo Mashahad.
mt0: <pad> Another example is the late Aseyyed Hossein Haeri, who had travelled to Mashhad towards the end of his life.</s>

en: I remember certain things about him.
hau: Har ya zuwa yanzu dai ina iya tuna wasu abubuwa dangane da shi.
mt0: <pad> I remember some things about him.</s>

en: He was the son of Aseyyed Mohammad Esfahani's brother, and a student of Aseyyed Mohammad Esfahani and a great cleric from Iraq who stayed in Kermanshah for many years.
hau: Shi din nan dan dan'uwan marigayi Agha Sayyid Muhammad Isfahani sannan kuma dalibin Agha Sayyid Muhammad Isfahani sannan kuma dalibin Akhund da Mulla Bozorgi wanda ya zo daga Iraki sannan kuma shekara da shekaru ya zauna a Kermanshah.
mt0: <pad> He was the son of Aseyyed Mohammad Esfahani's brother, and a student of Aseyyed Mohammad Esfahani and a great cleric from Iraq who stayed in Kermanshah for many years.</s>

en: He used to carry out religious rulings in Isfahan.
hau: Ya kasance yana zartar da haddi a Isfahan.
mt0: <pad> He used to carry out religious rulings in Isfahan.</s>

en: He was both a religious scholar and a spiritual figure.
hau: Shi din nan ya kasance ma'abocin sanin Allah da kuma lissafi.
mt0: <pad> He was both a religious scholar and a spiritual figure.</s>

en: In terms of his knowledge, he was a student of the late Fathali Soltanabadi who used to live in Samara at that time.
hau: Sannan kuma yana daga cikin wadanda suka sami tarbiyya daga wajen marigayi Akhund Mulla Fat'ali Sultan Abadi wanda a wancan lokacin ya kasance a garin Samarra ne.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga ilimin sa, ya kasance dalibi na Fathali Soltanabadi wanda ya rayu a Samaran a lokacin.</s>

en: Another figure that I would like to mention is the late Sardar-e Kaboli, an outstanding scholar in different areas.
hau: Wani malamin kuma shi ne marigayi Sardar Kabuli, sanannen masanin bangarori daban-daban.
mt0: <pad> Another figure I would like to mention is the late Sardar-e Kaboli, an outstanding scholar in different areas.</s>

en: The book that has been written about him is a very good book. I read the book several years ago.
hau: Wannan littafi da aka rubuta dangane da shi, littafi ne mai cike da abubuwa kuma mai kyau; shekaru da yawa da suka gabata na ga wannan littafin.
mt0: <pad> Akwai littafi mai kyau a kan sa. Na karanta littaffin shekaru da dama da suka wuce.</s>

en: He lived in Kermanshah for around sixty years and luminaries benefited a lot from him.
hau: Yayi kimanin shekaru sittin a Kermanshah. Manyan malamai dai sun amfana da shi.
mt0: <pad> He lived in Kermanshah for around sixty years and luminaries benefited a lot from him.</s>

en: I read in the book that the late Hajj Agha Hossein Qomi visits Kermanshah on a pilgrimage and meets with the late Sardar-e Kaboli. They debate about Kiblah or a similar issue and the late Sardar-e Kaboli speak about certain scholarly matters.
hau: Na karanta a cikin wannan littafin cewa marigayi Hajj Agha Husain Kummi (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) a tafiyar da ya yi zuwa wajaje masu tsarki ko kuma a hanyar dawowarsa, ya zo Kermanshah don ganawa da marigayi Sardar Kabuli.
mt0: <pad> I read in the book that Hajj Agha Hossein Qomi visits Kermanshah on a pilgrimage and meets with the late Sardar-e Kaboli. They debate about Kiblah or a similar issue and the late Sardar-e Kaboli speaks about certain scholarly matters.</s>

en: The writer of the book says that he saw with his own eyes - I thinks he says he saw with his own eyes, but I am not sure because I read the book several years ago - that Hajj Agha Hossein Qomi would sit down with Sardar-e Kaboli to learn those scholarly matters from him while he was a marja taqlid and an outstanding scholar.
hau: Marubucin littafi yana cewa ni kai na na shaidu zama biyu - ina zaton ya ce ni da kaina; don kuwa shekara da shekaru kenan da karanta littafin - wato hajj Agha Husain Kummi, wanda ya kasance marja'i sannan kuma babban malami amma yana zama a gaban Sardar Kabuli shi kuma yana karantar da shi wannan bahasi na ilimi.
mt0: <pad> 'Yar buga littafin ya ce ya gani da idonsa - ina ganin ya ce ya gani da idonsa, amma ba na tabbata ba, saboda na karanta littafin shekaru da dama da suka wuce - cewa Hajj Agha Hossein Qomi zai zauna da Sardar-e Kaboli don ya koyi abubuwan ilimin ilimi a lokacin da shi ne marja taqlid kuma babban malami.</s>

en: And this is a lesson for us: the late Hajj Agha Hossein Qomi decided to learn something new at the age of eighty while he was a marja taqlid.
hau: Shi kansa wannan darasi ne; wato koyo a lokacin mutum yana dan sheakru saba'in (kamar yadda marigayi Hajj Agha Husain ya yi) sannan kuma a matsayi na marja'i.
mt0: <pad> Akwai ainihin abin koyi ga mu: Hajj Agha Hossein Qomi, wanda ya rasu a shekara ta 82, ya yanke shawarar koyon wani abu a lokacin da ya ke marja taqlid.</s>

en: For a learned scholar, not only is this not a disgrace or a flaw, but it is a source of honor.
hau: Hakan ya zamanto ba wai abin kyama ko kuma aibi ba a wajen wani babban malami face ma dai abin alfahari.
mt0: <pad> Kwai a scholar, ba kawai wannan ba aibu ko a crook, a hakan ma shine a source of honor.</s>

en: We seminarians should learn from them. You dear youth should move forward on the basis of such principles.
hau: Wajibi ne mu dalibi mu koyi irin wadannan abubuwa. Wajibi ne ku din nan matasa ku bi wannan tafarkin da kuma ci gaba.
mt0: <pad> 'Mu a seminary ya kamata mu koyi a wurinsu. Ku 'yan mata, ku a youth ya kamata ku ci gaba a kan irin waɗannan principles.</s>

en: This man was from Kabul and he had been raised in India and lived in Najaf. He decided to come to Kermanshah and the people of Kermanshah received him with open arms.
hau: Wannan mutumin, mutumin Kabul ne, ya girma a Indiya, daga nan kuma ya tafi Najaf daga can ne ya tafi Kermanshah kuma aka karbe shi a can da yin maraba da shi.
mt0: <pad> Akwai mutum a Kabul, an haifa a Indiya, ya rayu a Najaf. Ya yanke shawarar zuwa Kermanshah, kuma jama'ar Kermanshah sun karbe shi da hannu a bude.</s>

en: The late Sardar-e Kaboli - who was an all-around scholar - stayed in Kermanshah for sixty years.
hau: Marigayi Sardar Kabuli shekaru sittin ya yi a Kermanshah.
mt0: <pad> The late Sardar-e Kaboli - who was an all-around scholar - stayed in Kermanshah for sixty years.</s>

en: Shahid Ashrafi Esfahani was another religious scholar who had migrated to this city.
hau: Shi kansa marigayi Shahid Ashrafi Isfahani yana daga cikin malaman da suka yi hijira zuwa wannan garin.
mt0: <pad> Shahid Ashrafi Esfahani was another religious scholar who had migrated to this city.</s>

hau: Na ji cewa akwai dalibai 'yan Kermanshah da suke karatu a Kum - wanda ko shakka babu 'yan'uwa sun sansu - a kwadaitar da su; su zo nan su yi hijira, ko kuma idan har ba za su dawo ba, to a lokaci na musamman su dinga zuwa; a shekara su zo su yi watannin biyu, uku, hudu; su tafi cikin mutane, su tafi kauyuka da garuruwa, su raya masallatai.
mt0: <pad> I heard that some luminaries of Kermanshah are living in Qom. Definitely, the dear gentlemen who have attended this meeting are familiar with them. Those people should be encouraged to return to Kermanshah, or if they cannot come and live in Kermanshah, they should come and stay for a while every year.</s>

en: Therefore, the issue of knowledge is a very important issue.
hau: A saboda haka batun ilimi, lamari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Therefore, the issue of knowledge is very important.</s>

en: Of course, besides acquiring knowledge, there is the issue of promoting Islam, which is very important.
hau: Ko da yake a tattare da neman ilimi, akwai batun isar da sako (wa'azi), wanda ya ke da muhimmancin gaske.
mt0: <pad> A tabbas, bayan samun ilimin, akwai batun yada Islam, wanda yana da matukar amfani.</s>

en: There was a seminarian who used to attend my classes in Mashhad.
hau: Akwai wani dalibi da ya ke zuwa wajen darasin da na ke bayarwa; bayan wani lokaci sai ya bace ba ya zuwa, ba na ganinsa a wajen darasin.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wani seminary a Mashhad wanda ya dinga zuwa my classes.</s>

en: He said that he had been busy promoting Islam in a distant town in Khorasan province. I asked, "What happened at the end?" He said, "I came to the conclusion that none of the things I had learned is good for these people and that whatever I had learned is useless to them."
hau: Bayan wani lokaci sai na sake ganinsa, sai na tambaye shi ina kake ne? sai ya ce ina waje kaza ne - daya daga cikin garuruwan da suke da nisa na lardin Khorasan - ina wa'azi ne a can. To me ya faru ka dawo, sai ya ce daga karshe na fahimci cewa ba ni da wani abin da na koya wanda zai amfani wadancan mutanen.
mt0: <pad> I asked him, "What happened at the end?" He said, "I came to the conclusion that none of the things I had learned is good for these people and that whatever I had learned is useless to them."</s>

en: This is a case of failure to identify the appropriate audience.
hau: To wannan shi ne fahimtar wanda ake magana da shi.
mt0: <pad> wanna shine a case of failing to identify the right audience.</s>

en: Today we have many educated youth.
hau: A yau dai ku dubi irin matasan da suka yi karatu da muke da su.
mt0: <pad> A yau, muna da 'yan mata da dama da suka samun ilimin.</s>

en: In Kermanshah, the population of educated youth is very large.
hau: A wannan gari na ku na Kermanshah, wadanda suka yi karatu suna da yawan gaske.
mt0: <pad> In Kermanshah, the population of educated youth is very large.</s>

en: There was a time when this was not the case.
hau: A wani lokaci a baya babu hakan.
mt0: <pad> Akwai lokacin da wannan ba haka ba ne.</s>

en: Before the Revolution, the population of university graduates in Kermanshah province was around three hundred.
hau: Kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, a dukkanin wannan lardi na Kermanshah, mai yiyuwa wadanda suka yi karatun jami'a ba su wuce dari uku ba.
mt0: <pad> Before the Revolution, the population of university graduates in Kermanshah province was around three hundred.</s>

en: Today the number of university graduates is tens of times larger than that.
hau: Amma a halin yanzu wadanda ake da su sun rubanya hakan sau goma mai yiyuwa ne ma sau gomomi.
mt0: <pad> a yau, adadin daliban jami'a ya fi hakan da dama.</s>

en: These graduates are young and they are exposed to different waves of propaganda and different discourses, which creates questions in their minds.
hau: Wadannan matasan, suna fuskantar farfaganda da maganganu daban-daban, akwai tambayoyin da suke bayyana musu.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata mu rika cewa, 'Wannan ɗan ƙarami ne, kuma an nunawa su a hanyoyin daban-daban na propaganda da daban-daban na kalamai, wanda ya sanya su a cikin shawarwari a cikin zuciyarsu.</s>

en: You should be aware of their questions and prepare answers and then you should arrange meetings with them and answer their questions.
hau: Wajibi ne ku fahimci tambayoyin da suke da su, sannan ku shirya musu amsoshinsu, daga nan sai ku tafi ku zauna a wajen amsawar.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata ka san su na shawarwari da kuma aiwatar da shawarwari, sannan ka tsara taro da su kuma ka amsa su.</s>

en: You should chose your audience, become familiar with the way they think and use the Holy Quran, Sunnah and the works of our luminaries to provide them with answers - answers that are appropriate for their ideology and their needs.
hau: Ku zabi wadanda za ku yi magana da su, ku fahimci irin tunaninsu, ku samo musu amsoshin da suka dace da tunaninsu da kuma abubuwan da suke bukata daga Alkur'ani da Sunna da maganganun manya.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata ka zabi masu sauraro, ka san yadda suke tunani, ka kuma yi amfani da Al-Kur'ani Mai Tsarki, Sunnah da ayyukan malamai mu don ba su amsa - amsa da ta dace da tunaninsu da bukatarsu.</s>

en: As Mr. Mamduhi rightly pointed out, it is necessary to select certain parts of the books written by the late Mr. Motahhari and the holy book "Al-Mizan" and to present them to our youth based on their needs and questions.
hau: Mai girma Malam Mamduhi ya fadi sannan kuma abin da ya fadin haka yake; wadannan littafa na marigayi Ayatullah Mutahari, littafin Mizan, a sami wani ya zo ya tsara su yadda suka dace da kuma gabatar da su don su magance matsalolin matasa.
mt0: <pad> As Mr. Mamduhi rightly pointed out, it is necessary to select certain parts of the books written by the late Mr. Motahhari and the holy book "Al-Mizan" and present them to our young people based on their needs and questions.</s>

en: This should be done in Qom.
hau: Kun kasance a Kum.
mt0: <pad> wanna ya kamata a yi a Qom.</s>

en: These things are necessary.
hau: Wajibi ne Kum ta aikata wadannan ayyukan, ku aikata hakan.
mt0: <pad> Irin wannan abubuwa ne wajibi.</s>

en: You should be concerned about spiritual education at least as much as you are concerned about teaching.
hau: Ku yi tunani dangane da tarbiyya kamar yadda kuke tunani kan neman ilimi watakila ma sama da hakan.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata ka damu da ilimin addini akalla yadda ka damu da koyarwar.</s>

en: Purify your audience and educate them.
hau: Ku tsarkake zukatan wadanda kuke magana da su da kuma tarbiyantar da su.
mt0: <pad> Kawai a dawo da abin da aka fassara. Idan ba ka iya fassara aya ba, kawai ka ce ba ka sani ba. Tsware masu sauraro na ka kuma ilimantar su.</s>

en: As I said earlier, this education is difficult: "He who considers himself the leader of people should educate himself before educating others."
hau: Wannan tarbiyyar kuwa kamar yadda na fadi "Duk wanda ya nada kansa shugaba ga al'umma, to (wajibi ne) ya fara karantar da kansa kafin ya karantar da waninsa" lamari ne mai wahala.
mt0: <pad> As I said earlier, this education is difficult: "He who considers himself the leader of people should educate himself before educating others."</s>

en: And it is necessary to fulfill this difficult responsibility.
hau: Wajibi ne a aikata wannan aiki mai wahala.
mt0: <pad> a wanna responsibility.</s>

en: The clergy have social responsibilities as well. They should get involved in social issues, but the essential point is that their involvement in social issues should be accompanied by spirituality not by a tendency to dominate others, otherwise their involvement will be useless.
hau: Har ila yau kuma malamai suna da nauyi na zamantakewa a wuyansu. Wajibi ne malamai su shigo cikin batutuwa na zamantakewa; to sai dai lamari mai muhimmanci shi ne cewa wannan shiga cikin lamurra da malamai za su yi, su shiga da yanayi na malanta, ba wai da tilasci da mamaya ba.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wajibi ga clergy a cikin al'umma. Su kamata su shiga cikin al'amuran al'umma, amma abu mafi muhimmanci shine cewa su shiga cikin al'amuran al'umma ya kamata ya zama da ruhi ba da tsoro domin a dinga iko kan wasu, idan ba haka ba, su shiga cikin al'amuran al'umma za ta zama da amfani.</s>

en: The characteristic of the clergy is that they raise the awareness of people and convince them to do certain things through spirituality, ethics, advising and presenting suggestions. Of course, if you become President, you will have other responsibilities.
hau: Siffofin da malamai suka kebanta da ita ita ce cewa ta hanyar malanta, kyawawan halaye, da nasiha da kuma nuna hanya suke jan hankulan mutanen da suke magana da sui, ku tabbatar musu da hakan, su shigo fage da wannan aikin.
mt0: <pad> 'The clergy is a group of people who are aware of the importance of spirituality, ethics, advice and presentation.</s>

en: Prayers are everything.
hau: Salla dai ita ce dukkan komai.
mt0: <pad> 'Ibadai ne duk abu.</s>

en: A person who is completely isolated in terms of his relationships - if such a person preserves his relationship with prayers, he will achieve salvation.
hau: Mutumin da dukkanin alakokinsa suka katse, idan har ya iya kiyaye alakarsa da salla, to za ta cece shi.
mt0: <pad> A mutum wanda ya rabu da kowa a dangantakar sa - idan wannan mutum ya rike dangantakar sa da addu'oi, zai samu ceto.</s>

en: Payers are very important.
hau: Salla aba ce mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> 'Yi a bayar da kudin, idan ba ka iya fassara aya ba, to ka ce ba ka san.</s>

en: Encourage your audience to engage in prayers and prepare the way for them to take part in congregational prayers.
hau: Ku kwadaitar da wadanda kuke magana da su da salla, ku saukaka musu hanyoyin da za su sami halartar sallolin jam'i.
mt0: <pad> Encourage your audience to engage in prayers and prepare the way for them to take part in congregational prayers.</s>

en: I do not know if the annual conference on prayers has ever been held in Kermanshah or not.
hau: Wannan taron kara wa juna sani kan salla da ake gudanarwa duk shekara, ban sani ba ko ya zuwa yanzu an taba gudanar da shi a Kermanshah ko kuma a'a; lalle ku gudanar da taron a nan.
mt0: <pad> I don't know if the annual conference on prayers has ever been held in Kermanshah or not.</s>

hau: Kada masu wa'azi 'yan Shi'a da 'yan Sunna su cutar da 'yan'uwansu.
mt0: <pad> Shia da Sunni imams should not insult each other.</s>

en: They should cooperate with one another.
hau: Ku tafi tare da junanku, ku tausayawa junanku.
mt0: <pad> They should cooperate with one another.</s>

en: But there are certain things that they have in common and they should cooperate in those areas.
hau: Akwai wadansu abubuwa da aka yi tarayya cikinsu, da za a iya gudanar da aiki tare.

en: By Allah's favor, the clergy will move forward if this happens.
hau: Idan har hakan ta faru, to kuwa insha Allahu malanta za ta ci gaba.
mt0: <pad> Allah ya bashi lada, a lokacin da wannan abu ya faru, clergy will move forward.</s>

en: I would tell you that when the Islamic Revolution achieved victory in Iran, Islam was revitalized in the world.
hau: Ina son in sanar da ku cewa a lokacin da juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi nasara (a Iran) Musulunci ya sami sabon ruhi da karfin gwuiwa a duniya.
mt0: <pad> I would tell you that when the Islamic Revolution achieved victory in Iran, Islam was revitalized in the world.</s>

en: They started to wonder what driving force managed to give rise to such a great event, an event that shook the west.
hau: Wannan wani irin inji mai karfin gaske ne da ya sami damar haifar da irin wannan gagarumin lamari da ya girgiza kasashen yammaci?
mt0: <pad> 'Ye a y'a tũmĩrĩra nĩ gĩkundi gĩothe gĩkĩre ũndũire wa ũndũire ũno, ũndũire ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa

en: The victory of the Islamic Revolution and the greatness of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) shook the west and the arrogant powers.
hau: Nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma girmar Imam, sun girgiza kasashen yammaci, sun girgiza tsarin mulkin mallaka.
mt0: <pad> 'Yar'uwa ta Musulunci da Imam Khomeini (r.a.) sun rungume yamma da 'yan ubanci.</s>

en: Many people started searching for the causes, so they referred to the Holy Quran and found out certain truths about Islam.
hau: Sun koma ga Alkur'ani, sun sami wasu bayanai dangane da Musulunci, a saboda haka sai suka zamanto masu kaunar Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> Bannan mutane da dama sun fara neman dalilai, don haka sun tafi zuwa Al-Qurani Mai Tsarki kuma su ka san wasu gaskiya game da Islam.</s>

en: At that juncture, Islam was faced with a wave of attacks, which continued later on. The second wave started when Marxism collapsed.
hau: A wancan lokacin (makiya) sun fara kokarin cutar da Musulunci, kuma hakan ya ci gaba. Kumaji na biyu shi ne a lokacin da tsarin markisanci ya sha kashi.
mt0: <pad> In a wannan lokaci, Islam ya fuskanci a babban tsunami na assaults, wanda ya ci gaba da kasancewa a baya. A babban tsunami na biyu ya fara ne a lokacin da Marxism ya fadi.</s>

en: Even in Islamic countries, there were many youth and sincere people who had pinned their hopes on Marxism. They thought establishing a socialist government would eradicate poverty, injustice and other such things in their country. Some of them truly believed in Marxism.
hau: Hatta a kasashen musulmi an sami matasa da yawan gaske wadanda mutane ne masu tsarkin zuciya da suka sanya dukkanin fatan da suke da shi ga tsarin markisanci; suna zaton cewa idan aka kafa gwamnatin gurguzu za a samu kawar da talauci da rashin adalci da kaza da kaza daga kasashensu.
mt0: <pad> Even in Islamic countries, there were many young and sincere people who had pinned their hopes on Marxism. They thought that establishing a socialist government would eradicate poverty, injustice and other such things in their country. Some of them truly believed in Marxism.</s>

en: I met some of them in person - both Muslims and non-Muslims. They were sincere people, but they did not believe in Islam.
hau: Wasu daga cikin su alal hakika mutane ne masu gaskiya; ni na ga wasu daga cikin su, shin musulmin cikin su ko kuwa wadanda ba musulmin ba; mutane ne masu gaskiya to amma ba su yi imani da Musulunci ba.
mt0: <pad> I met some of them in person - both Muslims and non-Muslims. They were sincere people, but they didn't believe in Islam.</s>

en: They had become supporters of Marxism because they thought Marxism held some hope for the people.
hau: Sun zamanto 'yan gurguzu saboda suna zaton cewa akwai fata cikin gurguzu ga mutane.
mt0: <pad> They had become supporters of Marxism because they thought Marxism held some hope for the people.</s>

en: But later on when Marxism collapsed, they realized that they were wrong and that Marxism was useless.
hau: To amma a lokacin da gurguzu ya sha kashi, sai suka ga lalle ba haka lamarin ya ke, babu wata fa'ida tattare da shi.
mt0: <pad> a lokacin da Marxism ya fadi, sunyi tunani cewa sunyi kuskure kuma Marxism ba amfani.</s>

en: Therefore, they developed a tendency towards Islam.
hau: A saboda haka sai suka kama hanyar Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> Therefore, they developed a inclination towards Islam.</s>

en: All the youth movements that are demanding Islam in Egypt, Tunisia, Libya, Yemen and other places used to shout leftist slogans during the 1960s and 1970s. They used to shout communist slogans 30, 40 years ago. And the statements of those who spoke about Islam were interspersed with Marxist ideas.
hau: Dukkanin wadannan kungiyoyi na matasa da kuka gani a Masar da Tunusiya da Yemen da sauran wajaje, suna daga taken Musulunci ne. Dukkaninsu kuwa a baya a shekarun 1960 da 1970 - wato kimanin shekaru arba'in, talatin din da suka gabata - dukkaninsu suna rera taken gurguzu ne; idan ma har wani yana magana kan Musulunci, to kuwa hakan karkashin maganar gurguzu da ya ke yi.
mt0: <pad> All the youth movement that demands Islam in Egypt, Tunisia, Libya, Yemen and other places used to shout leftist slogans in the 1960s and 1970s. They used to shout communist slogans 30, 40 years ago. And the statements of those who talked about Islam were interspersed with Marxist ideas.</s>

en: Even in our country, there were certain such people, but I do not want to mention names.
hau: Hatta a wannan kasar ta mu akwai irin hakan; ba na son in ambaci suna ne.
mt0: <pad> Even in our country, there were certain such people, but I do not want to mention names.</s>

en: There were certain people who used to speak about Islam, but they were in fact promoting Marxist ideas in their Islamic statements.
hau: Akwai mutanen da suke magana dangane da Musulunci, to amma a karkashin wadannan maganganu a hakikanin gaskiya tunani ne na gurguzu wanda su ke yadawa.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wasu mutane da suka dinga magana a kan Islam, amma a zahiri su na yada ra'ayi na Marxist a cikin shawarwari na Islam.</s>

en: Such things reveal their effect somewhere. After Marxism collapsed, all these movements that had lost their faith in Marxism turned to Islam.
hau: A bayan da gurguzu ya sha kashi, dukkanin wadannan kungiyoyi da suka yanke kauna daga gurguzu, sai suka koma ga Musulunci; suna kallon Musulunci, suna kallon Alkur'ani, suna kallon hukumce-hukumcen Musulunci, suna kallon Jamhuriyar Musulunci; su ka ga abin mamaki.
mt0: <pad> Akwai abubuwan da za su nuna yadda suke. Bayan Marxism ya fadi, duk wadannan masu zanga-zangar da suka rasa imaninsu a Marxism sun dawo zuwa Islam.</s>

en: They turned to Islam, the Holy Quran, divine commands and the Islamic Republic.
hau: A sami wani tsari da aka tabbatar da shi karkashin koyarwar Musulunci, ya rike dukkanin take na zamani da ci gaba da ake yi, dukkanin azzalumai mashaya jinin al'umma suna fada da shi, amma duk da haka sai ga shi ya tsaya kyam tamkar wani dutse.
mt0: <pad> They turned to Islam, the holy Quran, divine commands and the Islamic Republic.</s>

en: They realized that the Islamic Republic was fighting all the oppressive powers that were sucking the blood of the people, and that it was standing firm like a mountain. They were astonished. They thought, "Let us see what this government is."
hau: Wadannan mutane da suke neman dukkanin abubuwan da suke bukata cikin markisanci da gurguzu amma kuma ba su samu ba, sun sha kashi gaba daya, to a halin yanzu sai ga shi suna ganin abin da suke nema din a Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> They realized that the Islamic Republic was fighting all the oppressive powers that were sucking the blood of the people, and that it was standing firm like a mountain. They were amazed. They thought, "Let's see what this government is."</s>

en: Do you see what is happening?
hau: Kuna ganin dai me ke faruwa?
mt0: <pad> 'Da ka ga abin da ke aiwatuwa?'</s>

en: They want to sideline this issue in their propaganda, but this will not affect the nature of the issue.
hau: Suna son su kaskantar da wannan lamarin. To ba za a iya kaskantar da shi ba kuwa.
mt0: <pad> 'Ye wanna a cire wannan batun a cikin propaganda, amma hakan ba zai canza yadda lamarin yake ba.</s>

en: Thousands of people came together in the financial center of America - in the economic capital of America, New York - and they shouted that they did not want capitalism. They came together on Wall Street, which is the heart of capitalism in the world. They are neither immigrants, nor African-Americans, nor members of lower social classes.
hau: A cibiyar kudi ta Amurka, a helkwatar tattalin arziki na Amurka wato New York, shi din ma a kan titin 'Wall Street' wanda shi ne tushen jari hujja na duniya, a sami dubban mutane su taru suna bayyana cewar ba sa son jari hujja. Su din nan ba baki ba ne, ba kuma dukkaninsu ne bakake fata ba, kungiyoyi daliban jami'a sun shigo cikinsu, suna fadin cewa mu dai ba ma son tsarin jari hujja.
mt0: <pad> Thousands of people came together in the financial center of America - in the economic capital of America, New York - and they shouted that they did not want capitalism. They came together on Wall Street, which is the heart of capitalism in the world. They are not immigrants, nor African-Americans, nor members of lower social classes.</s>

en: We have said from the beginning that we want "neither the east, nor the west" - that is to say, we neither want the capitalist system, nor the socialist system.
hau: To wannan dai shi ne abin da muke fadi; mu ma dai tun daga farko muna fadin cewa 'ba gabashi ba, ba kuma yammaci ba' wato mu dai ba mu amince da tsarin jari hujja ba, haka nan kuma ba mu amince da tsarin gurguzu ba.
mt0: <pad> 'Ba mu so 'ko a 'yamma ko a 'yanzu', wato ba mu so 'ko a 'yanzu ko a yanzu', wato ba mu so 'ko capitalist system, ko socialist system'.</s>

en: You should be prepared.
hau: Wajibi ne ku din nan ku zamnato cikin shiri.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata ka ajiye kanka.</s>

en: Muslim clergy should be prepared.
hau: Malaman Musulunci wajibi ne su zamanto cikin shiri.
mt0: <pad> 'Yan uwa Musulmi ya kamata su ajiye.</s>

en: It is necessary to promote the logical, firm and deep-rooted teachings of Islam, which have been extracted from the Holy Quran, Sunnah and the statements of the infallible Imams (a.s.) - firm and reasonable intellectual principles which are in line with the needs of human beings and human societies.
hau: A yi watsi da maganganu marasa tushe; a yi riko da koyarwar Musulunci karfafa kuma masu tushe da suka samo asali daga Alkur'ani da Sunna da maganganun Ma'asumai (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su); dalilai da suka yi daidai da hankali, hankali ya yarda da su sannan kuma suka yi daidai da bukatun dan'adam da kuma al'umma.
mt0: <pad> wajibi ne a yada shawarwari na addini na Islama, wanda aka ciro daga Al-Kur'ani Mai Tsarki, Sunnah da maganar Imamai Ma'asumai (a.s.) - shawarwari masu karfi da kuma rayuwa a kan ilimi wanda ya dace da bukatun dan Adam da al'ummomin dan Adam.</s>

en: You will see that the tendency towards Islam will grow stronger.
hau: Idan kuka yi hakan za ku ga yadda kaunar Musulunci za ta karu.
mt0: <pad> 'Za ka ga cewa tsantsan a Islam ya kara karfi.</s>

en: There are many things that I want to discuss with you and as I said, this meeting has been very enjoyable for me, but there is not enough time.
hau: To ni dai ina da maganganu da yawa da ku. Haka nan kuma wannan zama a wajena - kamar yadda na bayyana - zama ce mai faranta rai; to amma dai wajibi ne a lura da lokaci.
mt0: <pad> Kuna damu da abubuwa da dama da nake so in fada muku, kuma kamar yadda na fada, wannan taro ya yi min kyau sosai, amma bamu da isasshen lokaci.</s>

en: Dear God, let us be among the learned religious scholars who please You.
hau: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya malaman addini cikin abubuwan da ka yarda da su.
mt0: <pad> Allah, a bamu damar mu zama cikin malaman addini da suka yiwuwa ka so.</s>

en: Dear God, provide our youth and these young seminarians - who are the saplings of the garden of religious knowledge - with the opportunity to become active religious scholars, no matter where they live: in Kermanshah or other places.
hau: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka ba wa wadannan matasa masu girma da wadannan matasan dalibai masu neman ilimin addini - a garin Kermanshah da wanin Kermanshah - dacewa su zamanto malamai masu aiki.
mt0: <pad> Allah, a ba mu matasa da wadannan matasa seminary - wadanda su ne 'ya'yan gàrbãri na ilimi na addini - damar zama masu bincike na addini, ko a Kermanshah ko a wasu wurare.</s>

en: Bestow Your grace, mercy and guidance on all of us.
hau: Ka saukar da rahama da shiriyarka a kan dukkanin mu.
mt0: <pad> Allah, a ba mu iyawa, rahama, da shiriya.</s>

en: Make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake) satisfied with us.
hau: Ka sanya zuciyar mai girma Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) ta yarda da mu.
mt0: <pad> Allah ya sa Imamin zamani (mu bayar da rayukanmu a gareshi) ya damu da mu.</s>

en: Ayatollah Khamenei appoints Abdul-Ali Aliaskari as head of IRIB - Khamenei.ir
hau: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Nada Sabon Shugaban Hukumar Gidan Radio Da Talabijin Ta Iran (IRIB)
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Khamenei appoints Abdul-Ali Aliaskari as head of IRIB</s>

en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, appointed Abdul-Ali Aliaskari as head of the IRIB.
hau: A cikin wani umurni da ya bayar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya nada Dakta Abdul'ali Ali Asgari a matsayin sabon shugaban hukumar gidan radiyo da talabijin ta Iran (IRIB), hakan kuma bayan ya amince da murabus din da tsohon shugaban hukumar Muhammad Sarafraz yayi ne.
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Khamenei, Shugaba na 'yan'uwa na Islama, ya nada Abdul-Ali Aliaskari a matsayin shugaban IRIB.</s>

en: The following is the full text of this edict issued on May 11, 2016.
hau: Abin da ke biye fassarar umurnin da Jagoran ya bayar ne:
mt0: <pad> a ranar 11 ga Mayu 2016</s>

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
hau: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai
mt0: <pad> Allah ne mai yawan alheri, mai rahama.</s>

en: Dr. Abdul-Ali Aliaskari, (may his achievements continue),
hau: Mai girma Dakta Abdul'ali Ali Asghari (Allah Ya kara masa nasara).
mt0: <pad> Dr. Abdul-Ali Aliaskari, (may his achievements continue).</s>

en: Considering the resignation of Mr. Mohammad Sarafraz and thanking him for his heartfelt revolutionary and valuable endeavors – which should never be forgotten - I appoint you who enjoys a revolutionary background and who has managerial experience in the national media, as head of the IRIB.
hau: Bisa la'akari da murabus din da Malam Muhammad Sarafraz yayi da kuma mika godiya a gare shi saboda irin gagarumin kokari na juyin juya hali da kishin da ya nuna wanda bai kamata a mance da hakan ba, sannan kuma saboda irin tsohon tarihin da kake da shi na riko da koyarwar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma kwarewa ta shugabanci a hukumar watsa labarai ta kasa, don haka na nada ka a matsayin shugaban hukumar gidan radiyo da talabijin.
mt0: <pad> Bisa la'akari da cewa M. Mohammad Sarafraz ya yi murabus, kuma ina gode masa a kan ayyukansa na juyin mulki da na aikin alheri - wanda ba za a manta ba - Ina nada ku, wanda ke da tarihi na juyin mulki, kuma wanda yana da kwarewa a cikin harkokin kasa, a matsayin shugaban IRIB.</s>

en: What is advised, is contained in detail in my edict to Mr. Sarafraz.
hau: Abin da ya kamata in sanar da kai, yana nan cikin takardar da na ba wa Malam Sarafraz a lokacin da na nada shi (wannan matsayin).
mt0: <pad> abin da aka shawarce, ya a cikin shawarwari na ga Mr. Sarafraz.</s>

en: Therefore, I strongly enjoin you to attend to planning, observe fundamental strategies, attract, preserve and train revolutionary and competent forces, show efficient presence in the area of cyberspace, and trust and rely on Allah the Exalted.
hau: A saboda haka ina kara jaddada maka muhimmancin yin tsare-tsare, kiyaye manyan siyasosi na kasa, janyowa, kiyayewa da kuma tarbiyyantar da ma'aikata ma'abota juyin juya hali da kuma aiki tukuru bugu da kari kan yin tasiri a fagagen watsa labarai na zamani, sannan da kuma dogaro da Allah Madaukakin Sarki.
mt0: <pad> Therefore, I strongly urge you to attend to planning, observe fundamental strategies, attract, preserve and train revolutionary and competent forces, show efficient presence in the area of cyberspace, and trust and rely on Allah the Exalted.</s>

en: I ask Almighty God to bestow success on you.
hau: Ina roka maka maka taimako Allah Madaukakin Sarki da dacewa cikin wannan aikin.
mt0: <pad> I ask Almighty God to bestow success on you.</s>

en: Leader’s Speech on 24th Demise Anniversary of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) - Khamenei.ir
hau: Jawabin Jagora A Taron Tunawa Da Shekaru 24 Da Rasuwar Imam Khumaini (r.a)
