en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on June 4, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution on the occasion of the demise anniversary of Imam Khomeini (r.a.).
hau: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei a wajen taron tunawa da shekaru 24 da rasuwar marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a) da aka gudanar a hubbaren Imam din a ranar Talata 4, Yunin, 2013.
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Khamenei, Shugaban Islamic Revolution, ya yi wannan jawabi a ranar 4 ga watan Yuni 2013 a lokacin ranar haihuwar Imam Khomeini (r.a.).</s>

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
hau: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai
mt0: <pad> Allah ne mai yawan alheri, mai rahama.</s>

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem al-Mustafa Muhammad, upon his immaculate, pure, chosen, guided and infallible household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
hau: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu kuma Annabinmu Abul Kasim al-Mustafa Muhammad tare da Iyalansa tsarkaka, zababbu shiryayyu kuma masu shiryarwa, musamman ma Wanzajjen Allah a bayan kasa (Imam Mahdi).
mt0: <pad> All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and blessings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem al-Mustafa Muhammad, upon his immaculate, pure, chosen, guided and infallible family, especially the one who remained with Allah on earth.</s>

en: We are thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave us another opportunity to commemorate our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) on such a day and express our respect for him.
hau: Muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya sake ba mu wata dama da kuma karin shekaru don sake girmama Imaminmu mai girma a irin wannan ranar da kuma nuna so da kaunarmu a gare shi.
mt0: <pad> Allah ne Mafi alheri, wanda ya bamu damar tunawa da Imamanmu (r.a.) a irin wannan rana kuma mu nuna mutuncimu gareshi.</s>

en: Although the memory of Imam (r.a.) is alive among our people at all times, the 14th of Khordad is the manifestation of the Iranian nation's love for him.
hau: Duk da cewa ambaton Imam a koda yaushe ya kasance a raye cikin zukatan al'ummarmu, to amma ranar 14 ga watan Khordad wata alama ce ta nuna so da kaunar al'ummar Iran ga marigayi Imam mai girma.
mt0: <pad> Imam (r.a.) ya kasance a cikin jama'armu a duk lokacin, ranar 14 ga watan Khordad ita ce ranar da Iraniyawa ke nuna soyayya ga Imam (r.a.).</s>

en: This year the demise anniversary of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) has coincided with the martyrdom anniversary of his great ancestor, Imam Musa ibn Ja'far (a.s.).
hau: A bana, wannan ranar ta yi daidai da ranar shahadar kakansa mai girma, wato Imam Musa bn Ja'afar (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi).
mt0: <pad> a wannan shekara, ranar haihuwar Imam Khomeini (r.a.) ta hadu da ranar shahada ta babban uba na sa, Imam Musa ibn Jafar (a.s.).</s>

en: Also, this occasion has coincided with the 50th anniversary of the determining and important event that took place on the 15th of Khordad in the year 1342.
hau: Haka nan kuma wannan shekarar ta yi daidai da shekaru hamsin da faruwar lamarin nan mai matukar muhimmanci na 15 ga watan Khordad na shekarar 1342 (Yunin 1963, mafarin juyin juya halin Musulunci na Iran).
mt0: <pad> Also, this occasion has coincided with the 50th anniversary of the determining and important event that took place on the 15th of Khordad in the year 1342.</s>

en: The 15th of Khordad was an important historical juncture.
hau: Ranar 15 ga watan Khordad wata rana ce mai muhimmanci da kuma ayyana makoma.
mt0: <pad> 15th of Khordad was a important historic juncture.</s>

en: I would like to briefly discuss a few points in this regard and then I will discuss the pressing issues that are necessary to discuss.
hau: Zan yi magana a takaice kan hakan kafin in je ga batu na asali kuma na wajibi da zan yi magana kansa.
mt0: <pad> I would like to discuss a few points in this regard and then I will discuss the urgent issues that are necessary to discuss.</s>

en: The 15th of Khordad was not the beginning of the great movement by the people and the clergy.
hau: Ranar 15 ga watan Khordad ba ita ce mafarin gagarumin yunkurin malamai da mutane ba.
mt0: <pad> 15th of Khordad was not the beginning of the great movement by the people and the clergy.</s>

en: Before the 15th of Khordad, important events had taken place in the year 1341 as well as at the beginning of the year 1342.
hau: Kafin ranar 15 ga watan Khordad, akwai wasu batutuwa masu muhimmanci da suka faru a shekarar 1341 da kuma farko-farkon shekarar 1342.
mt0: <pad> Before the 15th of Khordad, important events had taken place in 1341 and at the beginning of 1342.</s>

en: For example, the event in Feiziyeh School took place on the 2nd of Farvardin in 1342: it resulted in the injury of seminarians and the insult to the great marja taqlid, the late Ayatollah Golpaygani.
hau: Ga misali, abin da ya faru a makarantar Faiziyya ya faru ne a ranar 2 ga watan Farbardeen shekarar 1342, lamarin da ya kai ga bugu da kuma raunana daliban addini bugu da kari kan cin mutumcin babban marja'i marigayi Ayatullah Golpaygani.
mt0: <pad> Kwamfuta, abin da ya faru a Feiziyeh School a ranar 2 ga Farvardin 1342: ya haifar da rauni na seminarians da kuma zagi babban marja taqlid, Ayatollah Golpaygani, a ranar 2 ga Farvardin 1342.</s>

en: Before that event, towards the end of the year 1341, there were demonstrations in Tehran's bazaar and the great marja taqlid, the late Ayatollah Hajj Sayyid Ahmad Khansari, was insulted.
hau: Kafin nan, a karshe-karshen shekarar 1341, lamarin zanga-zangar mutane a kasuwar Tehran ya kunno kai, a nan ma an ci mutumcin babban marja'i marigayi Ayatullah Hajj Sayyid Ahmad Khunsari.
mt0: <pad> Before that event, towards the end of the year 1341, there were protests in Tehran's bazaar and the great marja taqlid, the late Ayatollah Hajj Sayyid Ahmad Khansari, was insulted.</s>

en: These things show that the movement by the clergy had reached such levels in 1341 and early 1342 that security forces of the oppressive regime had started to treat seminarians, religious scholars and even marja taqlids in a brutal way.
hau: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suke nuni da cewa yunkurin malamai a shekarar 1341 da kuma farko-farkon 1342 ya kai wani matsayi na girma ta yadda ‘yan sanda da jami'an tsaron gwamnatin zalunci na lokacin ta yi amfani da karfi sosai a kan malamai da dalibai kai hatta ma maraja'ai ba su tsira ba.
mt0: <pad> Irin wannan abubuwa ya nuna cewa aikin clergy ya kai irin yadda a cikin 1344 da kuma tsakiyar 1344 cewa masu tsaro na gidan iko sun fara yiwa seminarians, religious scholars and even marja taqlids a hanyar tsananin.</s>

en: However, the 15th of Khordad of 1342 was a very important juncture.
hau: To amma duk da hakan, ranar 15 ga watan Khordad wani lokaci ne mai matukar muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> However, the 15th of Khordad of 1342 was a very important juncture.</s>

en: The reason is that the event which took place on the 15th of Khordad revealed that the bond between the people and the clergy had reached a so-called dangerous level.
hau: Dalilin hakan kuwa shi ne cewa abin da ya faru a ranar 15 ga watan Khordad 1342, lamari ne da ke nuni da alakar da ke tsakanin mutane da malamai a wancan lokacin mai hatsarin gaske.
mt0: <pad> The reason is that the event which took place on the 15th of Khordad showed that the bond between the people and the clergy had reached a so-called dangerous level.</s>

en: In that year, on the anniversary of Ashura - which fell on the 13th of Khordad - our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) delivered a historic speech in Feiziyeh School.
hau: A ranar Ashurar wancan shekarar - wadda ta kasance ranar 13 ga watan Khordad ce - mai girma Imam ya gabatar da wani jawabi mai matukar muhimmanci a makarantar Faiziyya.
mt0: <pad> In a year, on the anniversary of Ashura - which fell on the 13th of Khordad - our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) delivered a historic speech in Feiziyeh School.</s>

en: Later on when they had arrested Imam (r.a.), on the 15th of Khordad there was a great movement in Tehran as well as in Qom and other cities and the taghuti regime decided to do everything in its power to suppress the movement by relying on its army, police and security organizations.
hau: Daga baya jami'an tsaro suka kama Imam, a ranar 15 ga watan Khordad, a Tehran haka nan kuma a Kum da wasu garuruwan na daban, mutane sun fito zanga-zanga. Gwamnatin Dagutu ta wancan lokacin kuwa ta fito da dukkan karfinta, da sojoji da ‘yan sanda da sauran jami'an tsaron fararen kaya, ta yi diran mikiya a kan mutane. A ranar 15 ga watan Khordad an sami wani yunkuri na mutane.
mt0: <pad> a lokacin da aka kama Imam (r.a.), a ranar 15 ga watan Khordad, akwai babban taro a Tehran da kuma Qom da sauran birane, kuma gwamnatin taghutiyya ta yanke shawara a duk halin da ya kamata ta kashe wannan taro ta dogara ga 'yan sanda, 'yansanda da kuma 'yan matan tsaro'.</s>

en: The point is that it was this bond that ensured the spread and victory of the movement.
hau: Abin luran a nan shi ne cewa irin wannan alakar ita ce lamunin ci gaban wannan yunkurin da kuma kai shi zuwa ga nasara.
mt0: <pad> The point is that it was this bond that ensured the spread and victory of the movement.</s>

en: Wherever a movement is supported by the people, that movement will prevail.
hau: A duk inda aka sami wani yunkuri da yake da goyon bayan mutane da kuma tafiya tare da su, to kuwa wannan yunkurin zai ci gaba.
mt0: <pad> Wherever a movement is supported by the people, that movement will prevail.</s>

en: But if the people do not develop a bond with a protest movement, that movement will fail.
hau: Amma idan har mutane ba su shigo cikin wani yunkuri na nuna rashin amincewa ba, to kuwa ba zai yi nasara ba.
mt0: <pad>..amma idan jama'a ba su samun alaka da zanga-zangar, zanga-zangar za ta fadi.</s>

en: For example, after the Constitutional Movement in Iran, there were certain events and certain activities by both leftist and nationalist groups, but all of them were destined to fail because they did not have the support of the people.
hau: Kamar yadda ya faru a Iran lokacin yunkurin kundin tsarin mulki. ‘Yan gurguzu da masu kishin kasa sun yunkura to amma yunkurin na su ya sha kashi. Saboda mutane ba su tare da su.
mt0: <pad> Kwamfano, bayan aikin Constitutional Movement a Iran, akwai wasu ayyuka da kuma wasu ayyukan na bangarori biyu na 'yan adawa da kuma nationalist, amma duk waɗannan ayyuka sun kasance a kan hanyar fashewa saboda ba su da goyon baya na jama'a.</s>

en: When the people step into the arena and support a movement with their hearts and minds and with their presence, it becomes possible for that movement to prevail and achieve victory.
hau: A lokacin da mutane suka shigo fage sannan kuma suka goyi bayan wani yunkurin, sannan dukkanin tunani da karfin mutane ya zamanto tare da shi, to kuwa wannan yunkurin zai ci gaba da wanzuwa da kuma samun nasara.
mt0: <pad> 'Idan mutane suka shiga cikin ainuwa kuma su goya wani aiki da zuci da hankali da kuma kasancewarsu, ya zama yiwuwa ga wannan aiki ya yi nasara kuma ya samu nasara.</s>

en: The event that took place on the 15th of Khordad proved this point.
hau: Hakan kuwa shi ne abin da ya faru a ranar 15 ga watan Khordad.
mt0: <pad> Aikin da ya faru a ranar 15 ga watan Khordad ya tabbatar da wannan abu.</s>

en: The arrest of our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) resulted in such an uprising in Tehran and certain other parts of the country that the regime had to step in to suppress the people in a brutal way. A large number of people were killed.
hau: Sakamakon irin mutanen da suka fito a garin Tehran da sauran garuruwa daga jin labarin an kama Imam, lamarin da ya tilasta wa gwamnati shigowa da dukkan karfinta da diran mikiya a kan mutane; ta yadda aka kashe wani adadi mai yawa na mutane.
mt0: <pad> Imam (r.a.) ya tafi gidan kaso a Tehran da wasu sassa na kasar nan, cewa saddamiyya ta shiga cikin jama'a a hanyar tsananin yadda yawancin mutane aka kashe.</s>

en: The streets of Tehran were covered with the blood of pious people and youth.
hau: Titunan Tehran suka cika da jinin bayin Allah mumimai da matasa masu kishi.
mt0: <pad> The streets of Tehran were covered with the blood of pious people and young men.</s>

en: On the 15th of Khordad, the brutal and ruthless nature of the taghuti regime was fully revealed.
hau: A ranar 15 ga watan Khordad dan mulkin kama-karya da kuma irin zuciya maras imani ta dagutu ta bayyana a fili.
mt0: <pad> 15th of Khordad, the brutal and ruthless nature of the taghuti regime was fully revealed.</s>

en: Another point regarding the event which happened on the 15th of Khordad - a point to which our youth and dear people should pay attention - is that no international community and none of the so-called human rights organizations protested against the brutal killings in Tehran and other parts of the country.
hau: Wani batun kuma da ke cikin wannan lamari na 15 ga watan Khordad - wanda yana da kyau matasanmu da mutanenmu masu girma su lura da shi - shi ne cewa a yayin wannan kisan kiyashin da aka yi wa mutane a Tehran da sauran garuruwa, babu wata cibiya ta kasa da kasa, wadanda suke kiran kansu cibiyoyin kare hakkokin bil'adama, da ya ce wani abu; babu wani da ya nuna rashin amincewarsa.
mt0: <pad> Another point about the event that happened on 15th of Khordad - a point to which our young and dear people should pay attention - is that no international community and no so-called human rights organizations protested against the brutal killings in Tehran and other parts of the country.</s>

en: The people and the clergy remained in the arena.
hau: Mutane da malamai sun kasance su kadai ne kawai a fagen.
mt0: <pad> 'yan uwa da clergyman sun tafi a cikin atrium.</s>

en: They said that it was a feudalist movement. The nationalists - who were claiming to support anti-government activities - also condemned the movement.
hau: Su ma masu da'awar kishin kasa - da suke da'awar goyon bayan gwagwarmayar fada da gwamnati - su ma sun yi Allah wadai da wannan yunkurin; suna cewa wannan wani makahon yunkuri ne maras manufa, wani yunkuri ne na wuce gona da iri.
mt0: <pad> They said it was a feudalist movement. The nationalists - who were claiming to support anti-government activities - also condemned the movement.</s>

en: Wherever lazy people fail to take risks and play a role in the arena, they accuse pious combatants of extremism. They said that the movement was an extremist movement.
hau: A duk lokacin da masu neman sauki da jin dadi suka gagara sama wa kansu waje a cikin gwagwarmayar da ake yi, nan take za su zargi muminan mutane masu gwagwarmaya da tsaurin ra'ayi da wuce gona da iri.
mt0: <pad> a duk lokacin da mutane masu lafiyar ba su iya yin hadari ba su kuma su taka rawa a cikin yakin, su zargi masu yaki na gaskiya da extremism. Su ce cewa yakin ya zama yakin extremist.</s>

en: They rejected it as a radical movement. Imam (r.a.) remained in the arena, relying on the support of the people, and he managed to present the image of a truly decisive and determined spiritual leader to all people and to all history.
hau: Suna fadin cewa, wadannan masu tsaurin ra'ayi ne, yunkurin wani yunkuri ne na wuce gona da iri. Imam, sakamakon goyon bayan al'umma da ya samu, ya ci gaba da wannan yunkuri nasa, sannan kuma ya tabbatar wa duniya da kuma tarihi matsayinsa na wani jagora na addini sannan kuma mai azamar cimma manufar da ya sa a gaba.
mt0: <pad> They refused it as a radical movement. Imam (r.a.) remained in the arena, relying on the support of the people, and he managed to present the image of a truly decisive and determined spiritual leader to all people and all history.</s>

en: Our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) had three beliefs which made him decisive, courageous and steadfast: namely, faith in God, faith in the people and faith in himself. These three beliefs revealed themselves in the character, decisions and actions of Imam (r.a.) in the true sense of the word.
hau: Imam dai ya kasance yana da wasu abubuwa guda uku da ya yi imani da su, wadanda su ne suka ba shi azama, jaruntaka da kuma tsayin daka. Wadannan abubuwa ukun kuwa su ne: imani da Allah, imani da karfin mutane da kuma imani da kai. Wadannan imani guda uku sun bayyanar da kansu cikin samuwa da kuma matsayar da Imam yake dauka.
mt0: <pad> Imam (r.a.) ya kasance da imanin Allah, na mutane, da kansa: waɗannan imani guda uku sun sanya shi a cikin hali, shawara da ayyuka na Imam (r.a.) a yadda ya kamata.</s>

en: Imam (r.a.) spoke to the people through his heart and the people accepted his call with their heart and soul.

en: In our country and according to our Constitution, the president has extraordinary powers.

en: He has control over all executive pillars of the country. He has control over the implementation of the laws and regulations in the country. He has the power to utilize the capacities of all experts throughout the country.

en: The recent events in France and similar ones in some other Western countries have convinced me to directly talk to you about them.
hau: Lamurrann baya-bayan nan da suka faru a kasar Faransa da makamantansu a wasu kasashen Yammaci, su ne suka sanya ni ganin ya dace in yi magana da ku kai tsaye.
mt0: <pad> Recent events in France and similar ones in some Western countries have convinced me to directly talk to you about them.</s>

en: I am addressing you, [the youth], not because I overlook your parents, rather it is because the future of your nations and countries will be in your hands; and also I find that the sense of quest for truth is more vigorous and attentive in your hearts.
hau: Ina magana da ku ne, Ya ku matasa; ba wai saboda na raina iyayenku ba, face dai sai saboda ku ne manyan gobe, wadanda makomar al'umma da kuma kasarku take hannunsu; sannan kuma saboda ina ganin zukatanku cike suke da neman sanin gaskiya.
mt0: <pad> I am addressing you, [the youth], not because I overlook your parents, rather it is because the future of your nations and countries will be in your hands; and also I find that the sense of quest for truth is more vigorous and attentive in your hearts.</s>

en: I don't address your politicians and statesmen either in this writing because I believe that they have consciously separated the route of politics from the path of righteousness and truth.
hau: Haka nan kuma ba wai ina magana ne da ‘yan siyasa da jami'an gwamnatocinku ba ne, don kuwa na yi amanna da cewa da gangan sannan kuma da saninsu suka kawar da siyasarsu daga tafarkin gaskiya da hakika.
mt0: <pad> I don't address your politicians and statesmen in this writing because I believe that they have deliberately separated the path of politics from the path of righteousness and truth.</s>

en: I would like to talk to you about Islam, particularly the image that is presented to you as Islam.
hau: Magana ta da ku kan Musulunci ne, musamman ma dangane irin abin da ake gabatar muku da shi a matsayin Musuluncin.
mt0: <pad> I would like to talk to you about Islam, particularly the image that is presented to you as Islam.</s>

en: Many attempts have been made over the past two decades, almost since the disintegration of the Soviet Union, to place this great religion in the seat of a horrifying enemy.
hau: Tsawon shekaru ashirin din da suka gabata zuwa sama - wato tun daga lokacin rugujewar Tarayyar Sobiyeti - an gudanar da gagarumin kokarin bayyanar da wannan addini mai girma a matsayin wani gagarumin abin tsoro.
mt0: <pad> Many attempts have been made over the past two decades, almost since the disintegration of the Soviet Union, to place this great religion in the seat of a horrifying enemy.</s>

en: The provocation of a feeling of horror and hatred and its utilization has unfortunately a long record in the political history of the West.
hau: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa irin wannan yanayi na sanya tsoro da kyamar (wannan addini) wani lamari ne mai tsoron tarihi cikin tarihin siyasar kasashen yammaci.
mt0: <pad> a tsĩrĩra na gũtuũka da irio na gũthũru, da kuma amfani da su, unfortunately, has a long record in the political history of the West.</s>

en: Here, I don't want to deal with the different phobias with which the Western nations have thus far been indoctrinated.
hau: Ni dai a nan ba ina so ne in yi magana dangane da ‘irin kyama da tsoratarwa' daban-daban da ya zuwa yanzu aka sanya cikin zukatan al'ummomin kasashen yammaci ba.
mt0: <pad> Here, I don't want to deal with the different phobias with which the Western nations have so far been indoctrinated.</s>

en: A cursory review of recent critical studies of history would bring home to you the fact that the Western governments' insincere and hypocritical treatment of other nations and cultures has been censured in new historiographies.
hau: Idan kuka koma kadan cikin tarihi, za ku ga cewa sabbin marubuta tarihi, sun soki mu'amalar rashin adalci da gaskiya da gwamnatocin yammaci suka yi wa al'ummomi da al'adun duniya.
mt0: <pad> A cursory review of recent critical studies of history would bring home to you the fact that the Western governments' insincere and hypocritical treatment of other nations and cultures has been censured in new historiographies.</s>

en: The histories of the United States and Europe are ashamed of slavery, embarrassed by the colonial period and chagrined at the oppression of people of color and non-Christians.

en: Hence, my first request is: Study and research the incentives behind this widespread tarnishing of the image of Islam.
hau: A saboda haka, bukata ta ta farko ita ce ku yi tambaya da kuma binciko dalilin irin wannan gagarumin kokari na bata sunan Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> Idan a ka iya, zan kawo a cikin tsari na ilimi da kuma bincike abin da ke kawo wannan tsanantawa ta intanet a hoto na Islam.</s>

en: My second request is that in reaction to the flood of prejudgments and disinformation campaigns, try to gain a direct and firsthand knowledge of this religion.
hau: Bukata ta ta biyu, ita ce yayin mayar da martani ga irin wannan gagarumin bakar farfagandar bata sunan Musulunci (da ake yi), ku yi kokarin fahimtar wannan addini (Musulunci) da koyarwar ta hakika kai tsaye.
mt0: <pad> My second request is that in reaction to the flood of prejudgments and disinformation campaigns, try to gain direct and firsthand knowledge of this religion.</s>

en: The right logic requires that you understand the nature and essence of what they are frightening you about and want you to keep away from. I don't insist that you accept my reading or any other reading of Islam. What I want to say is: Don't allow this dynamic and effective reality in today's world to be introduced to you through resentments and prejudices.
hau: Lafiyayyen hankali yana hukumta wajibcin sanin hakikanin abin da ake tsoratar da ku shi da kuma nesanta ku daga gare shi. Ni dai ba ina cewa ne lalle sai kun yarda da fahimta ta ko fahimtar wani kan Musulunci ba, sai dai abin da nake cewa shi ne kada ku bari a kange ku daga wannan hakikar wacce take da tasiri cikin duniyar yau saboda cimma wata bakar manufa.
mt0: <pad> Logic na gaskiya ya bukata ka gane yadda abubuwa suke damun ku da kuma yadda suke so ku guje su. Ba na bukatar ka yarda da ganin cewa a gano yadda abubuwan nan masu aiki da karfi a duniya ta yau ke aiki a kanku ta hanyar adawa da shubham.</s>

en: Don't allow them to hypocritically introduce their own recruited terrorists as representatives of Islam.
hau: Kada ku bari cikin riya su gabatar muku da ‘yan ta'addan da suke karkashin ikonsu a matsayin wakilan Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> Don't allow them to hypocritically introduce their own recruited terrorists as representatives of Islam.</s>

en: Receive knowledge of Islam from its primary and original sources.
hau: Kamata yayi ku fahimci Musulunci daga tushensa na asali.
mt0: <pad> 'Yi ilimi na Islama daga wuraren asali da kuma ainihin abubuwan da aka gano.</s>

en: Gain information about Islam through the Qur'an and the life of its great Prophet.
hau: Ku fahimci Musulunci ta hanyar Alkur'ani da rayuwar Annabin Musulunci (tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi da Alayensa).
mt0: <pad> samun ilimi a kan Islam ta hanyar Al-Qurani da kuma rayuwar Muhammadu, annabi na Allah.</s>

en: I would like to ask you whether you have directly read the Qur'an of the Muslims.
hau: A nan ina son in tambaye ku, shin ya zuwa yanzu kun taba karanta Alkur'anin musulmi kai tsaye?
mt0: <pad> I wanna ask you if you have read the Qur'an of the Muslims directly?</s>

en: Have you studied the teachings of the Prophet of Islam and his humane, ethical doctrines?
hau: Shin kun taba karantar koyarwar Annabin Musulunci (tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi da Alayensa) da kyawawan halaye da ‘yan'adamtakarsa?
mt0: <pad> 'Da ka riga kasancewa a cikin sunnah na Muhammadu, da kuma sunnah ta kwarai, ta adabi?'</s>

en: Have you ever received the message of Islam from any sources other than the media?
hau: Shin ya zuwa yanzu kun fahimci sakon Musulunci ta wata kafa ta daban, ba kafar watsa labarai ba?
mt0: <pad> 'Da ka taba samun sakon Islama daga wasu kafofin daban-daban a waje da kafofin yada labarai?'</s>

en: Have you ever asked yourself how and on the basis of which values has Islam established the greatest scientific and intellectual civilization of the world and raised the most distinguished scientists and intellectuals throughout several centuries?
hau: Shin kun taba tambayar kanku ya ya aka yi wannan Musuluncin, sannan bisa wasu koyarwa ya samu daman zama mafi girman al'adu da ci gaban ilimi da tunani na duniya sannan kuma ya tarbiyyantar da mafi girma da kyawun masana da masu tunani na duniya?
mt0: <pad> 'Da ka taba tanyakan kan ka yadda kuma bisa waɗanne halayen ne Islam ya kafa al'ada mafi girma na kimiyya da ilimin duniya, kuma ya daukaka scientifique da ilimin a cikin shekaru da dama?</s>

en: I would like you not to allow the derogatory and offensive image-buildings to create an emotional gulf between you and the reality, taking away the possibility of an impartial judgment from you.
hau: Ina kiranku da kada ku bari a yi amfani da bakar siyasa da wauta wajen katange ku daga gaskiya, da kuma kawar da yiyuwar yin alkalanci cikin adalci daga gare ku.
mt0: <pad> I would like you not to allow the derogatory and offensive image-buildings to create an emotional gulf between you and the reality, taking away the possibility of an impartial judgment from you.</s>

en: Today, the communication media have removed the geographical borders. Hence, don't allow them to besiege you within fabricated and mental borders.
hau: A halin yanzu da kafafen sadarwa suka rusa ganuwar kan iyakokin kasashe, kada ku bari a kange ku cikin kirkirarrun kan iyakoki na boge.
mt0: <pad> A yau, kafofin sadarwa sun cire iyakokin kasa. Don't allow them to besiege you within fabricated and mental iyakoki.</s>

en: Although no one can individually fill the created gaps, each one of you can construct a bridge of thought and fairness over the gaps to illuminate yourself and your surrounding environment.
hau: Duk da cewa babu wani mutum, a kan kansa, da zai cike wannan gibin da aka samar, amma kowane guda daga cikinku zai iya samar da gadar tunani da adalci a kan wannan gibin da aka haifar.
mt0: <pad> A lokacin da babu wanda zai iya cike abubuwan da aka samar, kowa da kowa zai iya gina hanyar tunani da adalci a kan abubuwan da aka samar don ya haske kansa da kuma al'umma da ke sekitara.</s>

en: While this preplanned challenge between Islam and you, the youth, is undesirable, it can raise new questions in your curious and inquiring minds.
hau: Duk da cewa wannan kalubalen da aka kirkira tsakanin Musulunci da ku matasa wani kalubale ne mai sarkakiyar gaske, to amma hakan yana iya kirkiro sabbin tambayoyi cikin zukatanku da suke neman sanin hakika.
mt0: <pad> While this preplanned challenge between Islam and you, the young, is undesirable, it can raise new questions in your curious and inquiring minds.</s>

en: Attempts to find answers to these questions will provide you with an appropriate opportunity to discover new truths.
hau: Kokari wajen samo amsoshin wadannan tambayoyi, zai samar muku da wata dama ta gano wasu sabbin gaskiyar.
mt0: <pad> Ƙoƙarin gano amsoshin wadannan tambayoyi zai ba ka damar gano ainihin gaskiya.</s>

hau: A saboda haka, kada ku bari wannan dama ta fahimtar gaskiyar Musulunci ta kubuce muku, don me yiyuwa ta hanyar wannan jin nauyi a jika da kuke da shi, al'ummomi masu zuwa za su rubuta tarihin irin wannan mu'amala da kasashen yammaci suka yi da Musulunci cikin sauki ba tare da wahala ba.

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate, pure and chosen household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
hau: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga Shugabanmu kuma Annabinmu Abul Kasim al-Mustafa Muhammad tare da Alayensa tsarkaka musamman ma Wanzajjen Allah a bayan kasa.
mt0: <pad> All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and blessings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate, pure and chosen family, especially the one who remained with Allah on earth.</s>

en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted from the bottom of my heart who gave me another opportunity to meet you dear people and youth - including the honorable people of Mashhad and the surrounding areas as well as the esteemed pilgrims who have travelled from other cities - at the spiritual shrine of Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha (a.s.) and to enjoy the spiritual blessings of sitting in the shade of Imam Ridha (a.s.) and his holy shrine.
hau: Ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki daga tsakiyar zuciyata da Ya sake ba ni wata dama ta daban ta ganawa da ku al'umma masu girma, matasa masu girma, shin mutanen Mashhad masu girma ne ko kuma wadanda suka kawo ziyara, 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma a wannan waje mai tsarki na hubbaren Abul Hasan Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (a.s) sannan kuma mu sami albarkacin sabuwar shekara ta hanya zama a karkashin inuwar haramin wannan Ma'abocin girman.
mt0: <pad> I am thankful to Allah the Exalted from the bottom of my heart for giving me another opportunity to meet you dear people and young people - including the honorable people of Mashhad and the surrounding areas as well as the esteemed pilgrims who have travelled from other cities - at the spiritual shrine of Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha (a.s.) and to enjoy the spiritual blessings of sitting in the shade of Imam Ridha (a.s.) and his holy shrine.</s>

en: I extend my congratulations on Norouz and the arrival of the new year and I hope that for all the people of Iran, this new year will be full of happiness, blessings, joy, dynamism, activity and success in acquiring religious knowledge and achieving piety.
hau: Ina isar da sakon tayar murnar idin Nurouz da shigowar sabuwar shekara, ina fatan wannan shekarar da muka shigo za ta zamanto shekara mai cike da albarkoki da kuma farin ciki, nishadi da kuma ayyukan na kwarai ga dukkanin al'ummar Iran sannan kuma ta zamanto hanyar samun masaniya ta Ubnangiji da kuma tsoron Allah Madaukakin Sarki.
mt0: <pad> I extend my congratulations on Norouz and the arrival of the new year and I hope that for all the people of Iran, this new year will be full of happiness, blessings, joy, dynamism, activity and success in acquiring religious knowledge and achieving piety.</s>

en: I would like to discuss a few issues with you dear brothers and sisters in this meeting.
hau: Akwai wadansu batutuwa da nake son magana kansu a yayin wannan ganawa da ku 'yan'uwa maza da mata.
mt0: <pad> I would like to discuss a few issues with you dear brothers and sisters in this meeting.</s>

en: The first part of my speech is a brief look at the events that happened in our country in the year 1390 and at the regional and global developments that were related to us.
hau: Batu na farko, dubi ne a gurguje cikin abubuwan da suka faru a gare mu, a kan al'ummarmu da kasarmu da kuma abubuwan da suka shafe mu a fagage na duniya da wannan yankin.
mt0: <pad> The first part of my speech is a brief look at the events that happened in our country in the year 1390 and the regional and global developments that were related to us.</s>

en: The reason why I want to discuss the developments of the year 1390 - and particularly the achievements that were made by the Iranian nation last year - is that our enemies and ill-wishers are making threats against our dear nation.
hau: Dalilin da ya sanya mu ke magana kan batutuwan da suka faru a shekarar 1390 (da ta gabata) musamman irin nasarorin da al'ummar Iran suka samu a wannan shekarar shi ne saboda irin makirce-makircen da makiya da masu bakar aniya suka ta kulla wa al'ummar Iran ne.
mt0: <pad> -Saboda ni na so in tabo abubuwan da suka faru a shekara ta 1390, musamman ma ci gaban da kasar Iran ya samu a shekarar da ta gabata, saboda a cikin wannan lokacin ne a cikin yakini a kan kasarmu mai daraja.</s>

en: The leaders of the arrogant powers, those who have power and wealth and their followers in our region are doing everything in their power - their financial, propaganda and political power - to intimidate the Iranian people and to disappoint them.
hau: Shugabannin girman kai da masu tinkaho da kuma amfani da karfi da tursasawa da kuma 'yan amshin shatansu na wannan yanki na mu - sun yi amfani da dukkanin karfinsu, shin karfi ne na kudi, ko karfi na farfaganda da kuma na siyasa - wajen ganin sun razana al'ummar Iran da kuma sanya su yanke kauna.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata mu fada cewa, 'Akwai kowa a cikin 'yan uwa.'</s>

en: Anybody who has followed the political propaganda of the ill-wishers of the Iranian nation realizes that all the activities, all the economic and political efforts and all the security and military threats are aimed at stopping, disappointing and intimidating the vibrant, living, dynamic, determined and capable Iranian nation, a nation that is standing firm in the middle of the arena in a totally courageous way, a nation that is moving forward.
hau: Duk wanda ya ke bi irin farfagandar da masu bakar aniya kan al'ummar Iran suke yi, a fili zai iya ganin irin wadannan kokari na aiki, kokari na tattalin arziki da kokari na siyasa, barazana ta soji da dai sauransu da suka yi wajen ganin sun dunkufar da tsayayyiyar al'ummar Iran daga fagen ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukanta da kuma samun ci gaba, su sanya ta yanke kauna da kuma razana ta daga irin wannan kasantuwa da take da ita a fage.
mt0: <pad> kowa ya lura da yadda a ke yada propaganda siyasa na masu son Iran ya san cewa duk ayyuka, duk kokarin siyasa da shawarwari da kuma duk barazanar tsaro da sojoji suna nufin gujewa, tsanantawa da kuma tsanantawa Iran, wanda yake tsaye a tsakiyar taro a cikin halin karimci, wanda yake tafiya a gaban.</s>

en: In fact, aside from the slogan of "we can" which our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) taught us, the Revolution also gave us the courage to say, "We can". They want to convince us that we are incapable.
hau: A hakikanin gaskiya suna son su fitar da wannan akida ta cewa 'lalle za mu iya' wanda mai girma Imam (Khumaini) ne ya koya mana ita sannan kuma juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ba mu karfin gwuiwan cewa lalle 'za mu iya' din daga zuciyar al'umma da cusa musu cewa lalle ku din nan ba za ku iya wani abu ba.
mt0: <pad> In fact, in addition to the slogan "we can" which our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) taught us, the Revolution also gave us the courage to say, "We can". They want to convince us that we are incapable.</s>

en: They are doing everything in their power to achieve this goal and their activities reached full swing in the year 1390.
hau: Sun yi dukkanin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun cimma wannan manufar. Shekarar da ta gabatar ta kasance shekarar da suka kara kaimi ainun wajen cimma hakan.
mt0: <pad> They are doing everything in their power to achieve this goal and their activities reached full swing in the year 1390.</s>

en: I would like to stress that despite their will and much to their disappointment, in the year 1390 the Iranian nation once again convinced the enemies and the entire world - with its activities, advances and decisions - that it is capable.
hau: Ina son kowa ya fahimci cewa cewar sabanin abin da suke fatan gani al'ummar Iran ta hanyar ci gaba da tafiya a kan tafarkin da suka rika da kuma irin ci gaban da suka samu da kuma tsayin dakansu sun bada musu kasa a ido da kuma tabbatar wa dukkan duniya ciki kuwa har da makiya din cewa 'lalle za mu iya'.
mt0: <pad> I would like to stress that despite their will and much to their disappointment, in the year 1390 the Iranian nation convinced the enemies and the whole world - with its activities, advances and decisions - that it is capable.</s>

en: The reason why we stress our strengths is to prove that the Iranian nation made use of its capabilities. The Iranian nation proved that it is capable in spite of the will of the ill-wishers who wanted to prove that the Iranian nation was incapable.
hau: Dalilin da ya sanya muke ta magana kan bangarorin karfi da nasarorin da aka samu shi ne don mu tabbatar wa (duniya) cewa al'ummar Iran ta yi amfani da irin wannan karfi da take da shi ne sannan kuma sabanin abin da masu bakar aniya suke son nunawa cewa al'ummar Iran ba za su iya ba, sun tabbatar da cewa lalle za su iya.
mt0: <pad> 'Dalilin da ya sa muka damu da karfinmu shi ne mu tabbatar da cewa kasar Iran ta yi amfani da damarta. Kasar Iran ta tabbatar da cewa ta iya, duk da yadda masu son ganin kasar Iran ta zama maras karfi, wadanda suka so su tabbatar da cewa kasar Iran ba ta iya ba.</s>

en: We are aware of our weak points. We have our own weak points, but in general, our strengths are far more than our weak points.
hau: Ba wai ba mu da bangarori na rauni ba ne, lalle muna da bangarori na rauni; to amma a yanayi na gaba daya bangaren karfin da muke da shi da kuma irin nasarorin da muka samu sun fi bangarorin raunin yawa.
mt0: <pad> 'Mun san abubuwan da muka damu. Muna da abubuwan da muka damu, amma a yawancin lokaci, abubuwan da muka damu sunyi fice fiye da abubuwan da muka damu.</s>

en: The year 1390 was named "The Year of Economic Jihad".
hau: Mun ba wa shekarar 1390 (da ta gabata) sunan 'Shekarar Kokarin Bunkasa Tattalin Arziki"; a saboda haka a wannan shekarar (zan fara maganata ne) daga batun tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> a shekara ta 1390 an kira "Shekarar Jihad na Ikomi"</s>

en: What is noteworthy is the economic movement of our government officials which was accompanied by the exemplary and praiseworthy cooperation of the people throughout the year 1390.
hau: Lalle irin ayyukann da jami'an kasar nan suka gudanar a fagen tattalin arziki tare da kuma irin hadin kan da mutane suka ba su tsawon shekarar da ta gabatan wani lamari ne abin ambato da jinjinawa.
mt0: <pad> abin da ya kamata a lura da shi ne, aikin gũtaruwarmu na serikali ya tafi a kan hanyar da ta dace, wanda ya hadu da aiki na gũtaruwarmu na serikali a cikin shekara ta 1390.</s>

en: Among the things that can be mentioned in this regard is the issue of redistributing state subsidies.
hau: Daga cikin abubuwan da za a iya ambato a wannan bangaren shi ne wannan siyasa ta manufantar da irin tallafin da gwamnati take bayarwa.
mt0: <pad> A cikin abubuwan da za a lissafa a wannan dangantaka, akwai batun rarraba bashi na gwamnatin.</s>

en: All economic experts - both the ones who served in the previous governments and those who serving in the current government - unanimously agree that redistributing state subsidies is a necessity for the country.
hau: Bakin dukkanin masanan tattalin arziki, shin a cikin gwamnatocin da suka gabata ne ko kuma cikin wannan gwamnatin ne sun hadu kan cewa aiwatar da wannan siyasar dai ta zama dole a kasar nan; kowa ya yarda da hakan.
mt0: <pad> 'Dukkan masu ilimi kan harkokin asusun kasa - bama wadanda suka aiki a gwamnati da ta kawo yanzu, da wadanda suke aiki a gwamnati da ta kawo yanzu - suna ganin cewa rarraba tallafin asusun kasa wajibi ne ga kasar nan.</s>

en: In spite of the fact that everybody agreed on the necessity of taking action, nobody had done anything due to the complexities and hardships involved. In the year 1390, the executive and legislative branches of government made efforts and carried out important stages of this work while we were under sanctions and while the hardships and complexities were more than ever before.
hau: Duk kuwa da cewa wannan wani lamari ne da aka yi tarayya a kansa, to amma lamarin ya ci gaba da zama ba tare da an aiwatar da shi saboda irin matsaloli da wahalhalun da ke cikinsa. Amma gwamnati da majalisa a shekarar da ta gabatan, a irin wannan yanayi na takunkumi da ake ciki wanda matsala da wahalar da ke cikin lamari ya fi na koyaushe wahala, sun yi himma da fara aiwatar da wannan aiki, kuma ya zuwa yanzu an aiwatar da wani bangare mai muhimmanci na shirin.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga cewa kowa ya yarda da bukatar a daukaka mataki, ba wanda ya aikata wani abu saboda tsananin rikicewar da sukar ciki. en: The work is not finished yet, but what has been done so far by our government officials both in the executive branch and in the Majlis - which have been mostly successful due to the support and cooperation of the people - are very important and remarkable.
hau: Aikin dai ba mai karewa ba ne, to amma abin da ya zuwa yanzu jami'an gwamnati - shin a cikin gwamnatin ne ko kuma a majalisa - suka yi sannan kuma jama'a suka goyi bayansu lalle an samu nasarori kuma an aiwatar da aiki mai muhimmanci abin jinjinawa.
mt0: <pad> aikin ba ya kammala ba, amma abin da aka yi a yanzu na wakilan majalisar zartarwa da na wakilan majalisar dokoki - wanda yawanci ya samu nasara saboda goyon baya da hadin gwiwa na jama'a - yana da matukar amfani kuma ya daukaka.</s>

en: All our honorable people are familiar with the objectives, but it is necessary to reflect on them. The work that has been done is great.

mt0: <pad> I explained in a speech that state subsidies have always been distributed among the people in an unfair way: this is the nature of general subsidies.</s>

mt0: <pad> I have received reliable reports from all over the country that targeted subsidies have played a significant role in improving living standards of the lower social classes.</s>

en: This is one of the goals, which is also the most important objective of the subsidy law.

en: Another goal is to reform the structure of production and the structure of our economy.

mt0: <pad> Another goal is to reform the structure of production and the structure of our economy.</s>

en: Economic experts unanimously agree that targeted subsidies can resolve this problem. They agree that wasteful and low-yield production can be remedied and a balance can be created between input and output.
hau: Bisa kididdigar masanan tattalin arziki - wanda dukkaninsu sun yi tarayya kan hakan - ana iya gyara hakan ta hanyar aiwatar da wannan shiri na manufantar da irin tallafin da ake bayarwa; hakan zai iya daidaita irin abubuwan da ake samarwa da kuma amfani da shi.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata a kawo masu zuba jari a cikin asusun IMF, sannan a dawo da asusun IMF a cikin asusun IMF.</s>

en: Another goal is to manage energy consumption.
hau: Wata manufar kuma ta daban ita ce amfani da makamashin da ake da shi yadda ya dace.
mt0: <pad> Another goal is to manage energy consumption.</s>

en: Because we have been an oil-rich country, we have been in the habit of using gas, natural gas, diesel and kerosene in a wasteful way.
hau: Da yake mu din nan kasa ce da Allah ya albarkace ta da man fetur, don haka mun saba da yin almubazzaranci wajen amfani da man fetur, gas, kananzir ba tare da lura ba.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga cewa mu ne kasar mai arzikin man fetur, muna da al'ada na amfani da gas, man fetur, disel da kerosene ta hanyar a wastage.</s>

en: Our consumption has been more wasteful than many countries - and in a sense, more wasteful than all countries in the world.
hau: Irin yadda muke amfani da wadannan albarkatu ya dara na da dama daga cikin kasashen duniya - mai yiyuwa ne ma ana iya cewa sama da dukkanin kasashen duniya.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata mu san cewa yawan amfani da mu ya fi na kasashe da dama - kuma a wani ma'ana, fiye da duk kasashe a duniya.</s>

en: Reliable statistics have been published which show that if the subsidy law had not been implemented, we would be consuming gas almost twice the amount we currently do.
hau: Kididdigar da aka fitar, kuma kididdiga ce abar yarda, tana nuna mana cewa idan da a ce har ya zuwa yanzu ba a fara aiwatar da wannan shiri ba, to da kuwa irin amfani da mai da ake yi a kasar nan ya ninka irin yadda ake amfani da shi a halin yanzu har sau biyu.
mt0: <pad> Statistics masu inganci sun buga a halin yanzu wanda ya nuna cewa idan dokar tallafi ba ta aiwatuwa, za mu ci gas kusan sau biyu yadda muke ci a yanzu.</s>

en: When we do not produce sufficient gasoline to meet our domestic needs, what do we have to do?
hau: A lokacin da ya zamana ba ma samar da wadataccen man da ake bukata a cikin gida, to me ya wajaba mu aikata?
mt0: <pad> idan ba mu samar da iso ga iyalanmu ba, to yaya za mu yi?</s>

en: We would have to import it.
hau: Kenan wajibi ne mu shigo da mai daga waje; wato wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su zamanto masu mika kokon bara zuwa hannun makiya da masu bakar aniya.
mt0: <pad> zamu dinga shigo da ita.</s>

en: Today our domestic consumption of gasoline is approximately as much as our production. We do not need to import gasoline, which is a great advantage for the country.

mt0: <pad> A yau, yawan amfani da man fetur a cikin gida kusan yadda muke samarwa. Bamu bukatar kawo man fetur ba, wanda hakan yana da babbar amfani ga kasarmu.</s>

en: This was done in the year 1390, exactly when our enemies increased their sanctions on us in order to bring our nation to its knees.
hau: Wannan aiki ne da aka yi shi a shekarar 1390 da ta gabata; a daidai lokacin da makiyanmu suka sanya mana takunkumi don su dunkufar da al'ummarmu.

en: But our youth made efforts and foiled the plots of the enemy with their actions.

mt0: <pad> 'Amma 'yan uwa namu sun yi kokari, kuma sun wargaza shirin 'yan adawa da ayyukansu.</s>

en: Another important economic measure which was taken with the help of our people was in the arena of science and technology.

mt0: <pad> Another important economic measure which was taken with the help of our people was in the arena of science and technology.</s>

en: Science and technology is one of the pillars of a nation's economic power.

mt0: <pad> Science and technology is one of the pillars of a nation's economic power.</s>

en: A nation that enjoys advanced knowledge and technology will achieve wealth, political independence, honor and power.

mt0: <pad> A kasa da ke amfana da ilimi da fasaha ta zamani za ta samu arziki, 'yanci, 'yanci, 'yaci,' da kuma karfi.</s>

en: I receive different reports from different channels on a regular basis and I can say with certainty that the level of our country's advances is much higher than what has been reported.

mt0: <pad> I always receive different reports from different channels on a regular basis and I can say with certainty that the level of our country's advances is much higher than what has been reported.</s>

en: According to the reports prepared by reliable scientific centers of world - and not our own scientific centers - the fastest scientific growth is taking place in Iran.

en: Reliable scientific centers of the world reported that in the year 2011 - which ended three months before the year 1390 - the scientific growth of the Iranian nation was 20 percent more than the year 2010. What is the meaning of this?
hau: A shekarar 1390 wadda ta yi kusan daidai da shekara ta 2011 miladiyya, rahoton da cibiyoyin ilimi na duniya suka fitar a shekara ta 2011 - wanda watanni uku kenan da karewarta - al'ummar Iran ta sami gagarumin ci gaba na ilimi sama da irin wadda ta samu a shekara ta 2010 miladiyya sannan kuma irin ci gaban da ta samu ya kai kashi ashirin cikin dari. Mece ce ma'anar hakan?
mt0: <pad> a yakini da cewa a shekara ta 2011 - wanda ya ƙare a 'yan watannin biyu kafin shekarar 1390 - yawan cigaban kimiyya na Iran ya ƙara 20% fiye da a shekara ta 2010.</s>

hau: Duk kuwa da cewa sun san cewa cibiyar ta Tehran saboda samar da magani ne - wato saboda biyan bukatar marasa lafiya da gudanar da bincike wanda kuma dubban marasa lafiya suna bukatar wannan cibiyar - to amma kuma duk da hakan suka hana (wannan makamashin), suka ki sayarwa, suna masu kafa sharadi da neman a mika muku kai.

en: The sixfold increase in recombinant drugs and the increase in the export of knowledge-based products and services - these achievements were made in the year 1390.

mt0: <pad> a bakwai sau biyu na yawan kwayoyi na recombinant da kuma ƙarawar a cikin kayan aikin da aka dogara kan ilimi - wadannan ayyuka an yi su a shekara ta 1390.</s>

en: These are part of achievements which were made in "The Year of Economic Jihad".

en: These are technological advances.

mt0: <pad> These are technological advances.</s>

mt0: <pad> Election ya nuna hoton kasar Iran na gaskiya a duniya, kamar babban da karfin kafofin yada labarai.</s>

en: These things are only part of the achievements made in the year 1390.

en: Since the time the nuclear issue was brought up, the pretext for their enmities has been the nuclear issue.
hau: Tun daga lokacin da aka gabatar da batun nukiliya, shi kenan sai makiya suka fake da shi.
mt0: <pad> Since the time the nuclear issue was brought up, the pretext for their enmities has been the nuclear issue.</s>

en: Of course, they know and they acknowledge that Iran is not after nuclear weapons, which is true.
hau: Tabbas sun sani sannan kuma suna ma fadin cewa Iran dai ba tana son kera makaman nukiliya ba ne.
mt0: <pad> 'Da, su san kuma su yadda cewa Iran ba ya neman makaman nukilia, wanda gaskiya ne.</s>

en: We have not manufactured any nuclear weapons and we never will. They know this and the nuclear issue is just a pretext. One day their pretext is the nuclear issue, another day their pretext is human rights and yet another day their pretext is other domestic issues of our country, but they are all pretexts.
hau: Wannan shi ne hakikanin lamarin. Mu dai saboda dalilan da muke da su, ba zamu taba neman kera makaman nukiliya ba; ba mu kera ba sannan kuma ba za mu kera ba, su da kansu sun san hakan, sai dai kuma suna daukan hakan a matsayin wani abin da za su fake da shi ne. A wani lokacin suna amfani da hakan, a wani lokacin kuma suna fakewa da batun hakkokin bil'adama, a wani lokacin kuma wani lamarin na cikin gida; to amma dukkanin wadannan wasu abubuwa ne da suke fakewa da su.
mt0: <pad> 'Mu bamu da makamai na nukilia kuma bamu taba yin su ba.' 'Su san wannan, kuma a kan nuclear issue ne kawai a hanyarsu. A ranar daya a kan nuclear issue ne, a ranar daban a kan hakkokin dan adam, a ranar daban a kan wasu batutuwan kasarmu, amma duk wadannan batutuwan ne a hanyarsu.</s>

en: What is the real problem?
hau: Mene ne asalin lamarin?

en: The real problem is that the Islamic Republic is safeguarding the great oil and gas resources of the country in a powerful way.
hau: Batu na asali shi ne irin tsayin dakan da tsarin Musulunci ya yi wajen kare arzikin mai da (iskar) gas da Allah ya yi wa wannan kasar.
mt0: <pad> The real problem is that the Islamic Republic is safeguarding the great oil and gas resources of the country in a powerful way.</s>

en: As has always been the case, economic and political power - and the resultant scientific and military power - depend on energy sources, on oil.
hau: Yau da gobe - tamkar jiya- tsayin daka da karfi na tattalin arziki da siyasa bugu da kari kan karfi na ilimi da soji, sun damfara ne da makamashi da man fetur.
mt0: <pad> As always has been the case, economics and politics - and the resultant scientific and military power - depend on energy sources, on oil.</s>

en: The world will need oil and gas for decades and this is an undeniable truth.
hau: Har zuwa shekaru aru-aru masu zuwa duniya za ta kasance tana bukatar mai da iskar gas; wannan wani lamari ne da kowa ya amince da shi.
mt0: <pad> A duniya za ta bukata a mai da gas na shekaru masu yawa, kuma wannan abu ne tabbatacce.</s>

en: The arrogant powers know that their survival depends on oil and gas.

en: Such has been the law of Allah that has indeed run before, and you shall not find a change in Allah's law."
hau: Hanyar Allah wadda ta shude daga gabanin wannan, kuma ba za ka sami musanya ba ga hanyar Allah (ta taimakon muminai a kan mai zaluntarsu) (Suratul Fat'h 48:22-23).
mt0: <pad> 'Wannan shi ne sharia ta Allah da ta riga ta tafi, kuma ba za ka samu a canja sharia ta Allah ba.</s>

en: [The Holy Quran, 48: 22-23] Nowhere in the Holy Quran is it said that if you start a war, you will definitely win it. You might win or lose the war you start, just as the Muslims did not always win the wars they started during the early years after the introduction of Islam: they were defeated in certain cases.
hau: Babu wani waje a cikin Alkur'ani da (Allah Madaukakin Sarki) Ya fadi cewa idan har kuka fara yaki, kuka kai hari, to lalle za ku yi nasara; mai yiyuwa ne ku yi nasara, mai yiyuwa ne ku sha kashi - kamar yadda ya faru a yakukuwan farkon Musulunci, a lokutan da musulmi suka kai hari, a wani wajen sun sha kashi a wani wajen kuma sun yi nasara.
mt0: <pad> [The Holy Quran, 48:22-23] Akwai wurare a Al-Kur'ani da aka ce idan ka fara yaki, za ka lashe. Za ka iya lashe ko kuma lashe yaki da ka fara, kamar yadda Musulmi ba a lokaci dukansu suka lashe yaki da suka fara a zamanin farko bayan kawo Islam: sunyi nasara a wasu ayoyi.</s>

en: But it has been promised that if the enemy attacks, he will definitely be defeated.
hau: To amma (Allah) ya yi alkawarin cewa a duk lokacin da makiya suka fara kawo muku hari, to ko shakka babu za su sha kashi.
mt0: <pad> 'Amma an yi alwashin cewa idan a cigaba da yaki, to a za a ci karfin kowa.</s>

en: You should not say that this is only true of the early years after the introduction of Islam. No, "Such has been the law of Allah that has indeed run before, and you shall not find a change in Allah's law."
hau: Bai kamata a yi zaton hakan lamari ne da ya shafi farkon Musulunci ba; a'a, "Hanyar Allah wadda ta shude daga gabanin wannan, kuma ba za ka sami musanya ba ga hanyar Allah (ta taimakon muminai a kan mai zaluntarsu)", wannan sunna ce ta Ubangiji.
mt0: <pad> 'Wannan ba ya nufin cewa a cikin shekarun da suka fara bayan kawo Musulunci.' "Wannan ne shari'ar Allah, wadda ta riga ta tafi a gabanmu, kuma ba za ku samu a canja shari'ar Allah ba."</s>

en: This is a divine law. The Iranian people are determined and dynamic and they are not thinking of attacking other countries, but they are firmly attached to their identity, to their wealth, to their religion, to their Islamic Republic.
hau: Al'ummar Iran ta yi azama da dukkan nishadi sannan kuma ba ta da nufin kai hari da wuce gona da iri a kan wani; to amma tana da alaka da kuma kaunar mutumcinta, dukiyarta da matsayinta, da Musuluncinta, da Jamhuriyar Musuluncinta da dukkanin karfinta.
mt0: <pad> Hukumar Allah ne. Mutanen Iran suna da karfin gaske, kuma ba su aiwatar da aikin gujewa wasu kasashe, amma sun damu da yadda suke, da kayan su, da addini su, da Jamhuriyar Musulinci ta Iran.</s>

en: That is to say, when you consume domestically produced products, you help Iranian laborers, you create job opportunities, you contribute to Iranian investment, you give rise to growth and development.
hau: Wato a lokacin da kuka zamanto masu saye da amfani da kayayyakin da ake samarwa a cikin gida, to kuna taimakon leburan Iran ne, kuna samar da aikin yi ne, haka nan kuma kuna taimakon zuba jari na al'ummar Iran ne da kuma samar da ci gaba.
mt0: <pad> 'Idan ka ci abinci da aka yi a gida, ka taimaka wa 'yan Iran, ka samar da ayyuka, ka kawo karfin invesment, ka kawo karfin habaka da kuma cigaban kasar.'</s>

en: Consuming foreign products is a wrong cultural norm, which has unfortunately become prevalent in certain portions of our society. Consuming foreign products will harm us. It will stand in the way of our progress.
hau: Wannan al'ada dake cike da kuskure - wadda abin bakin ciki ana iya ganinta tattare da wasu bangarori na al'ummarmu - na amfani da kayayyakin da aka kera a waje, lalle hakan cutarwa ce ga duniyarmu, cutarwa ce ga ci gabanmu da kuma makomarmu.
mt0: <pad> Consuming foreign products is a wrong cultural norm, which has unfortunately become prevalent in some parts of our society. Consuming foreign products will harm us. It will stand in the way of our progress.</s>

en: The government is also responsible: it must support and strengthen national production.
hau: Kowanenmu yana da nauyi a wuyansa, wajibi ne mu goyi baya da karfafa kayayyakin da muke samarwa a cikin gida.
mt0: <pad> The government is also responsible: it must support and strengthen national production.</s>

en: The Majlis should cooperate and the executive branch should make efforts in this regard so that they can boost national production.
hau: Don haka a yau jami'ai suna da wata ajiya a hannunsu, suna iya amfani da hakan wajen karfafa kayayyakin da ake samarwa a cikin gida.
mt0: <pad> The Majlis should cooperate and the executive branch should make efforts in this regard so that they can boost national production.</s>

en: And the people should also cooperate: both those who have capital and those who have the power to work.
hau: Haka nan su ma al'umma - shin wadanda masu jari ne ko kuma wadanda suke da karfin yin aiki - wajibi ne su hada kansu waje guda don gudanar da aiki.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wajibi ga jama'a su hada kai: waɗanda suke da kudi da waɗanda suke da iko na aiki.</s>

en: You dear people should develop a tendency towards Iranian products.
hau: Wajibi ne ku zama masu nema da kuma amfani da kayayyakin da aka samar a cikin gida.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya ku jama'a, kuna bukatar a rika samun tsũrin zuwa kayan Iran.</s>

en: It is wrong to prefer foreign brands - in the case of clothes, utensils, furniture, foodstuffs and other things - to domestic brands while in many cases our domestic products might be far better than their foreign equivalents.
hau: Ba abin alfahari ba ne sannan kuma kuskure ne mu zamanto muna fifita kayayyakin kasashen waje, a cikin gidanmu, a cikin kujerunmu, cikin abubuwan da muke bukata na yau da kullum da kuma abubuwan da muke ci a kan wadanda ake samarwa a cikin gida, alhali kuwa a mafi yawa lokuta kayayyakin cikin gidan ma sun fi na wajen kyau.
mt0: <pad> - Akwai aibu a rika a nzhiri kayan waje - a cikin kayan aiki, kayan aikin gida, kayan abinci, da dai sauransu - a kan kayan waje - alhali kuwa a wasu lokutan kayan waje namu zasu iya zama fiye da kayan waje na waje.</s>

en: I have heard that the clothes which are produced in certain cities across the country are taken abroad and foreign brand names are attached to them, and then they are shipped into the country to be sold as foreign products.
hau: Na ji cewa wasu daga cikin kayayyakin da ake samarwa a wasu garuruwan kasar nan, a kan tafi a sanya musu alamar kamfanonin waje sannan a dawo da su.
mt0: <pad> I have heard that the clothes that are produced in some cities across the country are taken abroad and foreign brand names are attached to them, and then they are shipped into the country to be sold as foreign products.</s>

en: If these clothes do not go through this process, Iranian customers might not like to pay for them, but simply because the clothes bear French brand names, Iranian customers buy them. This is wrong.
hau: Mai yiyuwa ne idan har aka sayar da su a nan mai saye bairaniye ba zai so su ba, to amma da ya ke suna da alamar kamfanin Faransa a jikinsu, shi kenan sai ya je ya sayi wannan rigar ko wandon ko kuma wannan dinkin da aka yi a nan; hakan kuskure ne.
mt0: <pad> Idan wadannan kayan ba su bi wannan tsari ba, masu saye Iran ba za su so su biya su ba, amma saboda kayan suna da lakabi na Faransa, masu saye Iran sun saya. Wannan abu ne ba daidai ba.</s>

en: Domestic production is important.
hau: Kayayyakin da ake samarwa a cikin gida lamari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Domestic production is important.</s>

en: This is part of the effort to reform the norms of consumption, which I discussed with our people in this place two years ago. It is also part of economic jihad, which I discussed last year. National production is important and it must be the goal.
hau: A fagen amfani da kayayyakin da aka samar, mafi yawan aikin yana hannun mutane ne; wanda hakan wani bangare ne na gyara irin yadda ake amfani da albarkatun kasa da shekaru biyun da suka gabata a wannan wajen na kirayi al'ummar Iran zuwa gare shi sannan kuma wani bangare na jihadin karfafa tattalin arzikin da na yi magana a kansa a shekarar da ta gabata. Samar da kayayakin cikin gida lamari ne mai muhimmanci; wajibi ne mu sanya hakan ya zamanto ita ce munafarmu.
mt0: <pad> Idan a ka iya fassara, to a ce a san cewa a lokacin da na kawo wannan taro shekara biyu da suka wuce, zan kawo a nan.</s>

en: Dear people, dear brothers and sisters, today we need unity and solidarity across the country.
hau: Ya ku abin kaunata! 'yan'uwa maza da mata a dukkanin kasar nan, lalle a yau din nan muna bukatar hadin kai da aiki tare.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya Allah, ya 'yan'uwa, ya 'ya'yanmu, a yau muna bukatar hadin kai da solidarity a duk fadin kasar nan.</s>

en: There are many pretexts for discord.
hau: Akwai abubuwan da suke haifar da sabani da rarrabuwan kai da yawa.
mt0: <pad> a yawanci akwai dalilai da dama na samun rabuwar jama'a.</s>

en: In the case of certain issues not even two people have the same opinion. This must not become a pretext for discord.
hau: A wasu lokuta a cikin lamari guda a kan sami cewa ra'ayi da yadda mutane biyu suke kallon lamari ya bambanta; to amma bai kamata hakan ya zamanto abin da zai haifar da sabani ba.
mt0: <pad> In wasu batutuwan, ba ma biyu ne suke da ra'ayi iri daya. Wannan ya kamata ba ya zama ainihin abin da za a kawo fada.</s>

en: Sometimes a person might have a certain tendency that might not be shared by other people, but this must not become a source of discord.
hau: A wani lokaci a kan sami wannan mutumin yana da wannan ra'ayi, wani kuma yana da wani ra'ayin na daban, bai kamata hakan ya zamanto abin da zai haifar da sabani ba.
mt0: <pad> Kadang kala mutum nĩ gũkorwo na rĩmwe rĩa ũndũ ũrĩa ũngĩ nĩ ũrĩa ũngĩ nĩ ũrĩa ũngĩ nĩ ũrĩa ũngĩ nĩ ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũrĩa ũr

en: The Holy Quran teaches us, "And do not quarrel for then you will be weak in hearts and your power will depart." [The Holy Quran, 8: 46] If we quarrel about different issues - political issues, economic issues, personal issues - if we fight with each other, our enemy will be encouraged.
hau: Alkur'ani mai girma ya karantar da mu cewa: "kuma kada ku yi jayayya har ku raunana kuma iskarku ta tafi" (Suratul Anfal 8:46), idan har muka yi jayayya cikin lamurra daban-daban - batutuwa na siyasa, na tattalin arziki da batutuwa na kashin kai - muka kama kwalar rigunan junanmu, to kuwa makiyanmu za su sami karfin gwuiwa.
mt0: <pad> Quran mai tsarki ya ce mana, "Kada ku fada a tsakãnku, idan kun fada, za ku ragu da zuciya kuma za ku rasa karfi." [The Holy Quran, 8:46] Idan muka fada a kan daban-daban - siyasa, tattali, jiki - idan muka yaki da juna, ainihinmu ne zai samun ƙarfafawa.</s>

en: Some of the courage that our enemy has found in the past years is due to our quarrels.
hau: Irin dan karfin gwuiwan da makiyanmu suka samu a shekarun da suka gabata, sakamakon sabanin da ya kunno kai ne a tsakaninmu.
mt0: <pad> Some of the courage that our enemy has found in the past years is due to our quarrels.</s>

en: The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) teaches us a lesson.
hau: Amirul Muminin (a.s) yana koyarwa da mu, yana fadin cewa: 'Wanda ya nemi gaskiya amma ya kuskure, bai yi daidai da wanda ya nemi karya kuma ya same ta ba".
mt0: <pad> Imami na Muminai (a.s) ya koyar da mu darasi.</s>

en: Opponents are of two kinds. One kind of opponent wants the truth, the Islamic Republic, the Revolution, Islam and God, but he might choose the wrong path.
hau: Wani dan adawan ya kasance yana neman gaskiya ne, yana son Jamhuriyar Musulunci, yana son juyin juya halin Musulunci yana kuma kaunar addini da kuma Allah Madaukakin Sarki, to amma ya kuskure hanya ne; bai kamata a yi gaba da shi ba.
mt0: <pad> Opponents are two kinds. One kind of opponent wants the truth, the Islamic Republic, the Revolution, Islam and God, but he may choose the wrong path.</s>

en: Such opponents are different from those who work against the Islamic system and pursue hostile objectives.
hau: Ya bambanta da mutumin da ya kama hanyar da ta saba wa tsarin Musulunci sannan kuma yana kiyayya da tsarin Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> Irin wadannan masu adawa da Musulunci ba su da bambanci da wadanda suke aiki a kan tsarin Musulunci kuma suna kokarin cimma sasaran adawa.</s>

en: Make hearts tender towards each other and treat each other with more kindness. Unfortunately these electronic and internet media outlets have prepared the ground for widespread slander.
hau: Ku tausasa zukata, mu'amalarku da juna ta zamanto cikin so da kauna. Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa wadannan kafafen watsa labarai na zamani da hanyar sadarwa ta internet sun ba da damar mutane su dinga fadin munanan maganganu dangane da junansu.
mt0: <pad> 'Yi a rabu da juna, kuma a tafi da juna da ƙauna.</s>

en: However, the most important factor is that we should feel committed to observing the Islamic rules of conduct. We should feel committed to observing the law.
hau: To sai dai tushen lamarin shi ne cewa mu da kanmu mu ji cewa wajibi ne mu misaltu da kyawawan halaye na Musulunci; mu dinga girmama doka.
mt0: <pad> However, the most important factor is that we should feel committed to observing the Islamic rules of conduct. We should feel committed to observing the law.</s>

en: My statement must not be used as a pretext to criticize and persecute our revolutionary youth as extremists.
hau: To sai dai bai kamata a dauki wannan maganar tawa a matsayin wani abin da za a fake da shi wasu mutane su je su dinga zargi da fadin wasu maganganu marasa dadi kan matasanmu masu kishin juyi a matsayin masu tsaurin ra'ayi.
mt0: <pad> My statement must not be used as a pretext to criticize and prosecute our revolutionary young people as extremists.</s>

en: No, I consider all our proud youth and all our faithful and revolutionary youth as my own children and I support them. I support our revolutionary, faithful and proud youth, but I also advise everybody to observe the Islamic rules of conduct and the law in their behavior.
hau: A'a ni dai ina ganin dukkanin matasan kasar nan masu kishi, muminai masu riko da wannan juyin a matsayin 'ya'yana sannan kuma ina goyon bayansu; lalle ni ina goyon bayan matasa muminai masu kishin juyin juya halin Musulunci; to sai dai kuma ina kiran kowa da kowa zuwa misaltuwa da kyawawan halaye na Musulunci; su girmama doka.
mt0: <pad> No, I consider all our proud young people and all our faithful and revolutionary young people as my own children and I support them. I support our revolutionary, faithful and proud young people, but I also advise everyone to observe the Islamic rules of conduct and the law in their behavior.</s>

en: Everybody must observe the law.
hau: Wajibi ne kowa ya girmama doka.
mt0: <pad> kowa ya kamata ya bi dokar.</s>

en: The Constitution of the Islamic Republic embodies the values of the Revolution.
hau: Riko da juyin juya halin Musulunci yana cikin kundin tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> The Constitution of the Islamic Republic embodies the values of the Revolution.</s>

en: The same is true of our government officials.
hau: Haka lamarin yake dangane da jami'an Iran.
mt0: <pad> Same goes for our government officials.</s>

en: The executive branch must not undermine the authority of the Majlis. Similarly the Majlis must not undermine the authority of the executive branch and the President.
hau: Gwamnati ta girmama hurumin majalisa, ita ma majalisa ta girmama hurumin gwamnati da shugaban kasa; su zamanto tare da juna da aiki kafada da kafada.
mt0: <pad> The executive branch must not undermine the power of the Majlis. Likewise, the Majlis must not undermine the power of the executive branch and the President.</s>

en: They must work together and cooperate. This does not mean that everybody should think in the same way.
hau: Hakan ba yana nufin dukkaninsu su zamanto masu tunani da ra'ayi daya ba; ba kuma shi ne cewa idan har suka zamanto suna da ra'ayi mabambanta shi kenan sai kowa ya kama wuyan dan'uwansa ba.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata su aiki tare da hada kai. Wannan ba yana nufin cewa kowa ya kamata ya yi tunani yadda yake.</s>

en: I hope the year 1391, which starts from today, will be full of dynamism, activity, success and happiness for the people of Iran.
hau: Ina fatan wannan shekarar ta 1391 wacce ta fara daga yau, za ta zamanto daga cikin shekaru masu cike da nishadi, aiki tukura, nasarori da kuma faranta rai ga al'ummar Iran.
mt0: <pad> I hope the year 1391, which starts from today, will be full of dynamism, activity, success and happiness for the people of Iran.</s>

en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad (s.w.a.) and his household, make our dear youth and people steadfast on the straight path.
hau: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Albarkacin Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu, ka tabbatar da matasanmu masu girma, al'ummarmu masu girma a kan mikakken tafarki.
mt0: <pad> Allah, a cikin albarkatu Muhammad (s.w.a.) da iyalan Muhammad (s.w.a.), ka sanya mu matasa da jama'a a kan hanyar gaskiya.</s>

en: Dear God, suppress and defeat the enemies of this nation.
hau: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka ruguza makiyan wannan al'umma.
mt0: <pad> Allah, smother and defeat the enemies of this nation.</s>

en: Make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age (a.s.) satisfied and happy with us and help us benefit from his prayers.
hau: Ka isar da wannan al'umma mai girma da tsayin daka zuwa ga manufar da ta sa a gaba. Ka sanya zuciyar mai girma Waliyul Asr ta zamanto ta yarda da mu, sannan kuma ka sanya mu cikin addu'oinsa.
mt0: <pad> Allah ya sa Imamin zamani (a.s.) ya so mu, ya kuma ba mu damar amfana da ayyukansa.</s>

en: Shrine - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of the speech delivered on March 21, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of Islamic Revolution to a large gathering of pilgrims at Imam Ridha's (a.s.) shrine in the holy city of Mashhad.
hau: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i ya yi ne a ranar 21, Maris 2013 a lokacin ganawarsa da dubun dubatan mutane a haramin Imam Ridha (a.s) da ke birnin Mashhad a ranar farko ta sabuwar shekarar 1392 hijira shamsiyya:
mt0: <pad> Ayatollah Khamenei - Leader of Islamic Revolution</s>

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
hau: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai
mt0: <pad> Allah ne mai yawan alheri, mai rahama.</s>

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings be upon our Master and Prophet and the love of our hearts, Ab-al-Qassem al-Mustafa Muhammad, upon his immaculate, pure, chosen and infallible household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
hau: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai.
mt0: <pad> All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and blessings be upon our Master and Prophet and the love of our hearts, Ab-al-Qassem al-Mustafa Muhammad, upon his immaculate, pure, chosen and infallible family, especially the one who remained with Allah on earth.</s>

en: Greetings be upon Seddiqah at-Tahirah Fatima, the daughter of the Messenger of Allah.
hau: Amincin Allah ya tabbata ga Siddikatut Tahira Fatima 'yar Manzon Allah, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare ta da Mahaifinta da Mijinta da 'ya'yanta.
mt0: <pad> 'Salamu alaykum Fatima al-Tahirah, daughter of the Messenger of Allah.</s>

en: I extend my greetings and congratulations to all the dear brothers and sisters who have attended this warm and enthusiastic meeting, and from the depth of my heart I am thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave me one more opportunity to be present at the holy shrine of Hazrat Abul-Hassan ar-Ridha (many greetings be upon him) on another Norouz and meet with you dear people of Mashhad and the esteemed pilgrims who have come here from different parts of the country.
hau: Ina isar da gaisuwa da kuma taya murna ga dukkanin 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma da suka halarci wannan taro mai girma.
mt0: <pad> I extend my greetings and congratulations to all the dear brothers and sisters who have attended this warm and enthusiastic meeting, and from the depth of my heart I am thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave me another opportunity to be present at the holy shrine of Hazrat Abul-Hassan ar-Ridha (may peace be upon him) on another Norouz and meet you dear people of Mashhad and the esteemed pilgrims who have come here from different parts of the country.</s>

en: I ask Allah the Exalted to guide our hearts and tongues to accommodate and say whatever that satisfies Him.
hau: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya shiryar da zukatanmu da harsunanmu zuwa ga abubuwan yardarsa.
mt0: <pad> I wanna Allah the Exalted to guide our hearts and tongues to accommodate and say whatever that satisfies Him.</s>

en: And this is a great blessing that every year on Norouz I find the opportunity to see the joys and beauties that are inherent to Norouz and at the same time evaluate current issues and conditions of the country among you people, take a look at our past and future and have brief evaluation of our large-scale national conditions. It is necessary for us to evaluate ourselves in the case of our personal matters.
hau: Lalle wannan wata dacewa ce a gare na cewa a kowace shekara, a irin wannan rana ta idin Nourouz, cikin irin wannan farin ciki da annashuwa ta al'umma, in sami damar da kasantuwa a cikinku da kuma tattunawa kan batutuwan da suka shafi kasar nan, yanayin da ake ciki, sannan kuma mu yi dubi zuwa ga abubuwan da suka faru a baya da kuma wadanda za su faru nan gaba. A takaice dai mu yi dubi a yanayi na gaba daya cikin abubuwan da suka faru cikin shekara.
mt0: <pad> 'I am very happy that every year on the day of Norouz I find the opportunity to see the joys and beauties that are inherent to Norouz and at the same time evaluate current issues and conditions of the country among you people, take a look at our past and future and have brief evaluation of our large-scale national conditions. It is necessary for us to evaluate ourselves in the case of our personal matters.</s>

en: We should review everything that has happened to us and try to learn lessons for the future. The dear brothers and sisters should pay attention to the fact that we people of Iran are not the only ones who try to study, track and evaluate our issues.
hau: Yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, ya kamata ku fahimci cewa, mu al'ummar Iran, ba mu kadai ne mu ke sanya ido kan lamurranmu da kuma yi musu hisabi ba, akwai wasu mutane na daban da suke sanya ido kan ayyukanmu, su yi hukumci da kuma bayyana ra'ayinsu kan batutuwan da suka shafe mu da kuma abubuwan da muke yi.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata mu duba duk abin da ya faru a garemu kuma mu koya wa kanmu darasi don makomarmu. Ya kamata 'yan uwa na jini su lura cewa ba mu ne kawai muke koyon, gano, da kuma auna matsalolinmu.</s>

en: There are certain nations that are making use of our experiences. There are also certain other nations that are studying the conditions of the Iranian nation: they become happy whenever we make advances and achievements.
hau: Akwai wadansu al'ummomin da suke amfanuwa da irin kwarewar da muka samu. Suna sanya ido kan yanayin al'ummar Iran, su kan yi farin ciki kan duk wata nasara da muka samu.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wasu kasashen da suke amfani da abubuwan da muka yi. Akwai kuma wasu kasashen da suke nazarin halin kasar Iran: sunyi farin ciki a duk lokacin da muka yi ci gaba da nasara.</s>

en: If we achieve a victory, they feel victorious and if we fail, they feel that they have failed as well.
hau: Idan har muka sami wata nasara, su kan ji cewa sun yi nasara, haka nan kuma idan wani abin bakin cikin ya same mu, su kan ji zafi da bakin ciki.
mt0: <pad> idan muka samu nasara, su ji nasara, idan muka fadi, su ji cewa su ma sun fadi.</s>

en: There are other people in the world who carefully study everything that we do: these people become happy whenever we make mistakes and they feel disappointed whenever we succeed.
hau: Haka nan kuma akwai wasu mutanen a duniya wadanda suke sa ido kan ayyukanmu, sai dai su sabanin wadancan na farkon ne.
mt0: <pad> a duniya akwai wasu mutane da suke nazarin duk abin da muka yi: wadannan mutane suna farin ciki idan muka yi kuskure kuma su ji nadamar idan muka ci nasara.</s>

en: They are the ill-wishers of the Iranian nation.

mt0: <pad> They are the bad-wishers of the Iranian nation.</s>

en: They too are carefully studying whatever we do. The majority of them are the same people who used to have full control over every affair of our country for many years.
hau: Su din nan a mafiya yawan lokuta su ne wadanda shekara da shekaru suka kasance suna rike da dukkanin lamurran da suka shafi kasar nan, su ne suke iko da dukkanin lamurran kasar nan.
mt0: <pad> 'Su ma suna aunawa duk abin da muka yi. A mafi yawansu, su ne ainihin mutanen da suka rike iko a kan kowane al'amari na kasarmu na shekaru masu yawa.</s>

en: The Revolution came and put an end to their domination.

mt0: <pad> The Revolution came and put an end to their domination.</s>

en: For this reason, they are opposed to the Revolution. They are opposed to revolutionary people.
hau: A saboda haka ne suke adawa da wannan juyin, suke adawa da gwamnatin da juyin ya samar da kuma wannan tsarin.
mt0: <pad> Kwamfuta a kansu, a kansu ne suke adawa da 'yan tawaye. A kansu ne suke adawa da 'yan tawaye.</s>

en: Therefore, we are being watched carefully by a large number of people in the world.

mt0: <pad> Therefore, a large number of people in the world are watching us carefully.</s>

en: Therefore, we should be realistic in our evaluation of our performance in the past and the plans we have for the future.

mt0: <pad> Therefore, we should be realistic in our evaluation of our performance in the past and the plans we have for the future.</s>

mt0: <pad> Bamwe a cikin kasarmu kawai suna ganin abubuwan da suka yiwu a lokacin da suke duba halin kasarmu.</s>

mt0: <pad> Kawai su ga yawan kudin. Kawai su ga ragewar aiwatarwa a wasu sassa.</s>
