en: When I look at the conditions of our country and our nation, I see a vast arena that is full of challenges, and the Iranian nation has been proud and victorious in this arena despite the will of the enemies.
hau: A lokacin da nake kallon yanayin kasar nan da yanayin al'ummarmu, ina kallon wani shararren fage ne da ke cike da kalubale, to sai kuma al'ummar Iran su ne suka sami nasara a wannan fagen duk kuwa da kiyayyar da makiya suke nunawa.
mt0: <pad> 'I look at our country and our nation, I see a vast arena that is full of challenges, and the Iranian nation has been proud and victorious in this arena despite the will of the enemies.</s>

en: There are certain weaknesses and problems. There have been certain bitter events among the things that have happened in our country. Certain materialistic powers did everything in their power to cripple the Iranian nation.
hau: Babu shakka akwai rauni da kuma matsalolin da ake da su; a cikin abubuwan da suke faruwa a kasar nan akwai abubuwa masu bakanta rai. Akwai wadansu mutane daga cikin masu takama da karfi na duniya da suke aiki ba dare ba rana wajen gurguntar da al'ummar Iran, su da kansu suke fadin hakan.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wasu aibi da kuma matsaloli. Akwai wasu abubuwa masu tsauri a cikin abubuwan da suka faru a kasarmu. Wasu 'yan uwa na duniya sun yi iya kokarin su kashe al'ummar Iran.</s>

mt0: <pad> They announced this. The incompetent lady who was responsible for America's foreign policy boldly announced that they wanted to impose certain sanctions on the Islamic Republic in order to cripple Iran.</s>

mt0: <pad> A hannu guda, akwai masu adawa da suke kokari a wannan babban taro na fada-fada tsakanin al'ummar Iran da masu adawa da ita, a hannu guda kuma, akwai manyan nasarorin da ke nuna yadda ƙarfin, iko da kuma ilimi na kasarmu babbar kasa ya iya.</s>

en: This vast arena is like the arena of competition between powerful athletes, which involves efforts and exhaustion, but a true champion achieves victory in such arenas and makes everybody praise him.

mt0: <pad> wanna babban wuri ya tafi daidai da wurin yakin a tsakanin masu iko, wanda ya kunshi kokari da gajiyarwa, amma wani jarumi na gaskiya ya ci nasara a irin wannan wuri kuma ya sa kowa ya bashi goro.</s>

en: Among the enemies and ill-wishers of the Iranian nation, there are certain political and academic elites and certain experienced individuals who are watching the conditions and are praising the Iranian nation.

en: The enemies who do not want to see the Iranian nation making comprehensive progress are pursuing two main goals. One of their goals is to create as many obstacles in the way of our nation as they can in order to prevent the Iranian nation from achieving progress and development.
hau: Makiyan da ba sa fatan ganin irin wadannan ci gaban da al'ummar Iran suka samu a dukkanin fagage, suna da wasu tsare-tsare guda biyu na asali: na farko shi ne cewa gwargwadon yadda za su iya, za su yi dukkanin abin da za su yi wajen ganin al'ummar Iran ba su sami irin wannan ci gaban ba.
mt0: <pad> 'yan adawa wadanda ba su so a ga kasar Iran ta ci gaba ba suna kokarin cimma biyu manyan burin. Babban burin su na farko shi ne su kawo yawancin hanyoyi a hanyar kasarmu yadda za su iya don su hana kasar Iran ta ci gaba da kuma ci gabanta.</s>

en: They try to achieve this goal through sanctions, threats, keeping our managers busy with secondary issues and diverting the attention of the great Iranian nation and outstanding personalities of the country to issues that are not on the list of our priorities. The second goal is to deny our advances in their propaganda campaigns. Today there is a massive propaganda network in the world with thousands of different types of media outlets whose goal is to prove that there are no advances in Iran, to deny the victories that the Iranian has achieved, to magnify the existing weaknesses and attract everybody's attention to them, and to hide the strengths that exist in different parts of the country and are visible to just and impartial people.
hau: Za su yi hakan ne ta hanyar sanya takunkumi, ta hanyar barazana, ta hanyar shagaltar da jami'an gwamnati da wasu ayyuka na bayan fage, ta hanyar kawar da tunani da hankulan al'umma da masanan Iran daga manyan ayyuka masu muhimmanci; wato hana su gudanar da ayyuka masu amfani. Abu na biyu shi ne cewa su dinga inkari da musanta wadannan ci gaban da aka samu a kafafen watsa labaransu. A halin yanzu dai akwai dubban kafafen watsa labarai daban-daban a duniya da suka shagaltu da wannan aikin don su nuna wa duniya cewa babu wani ci gaban da al'ummar Iran suka samu.
mt0: <pad> They try to achieve this goal through sanctions, threats, keeping our managers busy with secondary issues and diverting the attention of the great Iranian nation and its outstanding personalities to issues that are not on the list of our priorities. The second goal is to deny our advances in their propaganda campaigns. Today there is a mass network of propaganda in the world with thousands of different kinds of media outlets whose goal is to prove that there are no advances in Iran, to deny the victories that the Iranian has achieved, to magnify the existing weaknesses and attract everybody's attention to them, and to hide the strengths that exist in different parts of the country and are visible to just and impartial people.</s>

en: In his official addresses, the American president speaks about Iran's economic problems as if he is speaking about his victories.

mt0: <pad> In his official addresses, the American president speaks about Iran's economic problems as if he is speaking about his victories.</s>

en: Of course, he has not mentioned the strengths that our nation enjoys, the positive and constructive efforts that are being made in our country and the great victories that our nation has achieved. And he will never mention such things. We have been faced with this challenge for thirty years and I will present a brief evaluation of the past thirty years later on in my speech.
hau: To sai dai kuma bai yi ishara da irin ayyuka masu kyau da aka yi a kasar nan ba, da kuma irin manyan nasarorin da al'ummar Iran suka samu ba. Shekaru talatin kenan mu ke fuskantar irin wadannan kalubalen - wanda a nan gaba zan yi karin haske kan abubuwan da aka cimma tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin din - babu abin da ba su yi ba wajen hana kasar nan ci gaba karkashin inuwar tutar Musulunci da ake rayuwa a karkashinta.

en: In this regard, the year 1391, which has come to an end, was one the busiest years for our enemies.

mt0: <pad> In this regard, the year 1391, which has come to an end, was one of the busiest years for our enemies.</s>

en: If the Islamic Republic stands firm, remains vibrant and continues making progress, they will lose credibility in the world.

en: For this reason, they do their best to stop us and if things get out of hand, they at least try to present a different story in their propaganda campaigns.

en: They are pursuing these two goals more seriously than in the past: they are trying to create obstacles in our way - through pressure, threats, sanctions and other such things - and they are also launching propaganda campaigns to discount our strengths and to magnify our weaknesses.

mt0: <pad> They are pursuing these two goals more seriously than in the past: they are trying to create obstacles in our way - through pressure, threats, sanctions and other such things - and they are also launching propaganda campaigns to discount our strengths and to magnify our weaknesses.</s>

mt0: <pad> I would like to take this opportunity to point out that the French government officials have been openly hostile towards the Iranian nation over the past few years and this is not a clever move by the French government officials.</s>

en: The events that happened in the year 1391 contain a big lesson for us. The lesson is that a vibrant nation will never be brought to its knees as a result of the enemies' threats, pressure and harsh measures.
hau: Akwai darussa masu girma cikin abubuwan da suka faru a shekara ta 1391 a gare mu; wannan darasin kuwa shi ne cewa duk wata al'ummar da take a raye, to barazana da matsin lamba da takuri na makiya ba za su taba dunkufar da ita ba.
mt0: <pad> Abubuwan da suka faru a shekara ta 1391 sun bamu babbar darasi. Darasi din shine cewa, al'umma mai karfi ba za ta taba samun tsoro, matsi da kuma matakan tsanani na adawa.</s>

en: It became clear to us and to all those who follow up the issues of Iran that what is important for a nation is relying on its own capacities, trusting Allah the Exalted, having faith in itself and not relying on its enemies.

mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata mu da duk wadanda suke bin labarai na Iran su sani cewa abin da ya fi muhimmanci ga kasa ita ce a dogara da ita, a dogara da Allah mai girma, a dogara da ita, a dogara da ita, a dogara da ita, a dogara da ita, a dogara da ita.</s>

en: Another great lesson that we learnt was that our country enjoys firm foundations.

mt0: <pad> Another great lesson we learned was that our country enjoys firm foundations.</s>

en: When the foundations of a country become firm, the effect of the enemies' hostile actions is minimized.

en: In this great country which enjoys firm foundations, if government officials accept their responsibility and adopt wise measures, if managers stay together and cooperate - which is my constant advice to our government officials and managers - if our managers act in a wise and intelligent way, then we can turn every threat into an opportunity, just as we did in the year 1391 and managed to move forward.
hau: Idan har jami'an kasar nan mai girma da kuma irin wannan tushe mai karfi suka fahimci nauyin da ke wuyansu, suka gudanar da aikinsu yadda ya kamata, to a nan ne za su sami damar mayar da duk wata barazana zuwa ga wata dama; kamar yadda a shekarar 1391 muka mayar da barazanar makiya zuwa ga wata dama ta ciyar da kanmu gaba.
mt0: <pad> a wannan babban kasa mai karfin jiki, idan 'yan majalisar dokoki sun yadda da alhakin su kuma su dauki matakai masu hikima, idan manajoji su zauna tare kuma su hada kai - wanda shine shawarata a gare mu ga manajoji da manajoji na mu - idan manajoji mu aiki ta hanyar hikima da fasaha, to za mu iya juya duk wata barazana zuwa dama, kamar yadda muka yi a shekara 1391 kuma muka iya ci gaba.</s>

en: What our government officials and dear people achieved in the year 1391 will hopefully reveal its effects in the life of the people in the future.

mt0: <pad> What our government officials and dear people achieved in the year 1391 will hopefully show its effects on the lives of the people in the future.</s>

en: Of course, the economy of the country is an important issue and I have constantly stressed its importance over the past few years, but it is not the only issue. Our national security is important too. Public health is important too.
hau: Tabbas tattalin arziki lamari ne mai muhimmanci wanda cikin 'yan shekarun nan na sha magana kan hakan, to amma tattalin arzikin ba shi ne kawai lamari mai muhimmanci ba; tsaron kasa ma yana da muhimmanci, lafiyar mutane tana da muhimmanci, ci gaba na ilimi yana da muhimmanci, shi ne ma tushe da asasin aiki.
mt0: <pad> A tabbas, tattalin arziki na kasa abu ne babba kuma na rika jaddada muhimmancinsa a cikin shekaru da suka wuce, amma ba shi ne kawai. Tsirri-munafikunmu na kasa ma yana da muhimmanci. Lafiyar jama'a ma yana da muhimmanci.</s>

en: If our country makes progress in science, all the other things will become easy.

en: Regional influence and power of a nation is the support of its independence and national security, and it is important.
hau: Yanci da daukaka ta kasa ma suna da muhimmanci, rashin yin maula da mika wuyan wata al'umma lamari ne mai muhimmanci, tasir icikin lamurra na yanki a wajen wata al'umma da kuma wata kasa lamari ne da ke tabbatar da 'yanci da tsaro na wannan kasar, shi ma lamari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Influence da karfin yankin na kasa ne shine yadda ta rike 'yancinta da tsaro na kasa, kuma yana da amfani.</s>

en: We have made progress in all these areas.

en: We have made progress in the area of security, in the area of health, in the area of gaining international influence and in the area of controlling different events that happen in the country and in the region.
hau: A bangaren tsaro ne ko kuma a bangaren lafiya, haka nan a bangaren tasiri na kasa da kasa da kuma iko da magance matsaloli daban-daban da kasar nan ta fuskanta.
mt0: <pad> 'Muna ci gaba a fannin tsaro, a fannin lafiya, a fannin samun ƙarfin duniya, a fannin tafiyar da abubuwan da ke faruwa a kasarmu da yankin.</s>

en: Through its advances, our nation proved that refusing to live under the hegemony of America does not mean backwardness. This is an important point.
hau: Ta hanyar irin wadannan ci gaban, al'ummarmu ta tabbatar da cewa rashin zama karkashin ikon Amurka ba yana nufin koma baya ba ne; lalle wannan lamari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga cigabanmu, kasarmu ta nuna cewa kin morar a karkashin hegemony na Amurka ba ya nufin kasancewa a baya. Wannan shine batu mai amfani.</s>

en: Powerful people of the world and colonialists - at a time when there was direct colonialism - tried to prove to nations of the world that if they wanted to have a good life and make progress, they had to live under their hegemony. And today America is doing the same thing.
hau: Masu takama da karfi na duniya da 'yan mulkin mallaka - a lokacin da ake mulkin mallaka kai tsaye - a yau kuma Amurka tana son ta nuna wa al'ummomin duniya cewa matukar dai kuna son rayuwa mai kyau da kuma samun ci gaba, to wajibi ne ku kasance karkashin ikon mu.
mt0: <pad> 'Yena kowa ya san cewa, a zamanin da ake samun colonialism, mutane masu karfi a duniya da kuma 'yan mulkin mallaka - a lokacin da ake samun colonialism na tsaye - sun kokarin nuna wa al'ummomin duniya cewa idan su wanna samun rayuwa mai kyau da ci gaba, su wanna rayu a karkashin 'yancinsu.'</s>

en: The Iranian nation proved that this is a lie.
hau: Al'ummar Iran ta tabbatar da cewa hakan karya ce.
mt0: <pad> Iran ya tabbatar da cewa wannan ƙarya ne.</s>

en: Our nation proved that being independent of America and other superpowers not only will not cause backwardness, but it will also bring about progress.
hau: Al'ummarmu ta tabbatar da cewa rashin dogaro da Amurka da sauran manyan kasashen duniya ba wai kawai ba zai kawo ci baya ba ne, kai yana ma kawo ci gaba ne.
mt0: <pad> 'Yammarmu ta tabbatar da cewa kasancewa a kan kanka daga Amurka da sauran manyan ƙasashe ba kawai za ta haifar da tsũru, amma kuma za ta kawo ci gaban.</s>

en: There were certain countries that attached themselves to America's tail and followed it.
hau: Akwai irin wadannan kasashen da suka damfara kansu da Amurka.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wasu kasashe da suka sangkuta kansu a Amerika's ƙafa kuma suka bi ta.</s>

en: Thirty years of experience lie in front of our eyes. Notice what has happened in the thirty years that the Islamic Republic has been in power. Notice where the Islamic Republic and the Iranian nation used to be and where they are now.
hau: Muna da irin wannan kwarewar ta shekaru talatin. Ku duba ku ga yadda shekaru talatin na Jamhuriyar Musulunci suka kasance sannan kuma wani irin matsayi Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta kai sannan su kuma wadancan kasashen ina suke.
mt0: <pad> 30 shekara na tarihi ne a gabanmu. Mu duba abin da ya faru a cikin shekaru 30 da Jamhuriyar Musulinci ta Iran ta rike mulki. Mu duba inda Jamhuriyar Musulinci ta Iran da kuma kasar Iran suke da kuma inda su ke yanzu.</s>

en: Anybody who studies this issue will realize that being independent of superpowers is an opportunity for a nation, not a threat.
hau: Duk wanda ya karanci hakan, zai fahimci cewa rashin dogaro da manyan kasashen duniya, wata dama ce ga wata al'umma, ba wai barazana ba.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wanda ya bincike wannan batun zai gane cewa kasancewa a kan kanka daga manyan ƙasashe a lokacin da ake samun damar a kasa, ba trusselo.</s>

en: And thankfully the Iranian nation has achieved this opportunity by relying on its power, its courage and its intelligence.
hau: Alhamdu lillahi al'ummar Iran, albarkacin irin karfi da jaruntaka da kuma sanin ya kamatanta, ta yi amfani da wannan damar.
mt0: <pad> A gafara, kasar Iran ta samu wannan dama ta dogara da karfinta, jarumtaka da kuma ilimi.</s>

en: In certain cases, we acted like this and we witnesses the resulting success.
hau: A baya mun taba yin hakan a wani lokaci sannan kuma mun ga nasararsa.
mt0: <pad> In wasu ainihin lamarin, munyi haka kuma mun shaida yadda hakan ya yi amfani.</s>

en: One example is the issue of producing twenty-percent enriched fuel for the research reactor in Tehran, which produces the important radiopharmaceuticals that our country needs.
hau: Misalin hakan shi ne batun samar da makamashin nukiliya kashi ashirin cikin dari da cibiyar bincike ta Tehran take bukata inda ake samar da magunguna masu muhimmanci da kasar nan take bukata.
mt0: <pad> An misalin shine yadda za'a samar da mai kashi twenty percent na kayan aiki na reactor na bincike a Tehran, wanda ya samar da magunguna radioactive masu amfani da radiyo da kasarmu ke bukata.</s>

en: This small power plant required twenty-percent enriched fuel.
hau: Wannan karamar cibiya tana bukatar makamashi kashi ashirin cikin dari, wanda a lokacin ba ma samar da wannan makashin, mu kan shigo da shi ne daga waje.
mt0: <pad> wanna dogo power plant ya bukata mai kashi twenty percent na fuel enriched.</s>

en: They decided to use this national need to force the Islamic Republic to give in to their imposition and hegemony.
hau: Su yi kafar ungulu ga wannan bukata ta kasa, don su tilasta wa Jamhuriyar Musulunci amincewa da abubuwan da suka gabatar da kuma bukatunsu.
mt0: <pad> They decided to use this national need to force the Islamic Republic to give in to their imposition and hegemony.</s>

en: Before the conditions became critical, our youth and scientists managed to produce twenty-percent enriched fuel and they turned it into fuel rods that were needed at the power plant.
hau: To amma kafin ma lamarin ya kai ga matsayin da zai iya zama mana matsala sai matasa da masananmu suka mike suka samar da makamashin da aka tace shi kashi ashirin cikin darin don lamunce abin da wannan cibiyar take bukata.
mt0: <pad> Before the conditions became critical, our young people and scientists managed to produce 20% enriched fuel and they converted it into fuel rods that were needed at the power plant.</s>

en: Our opponents could not guess that we would be able to do what we did.
hau: Masu adawa da mu ba su taba tsammanin za mu iya yin hakan ba.
mt0: <pad> 'Yan adawa namu ba su iya hango cewa za mu iya yin abin da muka yi.</s>

en: However, our government officials identified this need in time and started working.
hau: To amma a kan lokaci jami'an gwamnatinmu suka fahimci wannan bukata da ake da ita, don haka suka dukufa, aka karfafa irin wannan karewa ta al'ummar Iran sannan kuma muka sami nasarar yin hakan.
mt0: <pad> Namun, wakilan gwamnatinmu sun gano wannan bukata a lokaci kuma sun fara aiki.</s>

en: While they expected that the Islamic Republic would beg them for twenty-percent enriched fuel, the Islamic Republic announced that it had produced twenty-percent enriched uranium inside the country and that it did not need the enemies.
hau: A daidai lokacin da suke zaton Jamhuriyar Musulunci za ta zo gabansu tana maula da kaskantar da kai su ba ta makashin da aka tace kashi ashirin cikin dari, nan take Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta sanar da cewa mu mun samar da wannan makamshin don haka ba ma bukatarku.
mt0: <pad> a yayin da suke tsammanin cewa Jamhuriyar Musulmi za ta sumbace su don samun mai kashi twenty percent na uranium, Jamhuriyar Musulmi ta bayyana cewa ta hada uranium kashi twenty percent na uranium a cikin kasar nan kuma ba ta bukatar 'yan adawa ba.</s>

en: If our scientists and youth had not done what they did, today we would have to go to those who are not our friends and ask them for either twenty-percent enriched uranium or radiopharmaceuticals.
hau: Idan da a ce masana da matasanmu ba su yi wannan aikin ba, to da a yau cikin kaskantar da kai da maula da kashe kudade masu tsada da mun tafi wajen mutanen da suke adawa da mu, mu gabatar musu da bukatar su sayar mana da makamashin ko kuma mu dinga bukatar magunguna da abubuwan da ake bukatan.
mt0: <pad> Idan a yanzu a ba mu da ilimi da 'yan mata, a yau za mu dinga zuwa wadanda ba 'yan uwa ba ne, mu tambayi su ko uranium twenty percent enriched ko radiopharmaceuticals.</s>

mt0: <pad> In a economy of resistance, one fundamental pillar is the resistance of the economy.</s>

en: The economy must be resistant. It must be able to withstand the enemies' machinations.

en: This is the first point that I wanted to discuss in this meeting.

en: The second point is that the Americans send messages to us through different channels, asking us to negotiate with them regarding the nuclear issue. They both send messages to us and discuss the proposal in their global propaganda.

mt0: <pad> The second point is that the Americans send messages to us through different channels, asking us to negotiate with them regarding the nuclear issue. They both send messages to us and discuss the proposal in their global propaganda.</s>

en: High- and middle-ranking officials of America repeatedly say that alongside the P5+1 talks regarding the nuclear issue, America and the Islamic Republic should hold one-on-one negotiations over the issue. I am not optimistic about such negotiations.
hau: Manyan jami'ai da na tsaka-tsaki na Amurka, a lokuta daban-daban, suna gaya mana cewa ku zo a bayan fagen tattaunawar 5+1 da ake yi kan batun nukiliya, Amurka da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ma su zauna teburin tattaunawa kan shirin nukiliyan Iran. mt0: <pad> 'Yar umbrella' da 'yaran a cikin 'yaran' na Amurka sun rika cewa, a lokacin da P5+1 talks a kan batun nukilia, Amurka da Iran sunyi tattaunawar 'one-on-one' kan batun. Ni ba na ganin yadda za a yi tattaunawar irin wannan.</s>

en: Why?
hau: Me ya sa?
mt0: <pad> Why?</s>

en: Because our past experiences show that in the logic of the American gentlemen, negotiation does not mean sitting down together to try to reach a rational solution. This is not what they mean by negotiation.

mt0: <pad> Because our past experiences show that in the logic of the American gentlemen, negotiation does not mean sitting down together to try to reach a rational solution. This is not what they mean by negotiation.</s>

en: What they mean is that we should sit down together and talk so that Iran accepts their views.

mt0: <pad> abin da suke nufi shine mu zauna tare mu shawarwari don Iran ya yadda da ainihin ra'ayoyin su.</s>

mt0: <pad> The goal has been announced in advance: Iran must accept their view. For this reason, we have always announced that this is not negotiation.</s>

en: I am not optimistic about these statements, but I am not opposed either.

en: In this regard, there are a few things that I should clarify.

mt0: <pad> a wannan dangane, akwai wasu abubuwa da nake so in bayyana.</s>

en: The first point is that the Americans constantly send messages - sometimes in writing - that they are not after regime change in Iran. This is what they are telling us.
hau: Batu na farko shi ne cewa Amurkawa a kai a kai suna aiko mana da sako, a wani lokaci a rubuce, wani lokacin kuma sako suke aikowa, suna cewa mu dai ba mu da nufin kifar da gwamnatin Musulunci (ta Iran); haka suke gaya mana.
mt0: <pad> A karon farko, Amurka ta aikawa da messages - sometimes in writing - cewa ba su neman sauya tsari a Iran. Wannan ne abin da suke gaya mana.</s>

en: The answer is that we are not concerned about whether or not you have intentions of overthrowing the Islamic Republic although you constantly insist that you do not have such intentions.
hau: Amsarmu ita ce cewa mu dai ba mu damu ko kuna da nufin kifar da tsarin Musulunci ko kuma a'a ba, ballantana ma ku dinga fadi a halin yanzu cewa ku ba ku da niyyar sauya wannan tsari na Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wanda ya san cewa, a halin yanzu, ba mu damuwa ko kun na da nufin rusa Jamhuriyar Islama, duk da cewa kun a lokaci a lokacin a lokacin kuna tabbatarwa cewa kun ba ku da irin wannan nufi.</s>

en: Even the day when you had intentions of overthrowing the Islamic Republic and you announced this openly, you could not do anything, and you will not be able to do anything in the future either.
hau: A wancan lokacin da kuka kasance kuna da niyyar kifar da tsarin Musuluncin, sannan kuma a fili kuke fadin hakan, kun gagara yin wani abu, a nan gaba ma ba za ku iya yin wani abu ba.
mt0: <pad> Even when you had intentions of overthrowing the Islamic Republic and you announced this openly, you could not do anything, and you will not be able to do anything in the future.</s>

en: The second point is that the Americans constantly send us messages, telling us that they are sincere in their offers of rational negotiation.

mt0: <pad> The second point is that the Americans constantly send us messages, telling us that they are sincere in their offer of rational negotiation.</s>

mt0: <pad> They say they sincerely want to have rational negotiations with Iran - that is to say, they say they do not want imposition.</s>

en: In response, I would say, we have told you many times that we are not after nuclear weapons and you say that you do not believe us.

mt0: <pad> Why would we believe your statements then?</s>

en: When you are not prepared to accept a rational and sincere statement, why would we accept your statements which have been disproved many times?

mt0: <pad> 'Idan ba ka ajiye kanka a yadda da shawarwari na hankali da gaskiya, to yaya za mu yadda da shawarwari na ka wanda ya fada da gaske?</s>

en: Our interpretation is that offers of negotiation are an American tactic to mislead public opinion in the world and in our country.

mt0: <pad> Our interpretation is that the offer of negotiation is an American tactic to mislead public opinion in the world and in our country.</s>

en: You should prove that this is not the case.

mt0: <pad> Kawai ka dawo da abin da aka fassara. Idan ba ka iya fassara ainihin maganar, kawai ka ce ba ka sani ba.</s>

en: Can you prove this?

mt0: <pad> Bisa ka tabbatacciya wannan?</s>

en: I would like to take this opportunity to say that one of their propaganda techniques is that they sometimes start rumors that certain people have negotiated with the Americans on behalf of the Leader.

mt0: <pad> I would like to take this opportunity to say that one of their propaganda techniques is that they sometimes start rumors that certain people have negotiated with the Americans on behalf of the Leader.</s>

mt0: <pad> wanna another propaganda tactic and a downright lie</s>

en: So far nobody has negotiated with them on behalf of the Leader.

en: The third point is that on the basis of our experiences and careful analysis of the existing conditions, our interpretation is that the Americans do not want the nuclear negotiations to end.
hau: Batu na uku: shi ne cewa abin da muka fahimta, sakamakon kwarewa da kuma sanya ido kan fage da muke yi, shi ne cewa Amurka dai ba ta son a kawo karshen wannan tattaunawa ta nukiliya.
mt0: <pad> The third point is that on the basis of our experiences and careful analysis of the existing conditions, our interpretation is that the Americans do not want the nuclear negotiations to end.</s>

en: The Americans do not want the nuclear conflict to be resolved, otherwise if they wanted these negotiations to reach a solution, the solution would be very close by and easy to reach.
hau: Amurkawa ba sa son a gama wannan tattaunawa ta nukiliya da kuma magance wannan matsalar. Idan kuwa ba haka ba, idan da suna son a kawo karshenta da kuma magance matsalar, to hanyar magancewar, hanya ce da take a fili kuma mai sauki.
mt0: <pad> The Americans don't want the nuclear conflict to be resolved, otherwise if they wanted these negotiations to reach a solution, the solution would be very close by and easy to reach.</s>

en: In the nuclear issue, Iran only wants the world to recognize its right to enrichment, which is Iran's natural right.
hau: Abin da Iran take so dangane da batun nukiliyan, shi ne kawai duniya ta amince da hakkin da take da shi na tace sinadarin uranium, wanda hakan wani hakkin ta ne.
mt0: <pad> In nuclear issue, Iran only wants the world to recognize its right to enrichment, which is Iran's natural right.</s>

en: Government officials of the countries that are claiming to be after a solution should admit that the Iranian nation has a right to domestic nuclear enrichment for peaceful purposes.
hau: Kasashen da suke takama da karfi na duniya su amince da cewa al'ummar Iran tana da hakkin tace sinadarin uranium don manufa ta zaman lafiya a cikin kasarta sannan kuma da kanta.
mt0: <pad> 'Ya kamata wakilan gwamnatin kasashen da suke ikirarin cewa suna neman shawarwari su yadda cewa Iran yana da hakkin samun kayan nukilia na gida don dalilai na zaman lafiya.</s>

en: Is this too much to expect? This is what we have always demanded, and it is exactly what they do not want [us to have].

mt0: <pad> 'Wannan a ganin cewa a yafi a tsammani?' Wannan shine abin da muka tsammani, kuma hakan ne abin da suka ki mu [mu] samun.</s>

en: They say they are concerned that we might go after producing nuclear weapons.
hau: Suna fadin cewa mu dai muna cikin damuwar cewa ku din nan za ku kama hanyar kera makaman nukiliya.
mt0: <pad> 'Ye a damu da cewa mu zamu iya zuwa ga samar da makaman nukiliya.</s>

en: The ones who are saying this are no more than a few countries whose names I mentioned earlier, and they call themselves "the global community".

mt0: <pad> Akwai ƙasashe da dama da na lissafa a baya, wadanda ake kira "al'ummomin duniya" kuma suna kiran kansu "al'ummomin duniya."</s>

mt0: <pad> They say the global community is worried.</s>

en: No, the global community is not at all concerned.
hau: A'a, kasashen duniya dai ba sa cikin wata damuwa.
mt0: <pad> No, the global community is not at all concerned.</s>

en: The majority of the countries in the world are on the Islamic Republic's side and they support our demand because it is a legitimate demand.
hau: Mafi yawa daga cikin kasashen duniya suna goyon bayan Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma bukatarmu, sun yi hakan ne saboda wannan bukata ta al'ummar Iran wata bukace ta gaskiya.
mt0: <pad> Babban yawan kasashe a duniya suna a kan Islamic Republic's side, kuma su na goyon bayan bukatarmu saboda ita bukata ce halal.</s>

en: We were never opposed to the supervision and regulations of the International Atomic Energy Agency.
hau: Su amince da hakkin da Iran take da shi na tace sinadarin urnium, sannan kuma don kawar da wannan damuwar, suna iya aiwatar da dokokin hukumar kula da makamashin nukiliya ta duniya.
mt0: <pad> 'Ba mu taba adawa da supervision da kuma dokoki na International Atomic Energy Agency.</s>

en: Whenever we are close to a solution, the Americans cause a problem in order to prevent reaching a solution.
hau: A duk lokacin da muka kusan kai wa ga hanyar magance matsalar, nan take Amurkawa za su sanya wata katanka da hana kai wa ga wannan hanya ta magance matsalar.
mt0: <pad> 'Da muka kusa da warware matsalar, Amurka ta kawo matsala don ta hana mu samun warware matsalar.</s>

en: My assumption and interpretation is that their goal is to keep the issue unresolved so that they can have a pretext for exerting pressure on us.
hau: Manufarsu kamar yadda muke iya fahimta ita ce suna son wannan lamarin ya ci gaba ne don su sami abin da za su dinga yin matsin lamba.
mt0: <pad> 'My assumption and interpretation is that their goal is to keep the issue unresolved so that they can have a pretext for exerting pressure on us.'</s>

en: And as they themselves said, the purpose of the pressure is to cripple the Iranian nation. Of course, much to the dismay of the enemy, the Iranian nation will not be crippled.
hau: Wadannan matsin lamba kuwa, kamar yadda su da kansu suke fadi mai gurguntarwa ga al'ummar Iran. Koda yaushe tabbas ba za su iya gurguntar da al'ummar Iran ba.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga abin da su kansu suka ce, ainihin aikin wannan matsi ne ya rage kasar Iran. Tabbas, a babban abin takaici ga 'yan adawa, kasar Iran ba za ta rage ba.</s>

en: The fourth point regarding this issue is that if the Americans sincerely want to reach a solution, I will give them the solution.
hau: Batu na hudu kuma na karshe dangane da wannan lamarin shi ne cewa idan har Amurkawa da gaske suna son a kawo karshen wannan lamarin, to zan gabatar musu da wata mafita.
mt0: <pad> Idan Amurka a zahiri ta so samun wata mafita, zan ba su mafita.</s>

en: The solution is that the Americans should stop being hostile towards the Islamic Republic and the Iranian nation.
hau: Wannan hanya kuwa ita ce: Amurkawa su kawo karshen kiyayyar da suke nunawa Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma al'ummar Iran.
mt0: <pad> The solution is that the Americans should stop being hostile towards the Islamic Republic and the Iranian nation.</s>

en: This is the right solution: they should stop being hostile if they want to put an end to the problems that exist between us - and they announce that they really want to resolve the problems that exist between Iran and America.
hau: Idan har suna son a kawo karshen matsalolin da suke a tsakaninmu - kamar yadda suke fadin cewa muna son ya zamanto babu wata matsala tsakanin Iran da Amurka - to su kawo karshen wannan kiyayyar da suke nuna mana.
mt0: <pad> Idan ba a san yadda za'a yi ba, to a ce a kanka cewa ba a san yadda za'a yi ba: su kamata su daina kasancewa masu adawa da mu idan su na son kawo karshen matsalolin da ke tsakaninsu - kuma su aike cewa su na son kawo karshen matsalolin da ke tsakaninsu a Iran da Amurka.</s>

en: It is thirty-four years that different American administrations have designed various kinds of hostilities towards us based on a wrong understanding of Iran and the Iranians.
hau: Shekaru talatin da hudu kenan gwamnatocin daban-daban na Amurka, sakamakon mummunar fahimtar Iran da al'ummar kasar da suka yi, suke ta tsara makirce-makircen cutar da al'ummar Iran.
mt0: <pad> 'Iyayinda shekara 34 da suka wuce, gwamnatin Amurka daban-daban ta tsara iri-iri na adawa da mu, bisa ga rashin fahimtar Iran da Irani.</s>

en: Since the first year after the victory of the Islamic Revolution and the establishment of the Islamic Republic, they have been hostile towards us.
hau: Tun daga shekarar farko ta nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma kafa gwamnatin Musulunci, suke nuna mana kiyayya.
mt0: <pad> Since the first year after the victory of the Islamic Revolution and the establishment of the Islamic Republic, they have been hostile towards us.</s>

en: They have worked against our economy.
hau: A fagen tsaro, sun tsara shirye-shiryen cutar da tsaronmu; sun gudanar da ayyuka na kiyayya, sun keta mana hurumin kasar mu; sun goyi bayan manya da kananan makiyanmu shekaru aru-aru; sun gudanar da tsare-tsare na cutar da tattalin arzikinmu; sun yi amfani da dukkanin karfin da suke da shi wajen cutar da al'ummar Iran.
mt0: <pad> They have worked against our economy.</s>

en: Therefore, I would like to give a piece of advice to American officials: if they are after a rational solution, the rational solution is that they should rectify their policies. They should rectify the way they act and they should stop being hostile towards the Iranian nation.
hau: A saboda haka ina kiran jami'an Amurka; idan har suna neman hanyar da ta dace da hankali ne, to kuwa hanyar da ta dace da hankalin ita ce su gyara siyasarsu, su gyara ayyukansu sannan kuma su kawo karshen kiyayyar da suke yi da al'ummar Iran. To wannan shi ne karshen wannan bahasin.
mt0: <pad> Don haka, ina so in ba 'yan majalisar dokoki na Amurka shawarwari: idan su na neman mafita ta hankali, mafita ta hankali ita ce su gyara yadda suke aiki. Su gyara yadda suke aiki kuma su daina kasancewa masu adawa da al'ummar Iran.</s>

en: I would like to briefly discuss another issue: the crucial issue of elections.
hau: Akwai wani bahasin na daban wanda ko da a takaice ne wajibi ne in yi ishara da shi, shi ne kuwa batun zabe mai matukar muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> I would like to discuss another issue: the crucial issue of elections.</s>

en: In our country, elections are the manifestation of "political valor".
hau: Zabe a kasarmu wata alama ce ta kumaji na siyasa.
mt0: <pad> In our country, elections are the manifestation of "political valor".</s>

en: Elections are the manifestation of political valor, the manifestation of the power of the Islamic Republic, the manifestation of the pride and credibility of the Islamic system. The credibility of the Islamic Republic depends on elections, the presence of the people at polling stations and their votes that elect managers of the country.
hau: Zabe kuwa, alama ce ta kumaji na siyasa; wata alama ce dake tabbatar da tsayin dakan tsarin Musulunci; alama ce ta mutumcin tsarin. Mutumcin Jamhuriyar Musulunci yana cikin zabe da fitowar mutane a lokacin zabe da kuma tasirin daidaikun mutane cikin zaben jami'an kasa.

en: Elections are the manifestation of our national willpower, the manifestation of Islamic democracy.

en: Therefore, because of the importance that our elections enjoy, the enemies of the Iranian nation have always tried to take enthusiasm and excitement out of the elections.

mt0: <pad> Mafi muhimmanci shine yawan jama'a da suka je zaben.</s>

mt0: <pad> Our dear people in all parts of the country should know this. Their mass presence at the polling stations plays a role in the future of the country, in our national security, in our independence, in our national wealth, in our economy and in other important issues of the country.</s>

en: We have made good advances in sectors related to production, services, agriculture, industry, knowledge-based industries and different other areas which were discussed in this meeting.
hau: Mun sami ci gaba da kyau a bangaren samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata, a bangaren hidima, a bangaren aikin gona, a bangaren masana'antu da sauran bangarori na ilimi da sauransu da aka ambace su a nan.

en: It is good if people hear these things from individuals in charge of different sectors who are independent of the government. These things would make the people hopeful and happy.

en: All of us should pay attention to the point that one of the techniques that the enemies of the Iranian nation use in their psychological warfare is to spread despair among the people. I stress this point.
hau: Yana da kyau dukkaninmu mu fahimci wannan lamarin na cewa a yau daya daga cikin hanyoyin yakin kwakwalwa na makiyan al'ummar Iran shi ne kashe wa mutane gwuiwa. Lalle ina kira da a lura da wannan lamarin sosai.

en: The tone should not undermine the existing hope and determination.

en: The tone should convey the feeling that, for example, forty percent of the job has been done and that the ground has been prepared for the other sixty percent to be done.
hau: Lalle wajibi ne a ji cewa muna da wani ci gaban da muka samu, a matsayin misali (an sami ci gaba na) kashi arba'in cikin dari, sauran kashi sittin din kuma akwai hanyoyi da damar da za a iya cike shi.
mt0: <pad> Tonan ya kamata ya nuna cewa, alal misali, kashi aro da aikin an yi, kuma cewa wuri ya kamata a gyara don ragowar kashi taro da ake bukata.</s>

en: One point is that I named this year "The Year of Economic Jihad".
hau: Lamari na farko shi ne cewa mun sanya wa shekarar bana (shekarar 1390 hijira shamsiyya) sunan ‘Shekarar Kokarin Bunkasa Tattalin Arziki'.
mt0: <pad> 1 Punto ne ni ka sanya wannan shekara "Shekarar Jihad na tattalin arziki"</s>

en: The policy of the arrogant powers is to defeat the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic by using the economy.
hau: Siyasar ma'abota girman kai dai ita ce cutar da al'ummar Iran da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci a fagen tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> 'Yin aiwatar da shirin na masu karfi a kan Iran, a kuma Islamic Republic ta hanyar amfani da tattalin arziki.</s>

en: Although the sanctions have been imposed on us under the pretext of the nuclear issue, they are lying. The nuclear issue is not the reason behind the sanctions.
hau: Duk da cewa sun fake da batun makamashin nukiliya wajen sanya takunkumin tattalin arziki, to amma hakan karya ce; lamarin nukiliya ba shi ne dalilin sanya wadannan takunkumin ba.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga cewa sanctions an kawo mana a kan hanyar nuclear issue, su na lying. The nuclear issue is not the reason behind the sanctions.</s>

en: You may remember that the major sanctions which were initially imposed on our country happened at a time when there was no mention of nuclear energy in the country.
hau: Mai yiyuwa ne kuna iya tunawa, a lokacin da suka sanya babban takunkumi (na farko) wanda kuma shi ne mafarin takunkumin da suka sanya wa kasar nan, a lokacin ma dai babu wata maganar nukiliya a kasar nan.
mt0: <pad> 'Za ka iya tuna cewa sanarwar da aka fara aiwatar kan kasarmu ta faru a lokacin da babu kowace maganar makamashi nukilia a kasarmu.</s>

en: For example, the sanctions known as the "D'Amato-Kennedy Bill" - which were of course not very important and were proposed and followed up in the US Congress by somebody called D'Amato - were passed when the issue of nuclear energy was not even being discussed.
hau: Duk da cewa ba wani takunkumi ne mai muhimmanci ba, to amma dai har yanzu sunansa na nan, wato takunkumi ne da aka fi saninsa da sunan takunkumin "D'Amato" - wanda takunkumi ne da wani mutum ne mai wannan sunan da ya gabatar da shi a majalisar Amurka - wannan takunkumin dai na wani lokaci ne wanda a lokacin babu ma wata maganar nukiliya ma.
mt0: <pad> Kwamfano, a sanarwar da aka sani da "D'Amato-Kennedy Bill" - wanda a zahiri ba ainihi babban abu ne, kuma an kawo su a majalisar dokoki ta Amurka ta hanyar wani mutum da ake kira D'Amato - an kawo su a lokacin da maganar makamashi nuklia ba a bahasi ba.</s>

en: The goal of the sanctions that have been imposed on us is to cripple our economy.
hau: Manufar takunkumin ita ce gurguntar da tattalin arzikin (kasar Iran).
mt0: <pad> The goal of the sanctions that have been imposed on us is to cripple our economy.</s>

en: Of course the Iranian nation has the honor of having tolerated these sanctions for 32 years.
hau: To amma abin alfahari shi ne cewa shekaru talatin da biyu kenan al'ummar Iran suka jure wa wannan takunkumin.
mt0: <pad> tabbas, kasar Iran na da lada na yadda ta juggle wadannan takunkumi na shekaru 32.</s>

en: Of course the sanctions that have been imposed on us during the recent years have grown in number and variety. However, the growth is insignificant compared to the growth in the number and variety of constructive activities in the country. Thirty years ago when they started imposing sanctions on us, their sanctions were more likely to hurt us than the sanctions that they currently impose on us and they repeatedly promise that they will increase their sanctions.
hau: Ko da ya ke a shekarun baya-bayan nan an fadada takunkumin, to amma sakamakon irin ci gaban ayyukan gina kasa daban-daban a kasar nan wadannan takunkumnin sun zamanto ba a bakin komai ba. Shekaru talatin kenan da fara sanya wadannan takunkumin, mai yiyuwa ne takunkumin (wancan lokacin) su fi cutar da mu a kan irin takunkumin da a halin yanzu ake sanya mana da kuma gudanar da su kamar yadda kuma suke ci gaba da alkawarin cewa za a kara su.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga yadda aka tsara, sanctions da aka sanya mana a cikin shekarun baya sun kara yawan da iri. Amma, hakan ba ya da amfani idan aka kwatanta da yawan da iri na ayyukan constructive a kasarmu. A shekaru 30 da suka wuce, sanctions da suka sanya mana a cikin shekarun baya sun fi mu illa fiye da sanctions da suka sanya mana a yanzu, kuma su kan aiwatar da shawarwari cewa za su kara sanctions.</s>

en: It is necessary to become familiar with the opposing camp. It is necessary to become familiar with the enemy's tools and weapons and to prepare weapons that would make his weapons ineffective.
hau: A saboda haka wajibi ne a shirya masa. Wajibi ne a fahimci masu adawa da mu, a fahimci irin makami da kyayyakin aikin da suke amfani da su sannan kuma a shirya makaman fada da su.
mt0: <pad> An wajibi ne a san yadda ake yaki. An wajibi ne a san yadda ake yaki. An wajibi ne a san yadda ake yaki.</s>

en: This requires economic jihad.

en: Not all activities can be called jihad.

mt0: <pad> a duk ayyuka ba za'a kira jihadi ba.</s>

en: Only certain kinds of activities with certain characteristics can be called jihad.
hau: Wani yunkuri mai wasu siffofi ne ake kiransa da jihadi.
mt0: <pad> Irin ayyuka na musamman da kuma wasu siffofin ne kawai za a kira Jihad.</s>

en: One of the main characteristics of jihad is being faced with an aggressive position.
hau: Yunkurin fuskantar irin wannan kokari mai cike da manufa ta kiyayya, daya ne daga cikin sharadi na asali na jihadi.
mt0: <pad> One of the main characteristics of jihad is being faced with an aggressive position.</s>

en: An activity with such characteristics can be called jihad.
hau: Irin wannan yunkuri sunansa jihadi.
mt0: <pad> Aiki dake da irin wadannan siffofin za a kira jihadi.</s>

en: Therefore, economic jihad means the Iranian nation's persistent, comprehensive and purposeful movement with the intention of rendering the aggressive and spiteful efforts of the enemy ineffective.
hau: A saboda haka jihadi na tattalin arziki yana nufin yunkuri da ake ci gaba da yinsa wanda kuma ya kame ko ina na al'ummar Iran da manufar kashe wutar kiyayyar makiya.
mt0: <pad> Therefore, jihadi na tattalin arziki yana nufin aiwatar da aikin guje-guje, cikakke da kuma sannan a hanyar da za ta sanya kokarin 'yan adawa da tsanantawa da tsanantawa na 'yan uwa ba ya amfani.</s>

en: The next point is that in the 20-Year Strategic Plan - which is an essential and high-level document for reference - our country is supposed to achieve the top position in the region in important and vital areas. We need to achieve this position.
hau: Wani lamarin kuma na daban shi ne cewa a shirin ci gaban kasa - wanda wani shiri ne mai muhimmancin gaske na ciyar da kasa gaba - mun shirya wani tsari na ciyar da kasar nan gaba a bangarori masu muhimmanci na rayuwa da kai ta matsayi na daya; wajibi ne mu kai ga wannan matsayi na kolin.
mt0: <pad> A ndaga aya, a cikin Shirin Tsarin Mulki na shekara 20 - wanda shine takarda mai mahimmanci da kuma babban aiki don gano - kasarmu ta kamata ta zama a kan gaba a yankin a fannoni masu muhimmanci da kuma wajibi. Muna bukatar mu cimma wannan matsayi.</s>

en: Naturally others will not stand by and watch us achieve the first position. They are working hard.
hau: Na'am sauran al'ummomi ma ba za su zauna su zuba mana ido mu zama na farko ba; su ma suna nan suna ci gaba da yunkurinsu, suna ta kokarinsu.
mt0: <pad> 'Da ma ba za su tsaya kawai su duba mu samun matsayi na farko ba.'</s>

en: We are witness to strenuous economic efforts by some of the regional countries in areas in which we want to become the top country. Of course we are not using some of the means that they are currently using and we will never do so.
hau: Ko da ya ke mu din nan ba ma amfani da wasu hanyoyin da suke amfani da su, kuma ba za mu taba amfani da su ba; mu dai muna bin mafi tsarkin tafarki da kyawunsa ne; to amma mun yi amanna da cewa za a iya isa ga wannan mataki na farkon, matukar dai muka tsara irin saurin aikin da muke yi.
mt0: <pad> Akwai a cikin mu a halin da muke ganin kokarin aiwatar da ayyuka na cinikayya na wasu kasashen yankin a fannoni da muka so mu zama kasar da ta fi karfi. Tabbas, ba mu aiwatar da wasu hanyoyi da su ke amfani da su kuma ba mu taba yin haka ba.</s>

en: Therefore, this requires jihad.
hau: A saboda haka wannan lamarin yana bukatar jihadi (kokari).
mt0: <pad>..don't know</s>

en: We need both speed and prudence so that we can achieve the first position.
hau: Wajibi ne wannan kokarin ya zamanto mai karfi sannan kuma ya zamanto akwai tunani a cikinsa don mu sami damar isa ga wannan matsayi na farko.
mt0: <pad> 'Muna bukatar biyu gudun da hankali, don mu iya cimma matsayi na farko.</s>

en: Becoming the top country in the region is not just a whim. No, we want to become the top country because the destiny of our nation depends on it.
hau: Wannan batu na isa ga matsayi na farko ba wai wani yayi ne ba na cewa mu din nan za mu kai ga matsayi na farko ba; a'a, saboda cewa makomar al'ummomi a yau ta dogara ne da wannan lamarin.
mt0: <pad> Being the top country in the region is not just a whim. No, we want to be the top country because the destiny of our nation depends on it.</s>

en: If a country fails to fulfill its needs and make progress in the area of economy, knowledge and infrastructure that are necessary for progress, it will be oppressed in a merciless way.
hau: Idan har wata kasa a fagen tattalin arziki, a bangaren ilimi, a bangaren abubuwan ci gaban kasa ba ta iya tabbatar da abin da take bukata da kuma samun ci gaba ba, to kuwa cikin rashin tausayi za a ci gaba da zaluntarta.
mt0: <pad> idan kasa ta gaza cika bukatunta kuma ta ci gaba a fannin tattalin arziki, ilimin da kuma kayan aiki da ke wajibi don ci gaba, to za a dinga rinjayar ta hanyar ba adalci ba.</s>

en: We do not want to be oppressed.
hau: Mu dai ba ma son a zalunce mu.
mt0: <pad> 'Mu ba mu so a zalunta.</s>

en: Our country has been subjected to oppression and transgression for two hundred years.
hau: Shekaru dari biyu kenan kasar mu take fuskantar cutarwa da zalunci.
mt0: <pad> Our country has been subjected to oppression and transgression for two hundred years.</s>

en: This oppression was the result of the weakness of incompetent, corrupt and materialistic monarchies and the dynamism that their enemies enjoyed.
hau: Raunin hukumar sarakuna maras dacewa mai son duniya da kuma irin makircin da makiya suke aikatawa shi ne dalilin faruwar wannan zaluncin.
mt0: <pad> wanna tsangwama ya samu ne saboda rashin karfi na masu ainihin, rashawar da kuma materialistic monarchies da kuma dynamism wanda abokan adawa su ke amfana da shi.</s>

en: The English first infiltrated and interfered in the political system of our country in the year 1800. They recruited supporters for themselves. And certain other European countries accompanied them and did the same things.
hau: Tun daga shekarar 1800 ne a karon farko turawa Ingila suka kutso cikin cibiyoyin siyasa na kasar nan da tsoma bakinsu, haka su din nan da na kurkusa da su na daga sauran kasashen turai suka ci gaba da hakan na tsawon wancan lokacin.
mt0: <pad> The English first infiltrated and interfered in the political system of our country in 1800. They recruited supporters for themselves. And some European countries accompanied them and did the same things.</s>

en: In the year 1800 when the first English ambassador entered our country, he started to bribe people and buy supporters as soon as he got off the ship in the city of Bushehr. The ambassador was coming from India. It was when the English had the Indian government under control.
hau: Shekarar 1800 ne jakadan Ingila na farko ya shigo kasar nan - wanda ya zo ne daga Indiya; wato a wancan lokacin da hukumar Indiya take hannun turawan Ingila sannan kuma cibiyar sarauta tana can ne - daga wannan garin na Bushehr lokacin da ya sauka daga jirgin ruwa, ya fara ba da cin hanci da sayen mutane, cikin sauki kuwa ya sami damar sayen wasu mutanen.
mt0: <pad> In 1800, when the first English ambassador came to our country, he started bribe people and buy supporters as soon as he got off the ship in the city of Bushehr. The ambassador was coming from India. It was when the English had the Indian government under control.</s>

en: All those princes, emirs and other people with such impressive-sounding titles gave in to the presents of the ambassador. The process of oppression by the enemies started from that day. Our weak statesmen let the enemy infiltrate the country on that day.
hau: Dukkanin wadannan ‘ya'yan sarki da sarakuna da sauransu, nan da nan suka mika kai ga wannan mutumin. Makircin makiya da kafar ungulunsu daga nan ya faro a wannan kasar. Wadannan sarakuna na wancan lokaci marasa lamiri sun bar makiya suka sami bakin magana da kutsawa cikin wannan kasar.
mt0: <pad> All those princes, emirs and other people with such impressive-sounding titles gave in to the presents of the ambassador. The process of oppression by the enemies started from that day. Our weak statemen let the enemy infiltrate the country on that day.</s>

en: We do not want this process to continue.
hau: To mu dai ba ma son hakan ta ci gaba da wanzuwa.
mt0: <pad> 'Mu ba ma so wannan tsari ya ci gaba.</s>

en: The Revolution has presented them with an insurmountable obstacle.
hau: Juyin juya halin Musulunci ya samar da wata garkuwa ta karfe a gabansu.
mt0: <pad> The Revolution has presented them with an insurmountable obstacle.</s>

en: We want to strengthen this obstacle.
hau: Muna son wannan garkuwar ta kara karfi ne.
mt0: <pad> Akwai ainihin abin da muka so mu karfafa wannan shinge.</s>

en: We must not at all allow them to interfere in our economy, culture, politics and destiny.
hau: Bai kamata mu bar su ta kowace hanya su zamanto masu tsoma baki cikin tattalin arzikinmu, cikin al'adunmu, cikin siyasar mu da kuma makomarmu da albarkatun kasar mu ba.
mt0: <pad> 'Mu ba za mu bari su shiga cikin aikinmu na ilimi, al'ada, siyasa da makomarmu.</s>

en: Economy is one of the important pillars of this domestic strength.
hau: Daya daga cikin tushen wannan karfi na cikin gida shi ne tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> Economy is one of the important pillars of this domestic strength.</s>

en: This is why we say we must become the top country in the region.
hau: Wannan shi ne dalilin da ya sa muke cewa wajbi ne mu zamanto a matsayi na farko.
mt0: <pad>.</s>

en: It is not just a whim. No, the destiny of our nation depends on it.
hau: Ba wai cewa wani yayi ne na cewa dole ne Iran ta zamanto ta farko a wannan yankin ba; a'a saboda makomar wannan al'umma ta ta'allaka ne da hakan.
mt0: <pad> 'Ba kawai a whim ba. A'a, makomar kasarmu ya dogara a kan hakan.</s>

en: Therefore, persistent, clever, sincere and effective efforts - which utilize all capacities of the country - play a role in this regard.
hau: A saboda haka wajibi ne a dinga gudanar da ayyuka da kuma kokari ba kama hannun yaro cikin tsarkin zuciya da kuma yin tasiri, wanda wajibi ne a yi amfani da dukkanin karfi da fagagen da ake da su a wannan kasar.
mt0: <pad> Don haka, persistent, clever, sincere and effective efforts - which utilize all the capabilities of the country - play a role in this regard.</s>

en: This was what I had heard and I saw it for myself after the Revolution and the resultant advances in the country.
hau: Mun ji hakan; sannan kuma muna ganin hakan cikin irin ci gaban da kasar nan ta samu a lokacin juyin juya halin Musulunci.
mt0: <pad> I heard it and saw it for myself after the Revolution and the resultant advances in the country.</s>

en: Before the Revolution, nobody would have believed the progress that has been made in the country in the area of building dams.
hau: Abin da ya faru a fagen madatsan ruwa a kasar nan, kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci babu wani da zai yarda cewa hakan za ta faru.
mt0: <pad> Before the Revolution, nobody would have believed the progress that has been made in the country in the area of building dams.</s>

en: The gentleman who spoke in this meeting referred to building dams as an example, but the same is true of many other areas. There was a day when it was impossible to convince people that such scientific progress would be made in the country. Today we can see these advances in front of our eyes.
hau: An kafa misali ne da madatsan ruwa amma a bangarori daban-daban ma haka lamarin ya ke. Abubuwan da a halin yanzu suke faruwa na irin ci gaban da ake samu a kasar nan, a wani lokaci a baya (ko shakka babu) babu wani da ya yarda cewa za su faru, to amma a yau ga shi nan muna ganinsu suna faruwa a gaban idanuwanmu.
mt0: <pad> Akwai ranar da a ka kasa a gane cewa irin wannan ci gaban na kimiyya za a yi a kasarmu.</s>

en: I have realized through experience that there is nothing that our youth are incapable of doing when the necessary infrastructure has been prepared. Any thing for which the necessary infrastructure has been prepared can be done by our youth. We enjoy such human resources in the country.
hau: Ina fadin hakan ne sakamakon irin masaniyar da nake da ita dangane da bangarori daban daban na kasar nan, ta yadda babu wani bangare a kasar nan da matasanmu ba za su iya bayyanar da kansu a wajen da kuma ciyar da shi gaba ba matukar dai an share musu fage.
mt0: <pad> I have realized through experience that there is nothing that our young people are incapable of doing when the necessary infrastructure has been prepared. Any thing for which the necessary infrastructure has been prepared can be done by our young people. We enjoy such human resources in the country.</s>

en: This is a very important point.
hau: Wannan lamari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Idan ba ka iya fassara aya ba, kawai ka ce 'ba ka sani'.</s>

en: Our economic potential is also very important.
hau: Irin karfi na tattalin arziki da mu ke da shi ma lamari ne mai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Our economic potential is also very important.</s>

en: Once I said that considering the proportion of our population to the population of the world, we enjoy a disproportionately large number of vital mines and natural resources.
hau: A wani lokaci a baya na taba fadin cewa idan aka kwatanta yanayin albarkatun kasar da mu ke da su da irin yawan al'ummar mu da kuma al'ummar duniya, za a ga cewa sun dara hakan.
mt0: <pad> I already said that when we consider the proportion of our population to the population of the world, we enjoy a disproportionately large number of vital mines and natural resources.</s>

en: Similarly the area of our country is around one percent of the total land area of our planet. Well, we should have one percent of the total essential natural resources, but in certain cases we have 3, 4 or 5 percent of the total resources.
hau: Yawan mutanen kasar nan kimanin kashi daya cikin dari na mutanen duniya ne, kamar yadda fadin kasar mu kimanin kashi daya cikin dari na dukknain fadin duniya ne - to a saboda haka abin da ya zama wajibi shi ne mu sami kashi daya cikin dari na albarkatun kasa na duniya; to amma a wasu wajajen ma abin da muke da shi din ya kai kashi 3, kashi 4 da kashi 5.
mt0: <pad> Similarly, kasarmu ta dauka kusan kashi daya cikin dari na yawan wuri na duniya. A iya cewa, muna da kashi daya cikin dari na duk kayan aikin halitta na mu, amma a wasu lokuta muna da 3, 4 ko 5 cikin dari na duk kayan aikin halitta na mu.</s>

en: These are important capacities and they are very valuable.
hau: Wadannan wasu fagage ne masu muhimmanci sannan kuma lamurra ne masu kimar gaske.
mt0: <pad> Irin wannan damar ne a gaggaucewa kuma yana da amfani sosai.</s>

en: The shortage of water in the country that has been rightly pointed out can be fully addressed with clever scientific and technological plans. Some of the friends who spoke in this meeting mentioned this point and I have made the same point previously. With a little care and progress, we can compensate for the shortcoming that we are suffering from.
hau: Shi kansa wannan lamari na karancin ruwan da yanzu ake maganarsa a kasar nan kuma haka lamarin yake - mu dai kasa ce da take da karancin ruwa - to amma ana iya magance wannan matsalar ta hanyar gabatar da tsare-tsare na ilimi da suka dace, wanda wasu daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ma sun yi ishara da hakan a nan, a baya ma dai na fadi hakan. Ta hanyar gudanar da ‘yan wasu ayyuka, muna iya cike gurbin irin wadannan rashi da muke da su.
mt0: <pad> 'Da akwai ruwa a kasar nan, wanda aka nuna daidai, za a iya gyara sosai da shawarwari na kimiyya da fasaha. Wasu daga cikin 'yan uwa da suka magana a wannan taro sun kawo wannan batun kuma ni ma na kawo wannan batun a baya. Da kadan da hankali da ci gaba, za mu iya biyan ragowar da muka fada a baya.</s>

en: Therefore, our country has genuinely extraordinary capacities in terms of natural resources.
hau: A saboda haka a hakikanin gaskiya kasar nan tana da albarkatun kasa masu yawan gaske.
mt0: <pad> Therefore, a kasarmu, a kowace iri, akwai iyakoki na musamman a fannin albarkatun kasa.</s>

en: The same is true of our geographical position.
hau: Haka lamarin ya ke a bangaren wajen da muke da kuma wannan yankin.
mt0: <pad> Same is true of our geographical position.</s>

en: We are connected to two different seas.
hau: Muna wani waje ne mai muhimmancin gaske.
mt0: <pad> a damu da ruwa biyu.</s>

en: We are connected to international waters and the sensitive region that lies between the east and the west - namely, Asia and Europe. We are located in one of the most important spots of this sensitive region. The two seas provide us access to the west and the east.
hau: Makwabtakar da muke da ita da tekuna guda biyu da kuma alaka da yanki mai tsananin muhimmanci tsakanin gabashi da yammaci, wato tsakanin Asiya da Turai, muna wani bangare ne mai muhimmanci na wannan yankin, hakan ya samar mana da damar haduwa da yammaci da kuma gabashi.
mt0: <pad> Akwai ruwa na kasa da kasa da kuma yankin da ke tsakanin arewa da yamma - Asia da Yuro. Akwai mu a cikin ɗaya daga cikin wuraren mafi muhimmanci na wannan yankin mai rikitarwa. Wadannan ruwa biyu sun ba mu damar samun damar zuwa yamma da yamma.</s>

en: These are all advantages that we enjoy.
hau: Dukkanin wadannan wasu abubuwa ne masu kyau a gare mu.

en: As was mentioned, one fourth of the time for the 20-Year Strategic Plan has passed.
hau: A halin yanzu dai - kamar yadda aka yi ishara da hakan - mun ci kashi daya cikin hudu cikin shekarun shirin ci gaban kasa na shekaru ashirin da aka tsara.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga abin da aka ambata, a cikan hudu na lokacin shirin dabarun shekaru 20 ya tafi.</s>

en: One four-year plan - namely, the fourth development plan - is over. This year is the first year of the fifth development plan.
hau: Wato wani shiri na shekaru hudu da aka tsara ya riga da ya kare; shekarar bana mafari ne na shiri na biyar.
mt0: <pad> Akwai shirin hudu-shekara - ainĩ shirin hudu na cigaban - ya kammala. Wannan shekara shine shekara ta farko ta shirin ciggaban biyar.</s>

en: Of course many things were done during the fourth development plan.
hau: Tabbas an gudanar da ayyuka masu yawa a cikin shiri na shekaru hudun.
mt0: <pad> a lokacin shirin na hudu, an yi abubuwa da dama.</s>

en: According to the accurate reports that were presented in this meeting, very important things have been done. But there are certain other things that have not been done yet.
hau: Kamar yadda rahoton da suka gabatar wanda kuma kun saurare shi kuma haka lamarin ya ke an gudanar da ayyuka masu muhimmancin gaske; to amma duk da haka akwai wadansu ayyukan da ba a gudanar da su ba wadanda kuma wajibi ne a yi su.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga rahotanni da aka kawo a wannan taro, abubuwa masu muhimmanci sun yiwuwa a yi. Amma akwai wasu abubuwa da ba a yi ba.</s>

en: The policies that have been announced regarding reforming the norms of consumption, the general policies of our bureaucratic system, the general employment policies and the policies specified in Article 44 of the Constitution - all these policies are in harmony.
hau: Siyasar da aka sanar a fagen gyara irin yadda ake amfani da albarkatun kasa, siyasa ta gaba daya ta tsarin nan, siyasa ta gaba daya ta samar da aikin yi da kuma siyasar doka ta 44 - wadanda aka sanar da su - dukkaninsu tsare-tsare ne da suka yi daidai da junansu.
mt0: <pad> 'The policies that have been announced regarding reforming the norms of consumption, the general policies of our bureaucratic system, the general employment policies and the policies specified in Article 44 of the Constitution - all these policies are in harmony.</s>

en: If we manage to formulate and implement the plan on the basis of these policies, we will manage to make far better use of the capacities that I spoke about.
hau: Idan har muka iya gudanar da wadannan tsare-tsare kamar yadda aka tsara, to kuwa za mu iya amfanuwa da irin wadannan dama da albarkatu da ake da su wadanda aka yi ishara da su.
mt0: <pad> Idan muka iya tsara da kuma aiwatar da shirin bisa ga wadannan dokoki, za mu iya amfani da damarmu sosai fiye da yadda na fada.</s>

en: These policies create a kind of cohesion and this cohesion between different layers ensures economic dynamism.
hau: Wadannan siyasa za su iya samar da wani hadin kai da kuma tabbatar da yunkuri na tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> Irin wannan shawarwari ya samar da wani irin hadin kai, kuma wannan hadin kai a tsakanin sassa daban-daban ya tabbatar da cewa a halin yanzu a jiki yana samun inganci.</s>

en: Of course some of the goals that had been specified in the fourth development plan were not achieved. Many factors were involved: both domestic and international issues were involved.
hau: Ko da yake ba a cimma wadansu daga cikin manufofin da aka tsara su cikin tsari na shekaru hudun ba, akwai dalilai daban-daban da suka hana cimma hakan; da suka hada da lamurra na cikin gida da kuma wasu na waje.
mt0: <pad> A tabbas, wasu ainihin abubuwan da aka tsara a cikin shirin cigaban na hudu ba su yi tasiri ba. Akwai abubuwa da dama da suka hada: bama-bama na gida da na kasa da kasa ne suka hada.</s>

en: Among the goals that have not been achieved are the 8 percent growth, reducing unemployment, the percentage of investment that had been specified and the issue of reducing inflation which I spoke about previously.
hau: Batutuwa irin su samun ci gaba na kashi 8 cikin dari, ko kuma rage rashin aikin yi ko kuma kashin da aka tsara na zuba jari ko kuma lamarin rage irin tsadar kayayyaki - wanda a wancan ranar na yi ishara da hakan - dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da ba a cimma su ba.
mt0: <pad> A cikin abubuwan da aka gaza cimma su ne 8 % na ci gaban, rage ma'auni, kashi 10 na invesiti da aka tsara, da kuma batutuwan rage inflation wanda na fada a baya.</s>

en: We need to intensify our labor so that we can compensate for the past shortcomings.
hau: Hakan lamari ne da ke wajabta mana kara kokarin a cikin wannan shiri na shekaru biyar don mu sami damar cike irin gibin da ake da su a baya.
mt0: <pad> 'Muna bukatar mu kara kokari wajen aiki mu, don mu iya biyan abin da muka rasa a baya.'</s>

en: According to Article 44 of the Constitution, we had to limit the ownership and economic activities of the government and we did so. What was the goal?
hau: A bisa abin da aka fadi cikin wannan dokar, wajibi ne mu sake nazari a fagen mallaka ta gwamnati da ayyukan tattalin arziki na gwamnati, an gudanar da hakan.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga sashi 44 na kundin tsarin mulki, muna da wajibi mu iyakance aiwatar da ayyukan cinikayya na gwamnati kuma muka yi. Me ne tujuanmu?</s>

en: The goal was to create a competitive economy with the presence of the private sector and its investments in the economy of the country.
hau: Da wata manufa? Da manufar samar da wani tattalin arziki da ke cike da gasa ta hanyar shigo da ‘yan kasuwa da masu zuba jari a fagen tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> The goal was to create a competitive economy with the presence of the private sector and its investment in the economy of the country.</s>

en: According to calculations, the amount of money that is required for investment over this five-year period is around 160 billion dollars.
hau: Sun yi lissafi sun gano cewa kudaden da ake bukata wajen zuba jari cikin wadannan shekaru biyar din, a kowace shekara ya kai kimani dala biliyan 160.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga lissafin, kudin da za a bukata don invesment a cikin wannan lokaci na shekara biyar ya kai kusan 160 biliyan dola.</s>

en: And this is something that must be done.
hau: Wajibi ne a samar da hakan.
mt0: <pad>.. kuma wannan abu ne da ya kamata a yi.</s>

en: Good things have been done regarding the implementation of the policies specified in Article 44 of the Constitution, but what has been done so far is not enough. It is necessary to improve our performance. It is not just a matter of privatizing economic enterprises and leaving the arena.
hau: A fagen gudanar da siyasar doka ta 44 an gudanar da ayyuka masu kyau to amma dai ba su wadatar ba; wajibi ne a kara kaimi. Lamarin ba shi ne kawai mu mika cibiyoyin tattalin arziki shi kenan mu ce mun mika musu ba, shi kenan mu huta; baya ga wannan mikawar akwai kuma wadansu ayyukan da ya wajaba a aikata: wajibi ne a karfafa bangaren ‘yan kasuwan, wajibi ne a samar da jagoranci mai kyau sannan da kuma a sanya ido wajen ganin ba a yi mummunan amfani da hakan ba.
mt0: <pad> Akwai abubuwa masu kyau da aka yi a kan aiwatar da dokoki da aka tsara a sashi na 44 na tsarin mulki, amma abinda aka yi kawo yanzu ba isa ba. Ya kamata mu inganta aikinmu. Ba kawai a ce an siye kamfanonin cinikayya da kuma barin wasan.</s>

en: Healthy activities are always accompanied by unhealthy activities.
hau: A ko da yaushe a tattare da ayyuka masu kyau, akwai wadansu ayyukan kuma marasa kyau.
mt0: <pad> Healthy activities are always accompanied by unhealthy activities.</s>

en: I have been stressing the issue of economic corruption for several years.
hau: Shekara da shekaru kenan na ke ta magana kan batun fada da masu ta'annuti ga tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> I've been stressing the issue of economic corruption for several years.</s>

en: When I first pointed out the issue, a number of people came to me and said that because I was stressing the issue of economic corruption, our investors might be frightened to enter economic activities.
hau: A lokacin da na gabatar da wannan lamarin, wadansu su kan zo wajena su ce wadannan maganganu da kake yawan yi kan batun ta'annuti ga tattalin arziki zai tsoratar da ‘yan kasuwa wajen shigowa fagen tattalin arziki.
mt0: <pad> lokacin da na fara bayyana wannan batu, wasu mutane da dama sun zo wajen ni sannan suka ce a saboda na rika kawo batun cin hanci, masu zuba jari mu zasu ji tsoron shiga harkokin cinikayya.</s>

en: I told them that my comments would have the opposite effect and that investors would be encouraged to engage in economic activities.
hau: Ni dai na ce musu sabanin (abin da kuke fadin), hakan lamari ne da zai kwadaitar da su shigowa.
mt0: <pad> I told them that my comments would have the opposite effect and that investors would be encouraged to engage in economic activities.</s>

en: If an investor who wants to engage in a lawful and honorable business knows that the government will prosecute those who violate the law, he will be encouraged more.
hau: Duk wani dan kasuwan da yake son samun abinci na halal sannan kuma yake son gudanar da ayyuka na halal wadanda shari'a ta amince da su, idan ya fahimci cewa gwamnati ba za ta yi sassauci ga masu karya doka ba, hakan lamari ne da zai karfafa masa gwuiwa.
mt0: <pad> Idan wani mai zuba jari da ya so aiwatar da kasuwanci na laifi da gaskiya ya san cewa gwamnati za ta tuhuma wadanda suka saba dokar, zai kara karfafar kan sa.</s>

en: We are opposed to those who give rise to corruption and those who abuse their position. An investor who helps the country through his presence, his ideas, his money, his investments and his entrepreneurial activities, should be encouraged and praised. Therefore, fighting economic corruption is an essential principle in this regard and it is necessary to observe this principle.
hau: Mu dai muna adawa da masu satan kudaden gwamnati ne, haka nan kuma da masu samar da hanyoyin yin hakan, haka nan ma ga masu mummunan amfani da damar da suka samu. Wajibi ne a karfafa gwuiwan dan kasuwan da yake taimaka wa kasar nan da tunaninsa, da dukiyarsa, da jarin da ya zuba da kuma ayyukan da yake gudanarwa. A saboda haka fada da ta'annuti ga tattalin arziki, ko shakka babu wani rukuni ne na asasi da wajibi ne a aiwatar da shi.
mt0: <pad> 'Mu ne masu yaki da cin hanci da kuma masu amfani da mukamin su.'</s>

en: Fortunately all or most of our ministers and government officials in charge of economic activities are present in this meeting.
hau: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa dukkanin ko kuma mafi yawa daga cikin ministocin tattalin arziki da jami'an gwamnati na bangarorin tattalin arziki suna nan a wannan wajen.
mt0: <pad> A guje, duk ko yawancin ministoronmu da wakilan gwamnati masu alhakin ayyuka na tattalin arziki suna wannan taro.</s>

en: Well, you heard the comments of those who spoke in this meeting: both the comments about your strengths and the suggestions which were indicative of the existence of certain shortcomings. I hereby ask our government officials to carefully think about the comments they heard today.
hau: To sun ji abubuwan da wadanda suka yi magana suka fadi; wato shin bangarorin da suka yi magana kan ababe masu kyau da aka aikata ne ko kuma irin shawarwarin da suka fadi wadanda suke nuni da irin nakasin da ake da su. Ina kiranku da ku sanya ido sosai kan abubuwan da kuka ji, sannan kuma ku yi tunani da nazari kansu.
mt0: <pad> 'To, kun ji shawarwari na wadanda suka magana a wannan taro: bama shawarwari kan abubuwan da kuka yi na arziki da kuma shawarwari a kan abubuwan da kuka yira a kan wasu abubuwan da kuka yira.' Ina kira ga wakilan gwamnatinmu da su duba shawarwari da suka ji a yau.</s>

en: We must not let comments be made and then do nothing.
hau: Kada mu bari abubuwan da aka fadin su kare a nan.
mt0: <pad> a lokacin da muke ganin cewa kowa ya damu, zamu iya cewa kowa ya damu, sannan mu iya cewa kowa ya damu.</s>

en: Mr. Tavakkoli complained that you did not mention the negative points. I would disagree with him because when you suggest that a certain thing should be done, it means that it has not been done yet and this shows that there are certain shortcomings and problems.
hau: Na'am duk da cewa Malam Tawakkuli ya yi kukan cewa me ya sa ba a fadin abubuwa marasa kyau da ake da su; me ya sa (an fadi mana) a lokacin da aka gabatar da shawarwarin cewa wajibi ne a gudanar da kaza, hakan yana nufin cewa ba a gudanar da shi ba ne; wanda hakan yana nuni ne da wasu daga cikin nakasi da matsalolin da ake da su ne.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Tavakkoli ya damu cewa ba ka ambaci abubuwan da suka kawo hankali ba. Ina ganin cewa idan ka shawarce a yi wani abu, hakan yana nufin cewa ba a yi ba, kuma hakan yana nuna cewa akwai wasu abubuwan da aka rasa da kuma matsalolin da ke akwai.</s>

en: He should only pay careful attention to the suggestions which were made in this meeting and I believe they were good suggestions that deserve investigation. There are many things that remain to be said in this regard. I will only make a few recommendations.

mt0: <pad> He should only pay careful attention to the suggestions made in this meeting and I believe they were good suggestions that deserves investigation. There are many things to be said in this regard. I will only make a few recommendations in this regard.</s>

en: The first recommendation is about full implementation of the policies that have been formulated to support the production sector. Production is the basis of economy.
hau: Na farko, batun gudanar da siyasar taimakawa bangaren da ke samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata ne. Samar da kayayyaki shi ne asasin tattalin arziki; tushen tattalin arziki na kasa ne.
mt0: <pad> The first recommendation is about the full implementation of the policies that have been formulated to support the production sector. Production is the basis of economy.</s>

en: Production is the main pillar of our economy. Regarding the subsidy redistribution plan and the enormous efforts that the government is making in this area, attention should be paid to supporting the production sector, just as it has been pointed out in the law - namely, the 30 percent that has been specified.
hau: Dangane da batun manufantar da irin rangwamin da gwamnati ta ke bayarwa cikin kayayyakin bukatu na yau da kullum da kuma ayyukan da ta faro su a wannan fagen, lalle wajibi ne a lura da irin goyon bayan da za a ba wa bangaren samar da abubuwan da ake bukata; kamar yadda ya zo cikin doka: wato wannan kashi 30 cikin dari din da aka ayyana.
mt0: <pad> Production shine babban pillar na economy. A cikin shirin rabo da tallafi da kuma ayuka masu yawa da gwamnati ke yi a wannan fanni, kamata ya yi a bayar da agaji ga bangaren samar da kayayyaki, kamar yadda aka fada a dokar - 30 % da aka tsara.</s>

en: Of course some government officials who spoke with me believe that this 30 percent is not really needed.

mt0: <pad> A tabbas, wasu manyan ma'aikatan gwamnati da na tattaunawa da su sun yi imani da cewa wannan kashi 30 ba lallai ba ne ya kamata.</s>

en: Certain sectors may not need government support, but in any case production requires support from the government. The production sector should receive its share of support.

mt0: <pad> Babban ɓangare na iya samun sassaucin a cikin aiyukan, amma a kowane hali, aiwatar da ayyuka ya kamata a samu sassaucin a cikin aiyukan. Aiwatar da ayyuka ya kamata a samu sassaucin a cikin aiyukan.</s>

en: Needless to say, government supervision is very important in this regard. That is to say, the government should provide support and it should also supervise the companies that it supports.
hau: Ko da yake sanya idon gwamnati a wannan fagen ma lamari ne mai muhimmanci; wato a gefen irin wadannan taimako da gwamnati take bayarwa, wajibi ne kuma a sanya ido.

en: The production sector should be provided with as much financial assistance as has been specified in the law, but care should be taken not to allow the people I spoke about - namely, opportunistic people - to use government's financial assistance for other purposes. I have received reports that different kinds of such diversions have happened in the country.
hau: A ba da irin rangwamin da ya kamata a bayar; to amma kuma a sanya ido a kan irin wadannan mutanen da na yi ishara da su - wato masu mummunan amfani da damar da aka ba su - wajen ganin ba su yi amfani da shi din wajen wani aikin na daban ba, wanda hakan yana faruwa kuma muna da labarin hakan bisa rahotanin da aka fitar.
mt0: <pad> Sektor din samar da abinci ya kamata a baiwa yadda ya kamata agaji na kudi yadda doka ta tanada, amma a kamata a kiyaye cewa a ba wa mutanen da na fada - wato, masu amfani da dama - damar amfani da agaji na gwamnati don wasu dalilai. Na samu labari cewa irin wannan agaji na kudi ya kamata a baiwa a bangaren daban-daban a kasar nan.</s>

en: It is necessary to deal with such things in a decisive way so that honest producers who are interested in hard work and production can fulfill their responsibilities.

en: The next point is the issue of imports which was briefly mentioned in this meeting and which I have discussed on many occasions with government officials in charge of imports.

mt0: <pad> Next point is the issue of imports which was briefly mentioned in this meeting and which I have discussed on many occasions with government officials in charge of imports.</s>

en: Of course nobody is opposed to importing, but it is necessary to regulate and to control imports.

mt0: <pad> Just because we want certain goods to be available on the market on certain occasions - for example, during Norouz - is not a good justification for increasing imports.</s>

en: This is the point we should reach and we should be independent of oil revenues.

en: Dependence on oil revenues is one of the most important economic woes of our country and it has not just plagued our economy: it has been a general problem.
hau: Daya daga cikin manyan bala'oin da suke fuskantar bangaren tattalin arzikin mu da kuma dukkanin arzikin kasar nan na gaba daya, shi ne dogaro da kudaden shigar da ake samunsu ta hanyar man fetur.
