en: Our country is an oil exporter, but we used to import huge amounts of gasoline, which is produced from oil.
hau: Daya daga cikin matsalolin aikin mu tsawon lokaci shi ne wannan; mu din nan kasa ce mai fitar da man fetur, to amma kuma muna shigowa da mai din daga waje.
mt0: <pad> Our country is an oil exporter, but we used to import huge amounts of gasoline, which is produced from oil.</s>

en: They said that this was the weakness of the Islamic Republic and that they would block gasoline imports.
hau: Don haka suke fadin cewa wannan shi ne bangaren raunin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, ba za mu bari a shigo da man ba.
mt0: <pad> They said that this was the weakness of the Islamic Republic and that they would block gasoline imports.</s>

en: Thanks to their sanctions, our government officials started to think of a way to produce gasoline, and their efforts helped our country become self-sufficient in gasoline.
hau: Sakamakon wannan takunkumi na su jami'an mu sun shiga cikin tunani; sun yi kokarinsu, sannan kuma muka zamanto ba ma bukatar shigowa da man fetur.
mt0: <pad> Thanks to their bans, our government officials began to think of a way to produce gasoline, and their efforts helped our country become self-sufficient in gasoline.</s>

en: I heard similar things from some of the young scientists at the technology exhibition which I visited last month.
hau: Wannan lamari ne da na ji shi daga bakunan wadannan matasa masana a ziyarar da na kai wajen baje kolin da aka gudanar a karshen watan Esfand.
mt0: <pad> I heard similar things from some of the young scientists at the technology exhibition which I visited last month.</s>

en: They told me, "We wanted to build a machine, and we went abroad to buy the required parts, but they told us that they would not sell them to us because of the sanctions, so we realized that we had to manufacture the required parts as well.
hau: Sun gaya min cewa muna son mu kera wannan na'urar, mun tafi waje don samo shi, sai suka ce mana ai ku kuna karkashin takunkumi ne, ba za su ba mu ba; sai muka fahimci cewa lalle wajibi ne mu samar da hakan da kanmu.
mt0: <pad> 'Muna so mu gina mashinan, kuma muka je kasashen waje don samun kayan da muke bukata, amma suka ce mana ba za su sàmu mana kayan da muke bukata ba saboda sanctions, saboda haka muka gane cewa muna bukatar mu kera kayan da muke bukata ita ma.</s>

en: We came back and tried to produce those parts, and we succeeded to do so without the help of foreigners." This is the clever approach.
hau: Sai muka dawo gida, muka yi tunani, muka sha wahalhalu, mu ka yi kokari, har muka kera wannan na'urar ba tare da dogaro da baki 'yan kasashen waje ba.
mt0: <pad> "Mun dawo muka yi kokarin samar da waɗancan sassa, kuma mun samu nasara yin hakan ba tare da taimakon waje ba."</s>

en: According to government reports, 1.6 million job opportunities were created in the year 1389. If this report is accurate, the number is half a million more than the expected job opportunities.
hau: Rahoton gwamnati yana fadin cewa a shekarar 1389 an samar da guraban aiki miliyan daya da dubu dari shida; wanda idan har wannan rahoton haka yake, to kenan an samar da karin guraban aiki dubu dari biyar kenan sama da abin da aka yi tsammanin samarwa.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga rahoton gwamnatin, 1.6 million jobs were created in the year 1389. Idan wannan rahoto ya gaskiya, yawan aikin da aka samarwa ya fi 500,000 a cikin abin da aka tsammani.</s>

en: Good achievements have also been made in such areas as housing projects, construction of highways and road systems, and electronic services - all of which are related to the infrastructures of the country.
hau: A fagen samar da matsuguni a karkara, a fagen samar da gidaje a birane da kuma samar da manyan hanyoyi da tituna da kuma fagen isar da sako na zamani da sauransu da sauransu - wadanda dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ayyuka ne na tushe da kuma gina kasa - lalle an aiwatar da ayyuka masu kyau.
mt0: <pad> Good achievements have also been made in such areas as housing projects, construction of highways and road systems, and electronic services - all of which are related to the infrastructures of the country.</s>

en: These are the economic achievements.
hau: Wannan a bangaren tattalin arziki kenan.
mt0: <pad> These are the economic achievements.</s>

en: Many achievements have been made in other areas as well, but I will not discuss them for lack of time.
hau: A sauran bangarori ma an aiwatar da ayyuka masu yawa, to da yake lokacin da muke da shi iyakantacce ne za mu wuce su kawai.
mt0: <pad> Babban ci gaba da aka samu a wasu fannonin ma, amma ba zan kawo su ba saboda rashin lokaci.</s>

en: In any case, thankfully it is clear that the year 1389 was truly "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor".
hau: Ala kulli hal abin da ya bayyana mana a shekarar 1389 shi ne cewa alhamdu lillahi wannan shekarar, da dukkanin ma'anar kalma, shekara ce ta rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru.
mt0: <pad> 'The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor'</s>

en: Of course the year 1389 does not have any special significance in itself. This year, next year and the following years will all be "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor".
hau: Ko da yake shekarar 1389 ba ta da wata siffa da ta kebanta da ita; wannan shekarar ma, shekara mai zuwa ma, shekaru goma masu zuwa ma, (dukkaninsu) shekarar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru ne.
mt0: <pad> 1389 ba a da wani maanai na musamman a cikin ita. Wannan shekara, shekarar zuwa da kuma shekaru masu zuwa za su zama "Shekara ta Kokari da Aiki"</s>

en: The Iranian nation and its officials should make intensified efforts all the time so that we can achieve the position that the Iranian nation deserves.
hau: Al'ummar Iran da kuma dukkanin jami'an gwamnati a ko wani mukami suke kuwa wajibi ne su zamanto masu gagarumar himma da kuma aiki tukuru su rubanya ayyukan da suke yi don mu sami isa ga wajen da ya dace da al'ummar Iran, insha Allahu.
mt0: <pad> Iran da wakilan ta ya kamata su yi kokari sosai a duk lokacin don mu samu matsayin da Iran ya cancanci.</s>

en: However, experts believe that at this point in time economic issues are more important and more urgent than all other issues of the country.
hau: To sai dai a ra'ayin masana, a wannan lokacin batun tattalin arziki ya fi komai muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> However, experts think that at this point in time economic issues are more important and more urgent than all other issues of the country.</s>

en: If our country manages to make jihad-like efforts in economic areas and if the big leap that has been made is coupled with other leaps, this will undoubtedly produce great results for the country, for our progress and for the grandeur of the Iranian nation.
hau: Idan har kasar mu mai girma ta samu nasarar yunkurawa a fagen tattalin arziki, to wannan gagarumin yunkuri zai hadu da wanda za a yi nan gaba, to ko shakka babu zai yi tasiri cikin kasar nan da ci gabanta da kuma daukakar al'ummar Iran.
mt0: <pad> Idan kasarmu ta iya yin kokarin irin na jihadi a fannin tattalin arziki, kuma idan babban cigaban da aka yi ya hade da wasu cigaban, wannan tabbas zai samar da babban amfani ga kasarmu, ga cigabanmu da kuma babban daukaka na al'ummar Iran.</s>

en: In this regard the important criterion is the accelerated economic growth which has been specified in the fifth development plan - a growth of at least 8 percent.
hau: Abin da yake da muhimmanci a wannan fagen, shi ne samun ci gaban kasa bisa mizanin da aka tsara cikin shirin ci gaban kasa na shekaru biyar; wato alal akalla a samu ci gaba kashi takwas cikin dari.
mt0: <pad> In this regard, the important criterion is the accelerated economic growth which has been specified in the fifth development plan - a growth of at least 8 percent.</s>

en: Productivity should be a large portion of this growth.
hau: Kaso mai girma zai shafi irin karfin da muke da shi ne wajen amfani da karfin da muke da shi a cikin kasa yadda ya dace.
mt0: <pad> a lokacin da ake samun damar fassara hanyar, a kan aiwatar da aikin a hanyar da ta dace.</s>

en: In my speech on the first day of the year 1388, I made a few points about the issue of extravagance and the problems that exist in the area of productivity.
hau: Shekaru biyun da suka gabata, a irin wannan jawabi na sabuwar shekara, na yi magana kan batun tsumi da matsalolin da suke cikin yadda ake amfani da albarkatun kasa.
mt0: <pad> In my speech on the first day of the year 1388, I made a few points about the issue of extravagance and the problems that exist in the area of productivity.</s>

en: The people should know these things.
hau: Wajibi ne mutane su fahimci wadannan abubuwa.
mt0: <pad> 'yan adam ya kamata su san wadannan abubuwa.</s>

en: I recommend that our government officials speak to the people about the importance of increasing the share of productivity in total economic growth of the country. They should tell the people how important it is to increase the share of productivity in economic growth of the country and how important it is to decrease the difference between the income of the poor and the rich.
hau: Ina kiran jami'an kasar nan da su sanar da mutane wajibcin da ke cikin karfafa kason ci gaban tattalin arziki; su bayyana musu irin muhimmancin da ke cikin kara irin kason ci gaban tattalin arziki a kasar nan da kuma rage irin tazarar kudaden shiga tsakanin mutane.
mt0: <pad> I shawarce cewa wakilan gwamnatinmu su fada wa jama'a yadda ake bukata a kara yawan aikin yi a cikin ci gaban tattalin arziki na kasa. Su kamata su fada wa jama'a yadda ake bukata a kara yawan aikin yi a cikin ci gaban tattalin arziki na kasa da kuma yadda ake bukata a rage bambance a cikin samun kudin shiga tsakanin masu talaka da masu arziki.</s>

en: Such differences are not favorable to us. Islam does not approve of such differences.
hau: Wannan tazarar dai ba abu ne da muke so ba; Musulunci bai amince da hakan ba.
mt0: <pad> Irin wannan bambance ba ya amfane mu. Islam ba ya amince da irin wannan bambance.</s>

en: They should try to do these things according to the fifth development plan.
hau: Wajibi ne su yi iyakacin kokarinsu da kuma yin aiki tukuru don cimma abin da aka tsara cikin wannan shiri na shekaru biyar na ci gaban kasa.
mt0: <pad> They should try to do these things according to the fifth development plan.</s>

en: Decreasing the unemployment rate is among the crucial issues of the country.
hau: Rage yawan rashin aikin yi da kuma kara guraban aiki a kasar nan suna daga cikin lamurra masu muhimmanci kuma na asasi.
mt0: <pad> Ƙara yawan ma'aikatan a kasar nan shine ɗaya daga cikin manyan matsalolin kasar.</s>

en: Increasing private investments and helping the private sector to invest in economic projects of the country are also among the crucial issues. In this regard one of the important things that can be done is to establish cooperatives. Cooperatives can accumulate great capital and invest in important economic projects of the country.
hau: Haka nan kuma kara irin jarin da 'yan kasuwa suke zubawa da kuma taimakon bangaren 'yan kasuwa don su sami damar zuba jari cikin fagen tattalin arziki na kasa, su ma suna daga cikin batutuwa masu muhimmanci kuma na asasi; wanda daya daga cikin ayyukan da ke da muhimmanci a wannan bangaren shi ne samar da kamfanonin hadin gwuiwa wadanda ta hanyar hada kudade za a iya samar da kudaden jari masu yawa da kafa manyan kamfanoni.
mt0: <pad> Ƙara zuba jari na waje da kuma taimaka wa sashen waje ya zuba jari a ayyukan cinikayya na kasar nan su ne shawarwari masu muhimmanci. A wannan tsari, a cikin abubuwa masu muhimmanci da za a yi a wannan lokacin shi ne kafa kwamitin. Kwamitin iya tara babban kudin kuma ya zuba jari a ayyukan cinikayya na kasar nan.</s>

en: It is necessary to prepare the legal requirements in this regard.
hau: Wajibi ne a samar da tushe na dokoki.
mt0: <pad> wajibi ne a tsara doka da ta kamata a wannan dangane.</s>

en: This means supporting the blossoming of labor.
hau: Hakan kuwa yana nufin goyon bayan ci gaban ayyuka ne.
mt0: <pad> hakan yana nufin cewa a dinga kawo gyara a cikin aikin matan.</s>

en: As for economy in the use of essential resources, especially water resources, today 90 percent of our water resources are being used up by the agricultural sector.
hau: Haka tsumulmula cikin albarkatun kasa na asasi ciki kuwa har da tsumulmula da kuma amfani da ruwa yadda ya dace. A yau kashi casa'in cikin dari na ruwan da muke da shi a kasar nan, ana amfani da shi ne a bangaren aikin gona.
mt0: <pad> As for economy in the use of essential resources, especially water resources, today 90 percent of our water resources are being used up by the agricultural sector.</s>

en: Just consider what will happen if the government succeeds in reforming the methods of irrigation and reduces this amount by only 10 percent.
hau: Ku duba ku ga abin da zai faru idan har cikin yardar Allah gwamnati ta sami damar gyara hanyar ban ruwa, idan har aka rage kashi goma cikin dari na wannan kashi casa'in cikin dari din.
mt0: <pad> kawai ka duba yadda za ta kasance idan gwamnatin ta yi nasara wajen inganta hanyoyin irrigation kuma ta rage wannan adadin da 10%.</s>

en: We only use 10 percent of our water resources for all other purposes - including household and industrial purposes. Imagine will happen if we spend 10 percent less water in the agricultural sector.
hau: Baya ga bangaren aikin gona, a dukkanin bangarori na daban ma - bangaren amfani na gida, bangaren masana'antu da sauran bangarorin da suke bukatar ruwa - to kashi goma cikin dari na ruwan da ake samu kawai muke amfani da su a wadannan bangarori.
mt0: <pad> Kawai 10% na kayan ruwamu ne muke amfani da su a wasu abubuwan - ciki har da a cikin gida da masana'antu. Tsaya a kan abin da zai yiwu idan muka kashe 10% a bangaren aikin gona.</s>

en: In fact we will have twice as much water for non-agricultural sectors, which is very important.
hau: A hakikanin gaskiya amfanin da za a samu daga ruwa a bangaren da ba aikin gona ba zai rubanya sau biyu; wanda hakan lamari ne mai girma da kuma muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> In fact, we will have twice as much water for non-agricultural sectors, which is very important.</s>

en: The direct involvement of the people in economic matters is something necessary.
hau: Shigowar mutane kai tsaye cikin lamurran tattalin arziki, lamari ne da ya zama wajibi.
mt0: <pad> The direct involvement of the people in economic matters is something necessary.</s>

en: If we want this great economic movement to take place in our country in the year 1390, certain requirements should be met.
hau: To, idan har muna son mu aiwatar da wannan yunkuri mai girma na tattalin arziki a kasar nan a shekara ta 1390, to akwai wadansu abubuwan da wajibi ne a aiwatar da su.
mt0: <pad> Idan muna so wannan babban aikin cinikayya ya faru a kasarmu a shekara ta 1390, wasu bukatun da za'a bi su ne.</s>

en: I would like to briefly mention these requirements.
hau: Zan gabatar da jerin wadannan abubuwan da ake bukata.
mt0: <pad> Idan ba ka iya fassara wannan jumla ba, kawai ka ce 'ba ka san'.</s>

en: First of all, it is necessary to have the spirit of jihad.
hau: Da farko dai ruhi na jihadi (kokari) wajibi ne.
mt0: <pad> Mafi yawanci, yana da kyau a nĩ rũgũrũka a rĩmwe rĩa jihadi.</s>

en: Since the beginning of the Revolution up until now, our people have been successful whenever they have entered the arena with the spirit of jihad. We saw this during the Sacred Defense and during reconstruction of the country. Currently we can see the same thing in the scientific movement of the country.
hau: Al'ummar mu dai tun daga farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau din nan a duk inda ta shigo fage da ruhi na jihadi, to kuwa ta ci gaba; mun ga hakan a lokacin kallafaffen yaki, mun ga hakan a fagen jihadin gina kasa, haka nan kuma mun ga hakan a fagen ilimi.
mt0: <pad> Since the start of the Revolution up to now, our people have been successful whenever they have entered the arena with the spirit of jihad. We saw this during the Sacred Defense and during reconstruction of the country. Now we can see the same thing in the scientific movement of the country.</s>

en: If we maintain this spirit of jihad in different areas - that is to say, if we do our duty for the sake of God in a tireless and serious manner - this movement will undoubtedly continue.
hau: Idan har muka zamanto muna da ruhi na jihadi a bangarori daban-daban; wato aiki saboda Allah da kuma aiki tukuru ba kama hannun yaro - ba wai kawai a matsayin sauke nauyi ba - to ko shakka babu wannan yunkuri na mu zai ci gaba.
mt0: <pad> Idan muka rike wannan ruhin na jihadi a sassa daban-daban - wato, idan muka yi aikinmu don Allah cikin aiki da gaske da kuma serious - wannan yakini za ta ci gaba.</s>

en: The second requirement is to strengthen spirituality and the spirit of religious faith in society.
hau: Na biyu shi ne karfafa ababen da suke kyautata ruhi da imani da kuma kishin addini cikin al'umma.
mt0: <pad> The second requirement is to strengthen spirituality and the spirit of religious faith in the community.</s>

en: Dear people, everybody should know that piety in our society and among our youth will help our nation in worldly matters as well.
hau: Wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya san wannan; sanya kishin addini cikin kasa da kuma cikin matasa, hakan zai taimaka wa al'umma cikin lamurran da suka shafi duniyar su.
mt0: <pad> Dear people, everyone should know that piety in our society and among our young will help our nation in worldly matters as well as our nation in the matter of religion.</s>

en: It is wrong to think that piety among the youth reveals its effects only during itikaf in mosques or when reciting Dua Kumeyl.
hau: Bai kamata a yi zaton cewa tasirin sanya kishin addini cikin zukatan matasa, zai bayyana ne kawai a lokacin ittikafi a masallatai ko kuma a dararen juma'a a lokacin Dua Kumail ba.
mt0: <pad> A ainihin ma'ana, a lokacin da ake itikaf a masallaci ko a lokacin da ake karanta Du'a Kumeyl, a kan aiwatar da ibadah a cikin 'yan mata.</s>

en: If the youth enjoy piety, they will stay away from intemperance and addiction to drugs. They will start utilizing their talents and making efforts.
hau: Idan har matasan wata al'umma suka zamanto masu kishin addini, to kuwa za su nesanci fasikanci; za su nesanci shan kwaya; za su nesanci munanan dabi'un da matasa suke aikatawa.
mt0: <pad> idan yara suka rungumar ibada, za su gujewa aibi da kuma amfani da kwayoyi. Za su fara amfani da iyalansu da kuma yin kokari.</s>

en: The same is true of economy.
hau: A fagen tattalin arziki ma haka lamarin yake.
mt0: <pad> Same goes for the economy.</s>

en: The spirit of piety and spirituality plays a very important role.
hau: Karfin gwuiwa na addini, lamari ne da ke taka gagarumar rawa.
mt0: <pad> The spirit of piety and spirituality plays a very important role.</s>

en: The next requirement is that the country should not be distracted by side issues. Most of the time there is a central issue in the country which should be the focus of everybody's efforts.
hau: Wani sharadin na gaba shi ne rashin nuna damuwa da ababe na bayan fage. Ku duba ku gani, a mafi yawan lokuta akwai lamurra na asali a wannan kasar wanda wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya ba da himma da kuma riko da wadannan lamurra; wajibi ne hakan ya zamanto shi ne abin da za a ba shi muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Next requirement is that the country should not be distracted by side issues. Most of the time there is a central issue in the country which should be the focus of everyone's efforts.</s>

en: This is analogous to the situation of a caravan that is on an important mission and is moving through a desert towards its destination, but suddenly something unimportant attracts the attention of the caravan in one part of the desert and it stops moving forward.
hau: Hakan zai zamanto tamkar jirgin kasa ne da ke dauke da mutane da ya kama hanya yana son isa ga wani waje na musamman, kwatsam kawai sai wani karamin abu ya bayyana ya shagaltar da shi a tsakiyar sahara, sai a bar shi a kan hanya, a wasu lokutan ma a kan hana shi tafiya din ne.
mt0: <pad> wanna ya tafi kamar yadda caravan ke tafiya a cikin dutse zuwa wuri na musamman, a lokaci guda kuma wani abu da ba a damu ba ya janye hankali na caravan a wani bangare na dutse, sannan caravan din ya tsaya a hanyar tafiya a gaban.</s>

en: Side issues should not be brought into focus.
hau: A saboda haka bai kamata a shigo da lamurra na bayan fage cikin fage ba.
mt0: <pad> a hanyar da za'a iya fassara aya, kawai ka ce ba ka san ba.</s>

en: Preserving unity and national solidarity is another requirement.
hau: Wani sharadin na daban shi ne kiyaye hadin kai da fahimtar juna ta kasa.
mt0: <pad> a dawo da unity da national solidarity, another requirement.</s>

en: It is necessary to maintain and strengthen the unity that exists among and between the people and government officials. The people love their government officials. They trust their officials.
hau: Wannan hadin kan da a yau ake da shi tsakanin mutane da kuma tsakanin mutane da jami'an gwamnati, (wato) mutane suna kaunar jami'an su, sun yarda da su, suna taimaka musu da kuma kasancewa tare da su, sannan kuma akwai hadin kai da fahimtar juna a tsakanin su kansu mutanen, to wajibi ne (irin wannan yanayin) ya ci gaba da wanzuwa sannan kuma a ci gaba da karfafa shi a kowace rana.
mt0: <pad> Ido wajibi ne a rike da karfafa hadin kan da ke tsakanin jama'a da wakilan gwamnati. Jama'a na son wakilan gwamnati su. Su yadda wakilan su.</s>

en: One of the big plots of the enemies of the Iranian nation is to foment discord inside the country under ethnic, religious, political and partisan pretexts.
hau: Daya daga cikin babban makircin makiyan al'ummar Iran, shi ne haifar da rarrabuwa da sabani na cikin gida; suna masu fakewa da batun kabilanci, mazhaba, akida ta siyasa da kuma kungiyanci da dai sauran batutuwa daban-daban.
mt0: <pad> One of the big plots of the enemies of the Iranian nation is to foment discord inside the country under ethnic, religious, political and partisan pretexts.</s>

en: Fortunately our nation is vigilant.
hau: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa al'ummar mu a farke take.
mt0: <pad> 'Da kyau, kasarmu ta na da ido.</s>

en: All those who care about the country and religious democracy - which is a source of pride for the Iranian nation - should cooperate in a harmonious manner.
hau: Dukkanin mutanen da suke kaunar kasar su, suke kaunar tsarin demokradiyya na addini wanda hakan abin alfahari ne ga al'ummar Iran - to wajibi ne su tabbatar da fahimtar juna a tsakaninsu.
mt0: <pad> 'Dukkan waɗanda suke son kasar nan da kuma dimokuradiyya ta addini - wadda ita ce ainihin abin tsĩra na al'ummar Iran - ya kamata su hada kansu a hanyoyi masu kyau.</s>

en: Government officials should do the same.
hau: Haka ya kamata su ma jami'an gwamnati su kasance; wajibi ne su yi kokari wajen ganin cewa ko da a ce akwai wani sabani a tsakaninsu - mai yiyuwa ne ma a wani lokacin korafin da suke da shi din ya zamanto na gaskiya ne - to kada su bayyanar da hakan a gaban mutane; don kuwa hakan zai cutar da hadin kai na kasa ne.
mt0: <pad> 'Ye a kamata a dinga kawo kayan aiki a cikin gidanmu, sannan a tafi a taro wakilan gwamnati.</s>

en: I seriously warn our government officials about this issue.
hau: Lalle ni ina jan kunnen jami'an gwamnati sosai kan wannan lamarin.
mt0: <pad> I seriously warn our government officials about this issue.</s>

en: It is possible to negotiate a solution to the most important issues of the world, let alone such trivial issues.
hau: Mafi muhimmancin lamarin duniya a kan magance shi ta hanyar tattaunawa; wadannan kananan lamurra ba su da muhimmanci.
mt0: <pad> Bisa yiwuwa a shawarwari kan matsalolin duniya mafi muhimmanci, ba ma kawai irin wannan matsaloli na kowace rana.</s>

en: Sometimes after I announce a slogan at the beginning of the year, I see placards hanging everywhere - in Tehran and other cities of the country - with the slogan written on them.
hau: Tabbas ne in sake tunatarwa kan wannan lamarin; a wani lokaci wannan suna da muke ba wa shekara, kwatsam kawai sai ka ga an cika katangun birnin Tehran da na sauran garuruwa da rubuce-rubuce kan hakan, wato a ta rubuta wannan taken.
mt0: <pad> Kadang-kadangi, bayan na buga wani slogan a farkon shekara, na ga posters a ko'ina - a Tehran da sauran biranen kasar - da slogan din a rubuce a kansu.</s>

en: This is useless.
hau: Hakan ba shi da wani amfani.
mt0: <pad> Idan ba ka iya fassara wannan jumla ba, kawai ka ce 'ba ka san'.</s>

en: Measures that are sometimes adopted are expensive, yet unnecessary.
hau: A wasu lokuta ma a kan kashe kudade masu yawa sosai, mene ne wajibcin da ke cikin hakan?
mt0: <pad> Measures that are sometimes adopted are expensive, yet unnecessary.</s>

en: What I expect from government officials and from our dear people is that they should listen to these slogans and try to practice them.
hau: Abin da nake fatan gani a wajen mutane da kuma jami'an gwamnati shi ne su saurari wannan taken, su amince da shi sannan kuma su a yi kokari wajen ganin an tabbatar da shi.
mt0: <pad> I wanna expect from the government officials and our dear people that they should listen to these slogans and try to practice them.</s>

en: In this regard there is no need to do something that is expensive.
hau: Babu wata bukatar ta gudanar da ayyukan da za a kashe kudade masu yawa.
mt0: <pad> a wannan lokacin, babu bukatar yin wani abu da ya fi tsada.</s>

en: Of course the central importance of economic matters does not mean that we should ignore other areas.
hau: Ko da yake ba da muhimmanci ga batun tattalin arziki da na fadi ba wai yana nufin a yi watsi da sauran bangarorin ba ne.
mt0: <pad> tabbas, muhimmanci na batutuwan tattalin arziki ba ya nufin cewa mu za mu aiwatar da sauran batutuwan.</s>

en: It is necessary to pay attention to other areas as well, especially science and technology, and to help and trust our young scientists so that they can make great achievements.
hau: A sauran bangarorin ma, musamman a fagen ilimi da fasaha, lalle wajibi ne a taimaka wa wadannan masana matasa, a yarda da su, don su sami damar gudanar da manyan ayyuka.
mt0: <pad> Idan a iya gano cewa, a lokacin da muke aiki a fannoni daban-daban, musamman kimiyya da fasaha, ya kamata mu damu da kasancewa da tabbas ga 'yan uwa mu na kimiyya don su iya yin babban ci gaba.</s>

en: As for the regional issues, the recent events which have happened in the region - in Egypt, Tunisia, Libya and Bahrain - are very important.
hau: To amma dangane da lamurran da suke faruwa a wannan yankin kuwa. Abubuwan da a baya-bayan nan suke faruwa - wato lamurran kasar Masar, Tunusiya, Libya da Bahrain - lamurra ne masu muhimmancin gaske.
mt0: <pad> a kan batutuwan yankin, abubuwan da suka faru a yankin - a Misri, Tunisia, Libiya da Bahrain - sunyi amfani sosai.</s>

en: A fundamental change is taking place in this Islamic and Arab region. This is a sign of Islamic Awakening.
hau: Wani gagarumin sauyi ne yake faruwa a wannan yanki na musulmi da larabawa; hakan alama ce ta farkawa ta Musulunci da ake samu.
mt0: <pad> A canji na kwarai na aiwatuwa a wannan yankin Musulmi da Arab. Wannan shine alama ta Islamic Awakening.</s>

en: The same thing which has been shouted as a slogan in the Islamic Republic for decades is revealing itself in the context of these countries. These developments have two characteristics: one is the presence of the people, and other is the religious orientation of these movements.
hau: Wannan lamari da shekara da shekaru kenan ake daga takensa a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, to sai ga shi a yau yana nuna kansa cikin rayuwar kasashe. Akwai wadansu siffofi guda biyu da wadannan lamari ya kebanta da su: na farko shi ne batun kasantuwar mutane, na biyu kuma shi ne riko da addini da kuma komawa gare shi.
mt0: <pad> Same thing which has been shouted as a slogan in the Islamic Republic for decades is showing itself in the context of these countries. These developments have two features: one is the presence of the people, and the other is the religious orientation of these movement.</s>

en: These are two essential characteristics.
hau: Wadannan abubuwa ne na asasi guda biyu.
mt0: <pad> These are two important features.</s>

en: The physical presence of the people - this is what happened in the Islamic Revolution.
hau: Kasantuwar mutane a fage; shi ne irin wannan yanayi da ya faru a lokacin juyin juya halin Musulunci na Iran.
mt0: <pad> jiki na mutane - wannan ne ya faru a Islamic Revolution</s>

en: Parties, people who live in their ivory towers and political analysts could not do anything.
hau: Kungiyoyi da jam'iyyu da wadanda suke zaune a kan tebura da kuma cikin manyan gidaje da masu sharhi cikin kwakwalwa sun gagara aikata komai.
mt0: <pad> Parties, those who live in their ivory towers and political analysts couldn't do anything.</s>

en: The art of our magnanimous Imam was that he managed to encourage the people to enter the arena.
hau: Babbar fasahar Imamin mu mai girma ita ce ya sami damar shigo da mutane cikin fage.
mt0: <pad> Imamu mu na kwarai ya yi kokari ya shawo kan jama'a su shiga cikin wannan taro.</s>

en: Today the same thing is happening in other countries.
hau: To a yau ma irin wannan lamari ne yake faruwa a kasashen (larabawa).
mt0: <pad> A yau, abin da ke faruwa a wasu kasashe na duniya.</s>

en: In Egypt and Tunisia it was the people who entered the arena, otherwise intellectuals and those who live in ivory towers were always there and they were talking all along. They often called on the people to protest, but nobody would listen to them.
hau: A kasar Masar ko kuma Tunusiya mutane ne suka shigo fage da kansu; idan kuwa ba haka ba to ai daman masana da masu zaune cikin manyan gidaje a ko da yaushe sun kasance suna magana; a lokuta da dama ma sun kasance suna kiran mutane, babu wani da ya damu sosai da wadannan maganganu da suke fadi.
mt0: <pad> In Egypt and Tunisia, it was the people who entered the arena, otherwise the intellectuals and those who live in ivory towers were always there and they were talking all along. They often called on the people to protest, but nobody would listen to them.</s>

en: This time it was the people who entered the arena with a religious orientation.
hau: A nan su kansu mutanen ne suka shigo cikin fage, sannan kuma akida da manufarsu ta addini ce.
mt0: <pad> a wannan lokacin, mutane ne suka shiga cikin taro da imani.</s>

en: Friday prayers, congregational prayers, Name of God, religious scholars, promoters of religion, founders of new schools of religious thought in certain countries - these were the elements that encouraged the people to step in.
hau: Wato abubuwan da suka tara su ne sallar juma'a, sallar jam'i, sunan Allah, malaman addini, mutane masu isar da sakon addini da kuma masu bayanin mahangar addini a kasashe. Da suka shigo cikin fage, don haka sai su ma mutane suka shigo cikin fagen.
mt0: <pad> asabar, ibadah jama'a, sunan Allah, malamai na addini, masu yada addini, masu kafa shool din addini a wasu kasashe - waɗannan su ne abubuwa da suka karfafa mutane su shiga cikin aikin.</s>

en: This is a characteristic of these events.
hau: Wannan ita ce siffar da wannan lamarin ya kebanta da ita.
mt0: <pad> wanna shine characteristic of these events.</s>

en: Why did the people step into the arena?
hau: To me ya sa suka fiton?
mt0: <pad> Why did the people step into the arena?</s>

en: The oppressive rulers in Egypt, Tunisia and other countries had hurt the pride of the people.
hau: A kasar Masar, a kasar Tunusiya, haka nan a sauran kasashe, wadannan sarakuna da azzaluman shugabanni sun zubar wa mutane da mutumcinsu.
mt0: <pad> 'Yena a san cewa, 'Ai ba mu sani ba.'</s>

en: For example, the people of Egypt had to see the leader of their country commit the worst and most hideous crimes for Israel.
hau: A matsayin misali mutanen kasar Masar suna ganin shugabansu, don biyan bukatar haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila, yana aikata mafi munin ayyuka.
mt0: <pad> Kwamfano, 'yan kasar Misra sun ga shugabansu yana aikata aibi mafi muni da kuma aibi mafi munin ga Isra'il.</s>

en: If Hosni Mubarak had not cooperated with Israel in the case of the siege on Gaza, Israel could not have pressured the people of Gaza like that.
hau: Idan da a ce Hosni Mubarak bai hada kai da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila cikin killacewar da aka yi wa Gaza ba, to da kuwa Isra'ilan ba za ta iya aikata irin wannan cutarwar da ta yi wa mutanen Gazan ba.
mt0: <pad> Idan Hosni Mubarak ba ya hada hannu da Israel a kan kame Gaza, Isra'il ba zai iya samun damar tsanantawa al'ummar Gaza yadda ya kamata.</s>

en: But Hosni Mubarak stepped in and helped Israel to block the way to Gaza.
hau: Amma sai Hosni Mubarak ya shigo cikin fage, ya taimaka, ya rufe hanyar shigowa da kuma fita daga Masar.
mt0: <pad> But Hosni Mubarak took the lead and helped Israel to block the way to Gaza.</s>

en: Then they realized that the people of Gaza had dug tunnels under the ground. In order to stop the oppressed people of Gaza from using these tunnels, they built steel walls around them which ran 30 meters below the surface and cut through the tunnels.
hau: A lokacin da ya sami labarin cewa mutanen Gaza suna bi ta karkashin kasa, ta cikin ramuka (don shigar da abubuwan da suke bukata), don ya hana su yin hakan sai ya gina wata katanga ta karfe mai tsawon mita talatin, ya shigar da ita cikin kasa, don ya rufe hanyar shiga din.
mt0: <pad> 'Da suka gano cewa mutanen Gaza sun gizzarda tũnĩro a cikin kasa. Don ya hana jama'ar Gaza da suke amfani da tũnĩro, sunyi tũnĩro na karfe a gĩcigĩrĩra tũnĩro 30 mita a kasan kuma sunyi tũnĩro a gĩciĩrĩra.</s>

en: It was Hosni Mubarak who did this.
hau: Wannan shi ne abin da Hosni Mubarak ya aikata.
mt0: <pad> Hosni Mubarak ne ya yi hakan.</s>

en: Similar things happened in other countries as well.
hau: Ana iya ganin makamancin hakan ma cikin wasu kasashen na daban.
mt0: <pad> Similar things happened in other countries as well.</s>

en: For example, Gadhafi showed an anti-western attitude during the first few years of his rule, but he has rendered great services to the west during the recent years.
hau: A matsayin misali a kasar Libiya, duk kuwa da cewa a shekarun farko-farko na darewa mulkinsa, Gaddafi ya nuna akidar kyama da kuma kiyayyar kasashen yammaci, to amma cikin shekarun baya-bayan nan ya aiwatar da hidima mai girma ga kasashen yammaci.
mt0: <pad> Kwamfano, Gaddafi ya nuna halin da yake adawa da zahiri a cikin 'yan shekaru kadan na mulkinsa, amma ya bayar da dimbin ayyuka ga zahiri a cikin 'yan shekaru a baya.</s>

en: The people of Libya saw that a simple threat was enough to make Gadhafi load all the nuclear facilities of his country onto a ship and tell westerners to take them away.
hau: (Mutanen Libiya) da idanuwansu sun ga cewa daga 'yar wata barazana da aka yi masa, sai ga shi ya tattara dukkanin kwarewa da kayan aiki na nukiliyansa, ya sanya su cikin jirgin ruwa, ya mika wa mutanen yammaci, ya ce ku tafi da su!
mt0: <pad> A Libya, mutanen kasar sun gane cewa barazanar kawai ya isa Gaddafi ya zuba duk kayan nukiliya na kasarsa a cikin jirgin ruwa, kuma ya gaya wa zakara a tura su zuwa waje.</s>

en: Just compare the situation of our nation with the Libyan nation.
hau: Ku duba ku ga matsayin da al'ummar mu take da shi, sannan su kuma (wadancan) a wani matsayin suke.
mt0: <pad> kawai ka gwada halin kasarmu da na Libya.</s>

en: Not only did our government officials not retreat, but they also increased our nuclear facilities by several times each year against the wish of the enemy.
hau: Amma jami'an kasar mu ba wai ma kawai ba su ja da baya ba ne, face ma dai sabanin abin da makiyan suke so a kowace shekara sai kara rubanya shirin ake yi.
mt0: <pad> 'Ba wai kawai wakilan gwamnatinmu ba su janye ba, amma sun kara karfafa kayan aikin nukilia na kasarmu sau biyu a kowace shekara a adawa da burin 'yan adawa.</s>

en: The same thing can be seen in all the countries whose people have revolted against their governments.
hau: Ana iya ganin irin wadannan cin mutumcin cikin dukkanin wadannan kasashe da mutane suka yunkura.
mt0: <pad> Idan a ka gano hakan, to a kowace kasa da jama'ar ta sunyi zanga-zangar adawa da gwamnatin ta, a zahiri, a kowace kasa da a ka gano hakan.</s>

en: This is important to us.
hau: Wannan shi ne abin da ke da muhimmanci a gare mu.
mt0: <pad>. Wannan abu ne da gaske a garemu.</s>

en: After these events took place, they adopted contradictory positions because they did not have an appropriate understanding of the events and because they did not know the people.
hau: Bayan da wadannan abubuwa suka faru, to da yake ba su fahimci lamarin ba, ba su san mutane ba, sai su ka dau matakai masu karo da juna.
mt0: <pad> A lokacin da wadannan abubuwa suka faru, sunyi akasin ayuka saboda basu da yaddar aunawa na abubuwan da suka faru ba kuma saboda basu san mutanen ba.</s>

en: Of course in the case of these and other countries, America's support for dictators is a point which has been constantly noticed about America's behavior. They supported Hosni Mubarak as long as they could. Then they realized that it was not possible to keep him in power, so they threw him away.
hau: Ko da yake abubuwan da ya zuwa yanzu aka gani daga wajen Amurka dangane da wadannan kasashe da sauran kasashen na daban, shi ne goyon bayan shugabanni 'yan kama-karya. Sun kasance masu kare Hosni Mubarak har zuwa karshen yadda za su iya; to amma a lokacin da suka ga cewa daga yanzu kan ba za su iya ba, sai suka yi watsi da shi.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga haka, a cikin wadannan da sauran kasashe, Amurka ta goyon bayan dictator ne wani abu da aka gano a halin Amurka. Sun goyon bayan Hosni Mubarak har yadda suka iya. Da sun gane cewa ba zai yiwu ba su ci gaba da rike shi a mulki, don haka sun jefa shi a waje.</s>

en: This is a lesson to the leaders of other countries who are dependent on America.
hau: Shi kansa hakan wani darasi ne ga shugabannin da suka dogara da Amurka na su fahimci cewa daga lokacin da amfaninsu ya kare sannan kuma ba su da wani amfani (a gare su) to nan take za su yi jefa da su tamkar wata tsumma maras amfani, ba za su taba damuwa da su ba.
mt0: <pad> Lesson to the leaders of other countries who depend on America.</s>

en: But they supported and defended the dictator until the last moment. What happened was truly intolerable to America and the west.
hau: Abin da ya faru ga kasashen yammaci da kuma ita kanta Amurka, lalle abu ne da ba za su taba amincewa da shi ba.
mt0: <pad> 'But they supported and defended the dictator until the last moment. What happened was truly intolerable to America and the west.</s>

en: Egypt is one of the main pillars of America's Middle Eastern policies. They were relying on Egypt.
hau: Kasar Masar daya ne daga cikin tushen siyasar Amurka gabas ta tsakiya ne; lalle sun dogara da wannan siyasar.
mt0: <pad> Egypt shine daya daga cikin manyan pillars na Amurka's Middle East policy. Suna dogara kan Egypt.</s>

en: Then the Americans tried to preserve the structure of the Egyptian regime.
hau: To amma sun gagara kiyaye wannan tushe don ya ci gaba da amfaninsu.
mt0: <pad> Then the Americans tried to keep the structure of the Egyptian regime.</s>

en: If nations stay vigilant, they can easily expose America's hypocrisy and foil its plots.
hau: Wanda idan har mutane su ka zamanto a farke, za su iya kawar da wannan magudi da kuma lalata wannan makirci na su.
mt0: <pad> idan kasashe sunyi aiwatar da aikinsu, za su iya gano yadda Amurka ke aiki da ita da kuma kawo karshen ayyukan ta.</s>

en: After losing Hosni Mubarak in Egypt and Ben Ali in Tunisia, the Americans tried to preserve the structure of their regimes.
hau: Amurkawa sun yi kokarinsu wajen ganin tun da dai sun rasa Mubarak a Masar ko kuma Ben Ali a Tunusiya, to bari su yi kokarin kare irin tsarin gwamnatinsu.
mt0: <pad> Ba a san ba.</s>

en: They overthrew those governments as well. By Allah's favor, America's failures will continue in the region.
hau: Da yardar Allah, sannan kuma da ikonsa, Amurka za ta ci gaba da shan kashi a wannan yankin.
mt0: <pad> They toppled those governments too. By Allah's favor, America's failures will continue in the region.</s>

en: After they lost their agents in these countries, they took two courses of action. One was opportunism, and the other was simulation. Through opportunism they tried to hijack these revolutions.
hau: Bayan da suka rasa mutanen su a wadannan kasashe, sai suka sanya wasu abubuwa guda biyu da suke son cimmawa a gabansu: na farko shi ne jiran tsammani, na biyu kuma shi ne kokarin haifar da makamancin wannan lamarin a wasu wajajen.
mt0: <pad> Bisa ga cewa, a lokacin da suka rasa wakilansu a wadannan kasashe, sunyi hanya biyu na aiki. Daya ita ce 'opportunityism', kuma ta biyu simulation. Ta hanyar 'opportunityism', sunyi kokarin samun damar shiga cikin wadannan juyin juya halin.</s>

en: They were unsuccessful in this regard.
hau: To sun sha kashi dai a wannan aikin.
mt0: <pad> They were unsuccessful in this regard.</s>

en: Simulation was the second plot - that is to say, they tried to simulate the events of Egypt, Tunisia, Libya and certain other countries in Iran, the country that enjoys religious democracy and a populist government.
hau: Na biyu shi ne kamanta hakan. abin nufi da kamanta hakan shi ne su samar da irin abubuwan da suka faru a kasashen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya a wasu kasashen na daban.
mt0: <pad> Simulation was the second plot - that is to say, they tried to simulate the events of Egypt, Tunisia, Libya and some other countries in Iran, a country that enjoys religious democracy and a populist government.</s>

en: What they are doing is true hypocrisy: they claim to support nations.
hau: Munafunci na asali shi ne wannan abin da suke aikatawa, wato ikirarin kare hakkokin mutane.
mt0: <pad> abin da suke yi a zahiri shine ƙarya: sun ce suna goyon bayan kasashe.</s>

en: They are hypocritical about Egypt. They say they support the Egyptian people. Our dear people should know that America's President has sent a message to the Iranian nation, saying that he supports them.
hau: To bai baci ba idan har al'ummar mu masu girma suka fahimci cewa shugaban kasar Amurka ya aika wa al'ummar Iran sako yana fadin cewa mu din nan masu goyon bayanku ne! suna ikirarin cewa su din nan suna adawa da masu mulkin kama-karya, suna tare da hakkokin al'ummomi; amma karya suke yi.
mt0: <pad> They are hypocritical about Egypt. They say they support the Egyptian people. Our dear people should know that America's President has sent a message to the Iranian nation, saying that he supports them.</s>

en: Not only do they not show mercy to other nations, but they also show no mercy to their own people.
hau: Su din ba wai ma kawai ba sa tausayawa sauran al'ummomi ba ne, face ma hatta al'ummominsu ba sa tausaya musu.
mt0: <pad> 'Ba su kawai ba da rahama ga wasu al'umman, ba su ma ba da rahama ga 'yan uwansu.</s>

en: In spite of America's critical economic situation, the current US President spent hundreds of billions of dollars from the tax paid by US citizens in order to keep banks, arms companies and oil industries going. That is to say, he is spending the money that belongs to the American people on American companies and banks.
hau: Shi kansa wannan shugaban kasar Amurkan na yanzu ya yi amfani da biliyoyin dalolin mutane a irin wannan mummunan yanayi na tattalin arziki da Amurka take fama da shi don ya sake rayar da bankuna; don ya rayar da masana'antun makamai, don ya rayar da masana'antun mai; wato yayi hakan ne don rayar da kamfanoni.
mt0: <pad> In spite of America's critical economic situation, the current US President has spent hundreds of billions of dollars from the tax paid by American citizens to keep banks, arms companies and oil industries running. That is to say, he is spending the money that belongs to the American people on American companies and banks.</s>

en: Therefore, they do not even show mercy to their own people.
hau: Yana tatse mutane don rayar da kamfanoni, suna cika aljihun kamfanoni, suna cika aljihunnan bankuna; a saboda haka ba sa tausayawa hatta al'ummominsu.
mt0: <pad> They do not even show mercy to their own people.</s>

en: Today the American nation is struggling with the widespread economic crisis, and it does not have a solution.
hau: A yau al'ummar Amurka tana cikin matsalar tattalin arziki, sannan kuma ba su da mafita.
mt0: <pad> A yau, kasar Amurka na fada cikin matsalar tattalin arziki da ke yawo a duniya, kuma ba ta da wata hanyar warware matsalar.</s>

en: The torture centers of Guantanamo and Abu Ghraib and other torture centers are another issue.
hau: Baya ga gidajen yari da wajen azabtar da mutane irin su Guantanamo da Abu Ghraib na kasar Iraki da sauran wajajen da suke azabtar da mutane da suke wajaje daban-daban.
mt0: <pad> 'The torture centers of Guantanamo Bay and Abu Ghraib and other torture centers are another issue.</s>

en: They do not understand nations.
hau: Mutane ba sa fahimtar wadannan abubuwa, ba sa gane su.
mt0: <pad> They don't understand the nations.</s>

en: Does the current US President know what he is saying?
hau: Shin shugaban Amurka na yanzun ya san me yake fadi kuwa?
mt0: <pad> Does the current US President know what he is saying?</s>

en: Does he really understand who are behind his policies, or is he unaware and confused? We do not know the answer to these questions.
hau: Shin a hakikanin gaskiya ya san mutanen da suke bayan fage da suke juya siyasarsa, ko kuma bai fahimta ba ya gafala?
mt0: <pad> 'Ya ya a gane wanene ne a bayan shawarwari na sa, ko kuwa ya a gane kuma ya a rabu?'</s>

en: He says that the people who had gathered at Tehran's Azadi Square are like the people at Egypt's Tahrir Square.
hau: Yana fadin cewa mutanen da suke dandalin Azadi ('yanci) na Tehran, su ne dai mutanen da suke dandalin 'yanci na Masar.

en: He is right: each year on the 22nd of Bahman, the people of Iran gather at Azadi Square and shout "death to America".

mt0: <pad> About Libyan issue, we condemn the behavior of the Libyan government - killing and pressuring the people, dropping bombs on cities and killing civilians. But we also condemn the intervention of America and westerners in Libya.</s>

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on August 7, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with government officials of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings upon the Holy Prophet, our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Al-Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate and chosen household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
hau: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu kuma annabinmu Abul Kasim Muhammad tare da Alayensa tsarkaka kuma zababbu musamman ma Bakiyatullah (Imam Mahdi).
mt0: <pad> All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and blessings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Al-Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate and chosen family, especially the one who remained with Allah on earth.</s>

en: I would like to welcome the dear brothers and sisters - the hardworking and compassionate officials of the country. I hope Allah the Exalted will make this holy month auspicious for you and the Iranian nation.

mt0: <pad> I would like to welcome my dear brothers and sisters - the hardworking and compassionate officials of the country. I hope Allah the Exalted will make this holy month auspicious for you and the Iranian nation.</s>

en: The first strength of the Islamic Republic is that it has proven its capabilities are superior to the threats. This is a very important point.
hau: Batu na farko daga cikin abubuwa masu kyau da kuma irin karfi na wannan tsarin wanda kuma tsarin ya tabbatar da shi, shi ne nasara da yin galaba a kan barazana daban-daban da aka yi (wa tsarin); wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

en: Over the past 32 years we have encountered many threats - political threats, security threats, military threats, economic threats - which were supposed to harm the Islamic Republic.
hau: Tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da biyu mun fuskanci barazana daban-daban - barazana ta siyasa, barazana ta tsaro, barazana ta tattalin arzikin - manufar wadannan barazanar kuwa ita ce cutar da wannan tsarin.
mt0: <pad> a cikin shekaru 32 da suka wuce, muna fuskantar manyan barazanar - siyasa, tsaro, military, tattalin arziki - wanda aka so ya kawo hari ga Jamhuriyar Islama.</s>

en: Of course they wanted to overthrow the Islamic Republic, which proved to be impossible for them, so they tried to at least keep the Islamic Republic and Iran backward.
hau: Na'am suna so ne su kifar da wannan gwamnati, to amma da ya ke hakan ba abu ne mai sauki a gare su ba, sai suka so dakatar da tsarin waje guda, su ciyar da kasar nan baya.
mt0: <pad> 'Da ma sun so su tumbucewa Jamhuriyar Islama, wanda ya kasance impossible for them, don haka sun komaya a least to keep the Islamic Republic and Iran backward.</s>

en: The Islamic Republic has overcome these threats.

mt0: <pad> The Islamic Republic has overcome these threats.</s>

en: Some of these threats were posed directly by foreigners, such as the sanctions.
hau: Wasu daga cikin wadannan abubuwa su kansu ‘yan kasashen waje ne kai tsaye suka tsara su, kamar wannan lamari na takunkumin.
mt0: <pad> Bimwe a cikin waɗannan barazanar an kawo su ne ta hanyar kasashen waje, irin su sanctions.</s>

en: Sanctions have been there for many years, but they have been intensified in the recent years. They themselves spoke about crippling sanctions.
hau: An sanya wa kasar nan takunkumi na tsawon shekara da shekaru, to sai dai a shekarun baya-bayan nan sun kara kaimi da tsananta, su da kansu suke fadin cewa takunkumi ne mai ruguzawa.
mt0: <pad> Sanctions have been there for many years, but they have intensified in recent years. They themselves talked about crippling sanctions.</s>

en: They acted directly or used the United Nations - which was under their control - to impose these sanctions.
hau: Wadannan takunkumi a wasu lokuta ta hanyar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya - wacce damar a hannunsu ta ke - wasu kuma su da kansu kai tsaye ne, lalle sun sanya mana wannan takunkumin.
mt0: <pad> They acted directly or used the United Nations - which was under their control - to impose these sanctions.</s>

en: These were the threats in which foreigners were directly involved.

mt0: <pad> Irin wannan barazanar ne a cikin abin da 'yan waje' a ciki suka shiga.</s>

en: There were certain other threats - such as the issue of ethnicities in the country - which were caused by domestic factors although the enemy could have used these factors to his advantage. The Islamic Republic overcame all these threats. Today different ethnicities are living together in the country in a brotherly way.
hau: Haka nan kuma akwai wadansu barazanar wadanda suka kunno kai sakamakon abubuwan da suka faru na cikin gida; duk da cewa makiya sun yi amfani da hakan, a matsayin misali lamarin kabilu na kasar nan. To wannan tsarin dai ya yi nasara a kan dukkanin wadannan abubuwa. A yau kabilu daban-daban na kasar nan, suna ci gaba da rayuwa tare da junansu; sannan kuma ana iya ganin yadda suke jin cewa suna tare da wannan tsari da kuma kishinsa.
mt0: <pad> Akwai wasu barazanar - kamar yadda a kan rashawa a kasar nan - wanda ya tashi ne a cikin gida, ko da yake a lokacin ne a iya amfani da wadannan dalilai a hanyar da za ta amfane ainjĩra. en: I believe this is one of the most important strengths.

en: We should pay attention to this point when enumerating the strengths of the Islamic Republic.

en: The Islamic Republic has been faced with the enmity of the most powerful people in the world and it has been forced to deal with constant threats single-handedly for 32 years, but it has managed to overcome all these threats. This is a very important point.
